dis yah de people wa dey write down say been kin ta jedus christ fom way back ta abraham time jedus come out fom king david fambly an king david come out fom abraham fambly abraham been de fada ob isaac isaac been de fada ob jacob jacob been de fada ob judah an e broda dem judah been de fada ob perez an zerah an dey modda been tamar perez been de fada ob hezron hezron been de fada ob ram ram been de fada ob amminadab amminadab been de fada ob nahshon nahshon been de fada ob salmon salmon been de fada ob boaz an e modda been rahab boaz been de fada ob obed an e modda been ruth obed been de fada ob jesse jesse been de fada ob king david david been de fada ob solomon an e modda been uriah wife solomon been de fada ob rehoboam rehoboam been de fada ob abijah abijah been de fada ob asa asa been de fada ob jehoshaphat jehoshaphat been de fada ob joram joram been de fada ob uzziah uzziah been de fada ob jotham jotham been de fada ob ahaz ahaz been de fada ob hezekiah hezekiah been de fada ob manasseh manasseh been de fada ob amon amon been de fada ob josiah josiah been de fada ob jechoniah an e broda dem dey been bon wen de people fom babylon come een pon de israel people an cyaa um off wid um ta babylon an pit um een slabery atta dey enemy dem pit um een slabery an cyaa um off ta babylon shealtiel been bon jechoniah been de fada ob shealtiel shealtiel been de fada ob zerubbabel zerubbabel been de fada ob abiud abiud been de fada ob eliakim eliakim been de fada ob azor azor been de fada ob zadok zadok been de fada ob achim achim been de fada ob eliud eliud been de fada ob eleazar eleazar been de fada ob matthan mattah been de fada ob jacob jacob been de fada ob joseph joseph been mary husban an jedus wa dey call christ been mary son so den dey been foteen generation fom granfada ta granchile fom abraham time ta king david time an dey been foteen generation fom king david time ta de time wen de people fom babylon pit um een slabery an cyaa um off ta babylon an dey been foteen generation fom den ta de time wen jedus christ bon now dis yah wa happen wen jedus christ bon jedus modda mary been gage fa marry joseph bot fo dey git marry an joseph cyaa um fa lib wid um dey find out dat mary been speckin an dat been de powa ob de holy sperit wa mek dat happen now joseph wa been gage fa marry mary e been a man wa waak scraight wid god an e ain been wahn fa see mary come ta no open shame so joseph mek op e mind fa paat wid mary an keep um hush op e beena study haad bout wa e gwine do wen de lawd sen a angel ta um een a dream de angel tell um say joseph ya wa come out fom king david fambly mus dohn be scaid fa marry mary cause de chile wa e speckin dat wa de holy sperit mek happen e gwine hab son an ya mus gim de name jedus cause e gwine sabe e people fom dey sin now all dis happen so dat wa de lawd done tell de prophet say gwine happen e happen fa true e say one nyoung ooman dat ain neba know no man e gwine be wid chile e gwine hab son an dey gwine call de chile emmanuel dat mean fa say god right yah wid we so wen joseph wake op e done wa de lawd angel chaage um fa do e gone an marry mary bot joseph neba tetch mary til e done hab e son an joseph name de chile jedus now jedus been bon een betlem town een judea jurin de same time wen herod been king atta jedus been bon some wise man dem dat study bout de staa dem come ta jerusalem fom weh dey been een de east an dey aks say weh de chile da wa bon fa be de jew people king we beena see de staa wa tell bout um een de east an we come fa woshup um op wen king herod yeh dat e been opsot fa true an ebrybody een jerusalem been opsot too e call togeda all de leada dem ob de jew priest dem an de jew law teacha dem e aks um say weh de messiah gwine be bon at dey tell king herod say e gwine be bon een betlem town een judea cause de prophet write say betlem een judah lan ya sompin fa sho mongst dem oda town dey een judah cause one ob ya people gwine be a big rula e gwine rule oba me israel people same like a shephud da lead e sheep so king herod sen fa de man dem dat done come fom de east fa meet wid um bot e ain tell nobody bout de meetin den herod aks dem man fa tell um de zact time wen dey fus see dat staa e tell um say oona mus go ta betlem an look roun good fa de chile wen oona find um mus come back an leh me know so dat a kin go mesef fa woshup um op too atta dem man yeh wa de king say dey gone on an dey see de same staa dat dey beena see wen dey been back een de east dey folla dat staa til dey git ta de place weh de chile been an den dat staa ain gone no foda wen de man dem fom de east see dat staa dey dey been too glad dey been glad til dey ain know wa fa do dey gone eenta de house an dey see de chile dey wid e modda mary den dey kneel down fo de chile an woshup um op an dey open op dey bag an tek out de rich ting dey beena cyaa long wid um fa gii de chile dey gim gole frankincense an myrrh now den de lawd come ta dem man een a dream an waan um tell um say mus dohn go back fa tell king herod nottin so dey gone noda way back ta weh dey come fom atta de man dem fom de east done gone de lawd sen one angel een a dream fa waan joseph de angel tell um say king herod gwine come look fa de chile fa kill um ya mus git op tek de chile an e modda an ron way right now ta egypt lan stay dey til a tell oona fa come back fom dey so joseph git op e tek de chile an e modda an gone een de night time ta egypt lan e stay dey til king herod been dead wa de lawd been tell de prophet fa say gwine happen e happen fa true e been say a call me son fa come out fom egypt lan wen king herod find out dat de man dem fom de east done fool um good e been mad down e gii orda ta e sodja dem say mus kill all de boy chullun een betlem an een de whole arie roun bout mus kill all dem two yeah ole an nyounga de king done dat cause ob wa dem man fom de east done tell um bout de time wen dey fus beena see de staa dis mek wa de prophet jeremiah done say come true e say dey yeh a nise da come outta ramah dey yeh somebody da weep an wail dat been rachel da cry fa e chullun ain nobody kin mek um stop fa cry cause e chullun done git kill op atta herod done dead de lawd sen e angel een a dream ta joseph dey een egypt lan e tell um say mus git op an tek de chile an e modda an gone back ta israel lan cause dem dat beena try fa kill de chile done dead so den joseph git op an tek de chile an e modda an gone back ta israel bot wen joseph yeh say dat archelaus been tek e fada herod place fa rule een judea e been scaid fa go dey fa lib de lawd sen e angel fa waan joseph tell um een a dream wa fa do so joseph gone ta de arie call galilee e gone fa lib een one town dey name nazareth so wa de prophet dem done say bout jedus e come true dey been say dey gwine say e de man fom nazareth een dat time john wa bactize come ta de wildaness een judea an e staat fa preach dey e tell um say oona mus change oona sinful way an dohn do um no mo cause de time mos yah wen god gwine rule oba we john been de man wa de prophet isaiah beena taak bout wen e say somebody da holla een de wildaness say oona mus cleah de road weh de lawd gwine come shru mek de pat scraight fa um fa waak john cloes been mek wid camel hair an de belt roun e wais been mek wid animal hide e beena nyam locust an wile honey a whole heapa people come fa yeh um fom jerusalem fom all ob judea an fom all de whole arie close ta de jerden riba dey beena tell all de sinful ting dat dey done done an dey aks god fa fagib um den john beena bactize um een de jerden riba heapa de pharisee an de sadducee dem beena come fa hab john bactize um wen john shim e tell um say oona wickity jes like snake who tell oona dat ef oona git bactize oona kin git way fom de jedgiment wa god gwine sen fa punish oona oona mus do dem ting wa show oona done change oona way fa true an oona mus dohn tink say we de chullun ob abraham dat ain gwine sabe oona a da tell oona god able fa tek dem stone yah an ton um eenta abraham chullun now de ax ta de foot ob de tree ready fa cut um ebry tree wa ain beah good fruit god gwine cut um down an chunk um een de fire a da bactize oona wid wata fa show dat oona done change oona sinful way bot one man wa hab heap mo tority den me gwine come a ain fit fa eben tote e shoe e gwine bactize oona wid de holy sperit an wid fire e gwine jedge de people an separate um op like a faama wa hab e pitfork een e han fa separate de chaff fom de wheat e gwine geda de good wheat an pit um een e baan bot de chaff e gwine bun um een de ebalastin fire den jedus come fom galilee an gone ta de jerden riba e gone fa hab john bactize um bot john ain wahn fa gree fa bactize jedus e tell jedus say a oughta hab ya bactize me ya ain oughta come fa me fa bactize ya ainty jedus tell john say leh we do um de way a say fa now e fittin fa we fa do all wa god tell we fa do so den john gree fa do wa jedus say atta john done bactize jedus jedus come op outta de wata jes den god open op de eliment an jedus see god sperit da come down like a dob an light pon um den dey yeh a boice fom heaben say dis yah me own son wa a da lob e pledja me tommuch atta dat de holy sperit lead jedus eenta de wildaness weh de debil try fa mek um do sompin e ain oughta do wen jedus ain nyam nottin fa foty day an foty night e been hongry down de debil wa try fa mek people do ebil ting come ta jedus dey an tell um say since ya god son chaage dese rock yah fa ton eenta bread jedus ansa um say dey done write down een god book say e tek mo den sompin fa nyam fa mek people lib fa true e tek ebry wod dat come outta god mout den de debil cyaa jedus ta de holy city jerusalem e pit um way op pontop de mos high paat ob god house e tell jedus say since ya god son shrow yasef down fom yah cause dey done write down een god book say god gwine gii orda ta e angel dem tell um fa tek cyah ob ya de angel dem gwine tote ya een dey han so dat ya ain gwine hut eben ya foot pon a rock jedus tell de debil say dey done write down noda ting een god book say mus dohn try fa test de lawd ya god atta dat de debil tek jedus op ta a high place an show um all de country dem een de whole wol wid all dey powa an all dey purty ting wa dey got de debil tell jedus say a gwine gii ya all dem ting ef ya bow down an woshup me op jedus tell um say git way fom yah satan cause dey done write down een god book say mus woshup de lawd ya god an mus dohn saab nobody cep um den de debil lef jedus an de angel dem come fa tek cyah ob um wen jedus yeh dat dey done pit john eenta de jailhouse e gone back ta galilee bot e ain gone ta nazareth e gone fa lib een capernaum one willage close ta lake galilee een de arie ob zebulun an naphtali dis happen fa mek come true wa de prophet isaiah done been say een zebulun an naphtali lan pon de oda side ob de jerden riba an pon de way ta de great sea een galilee weh dey plenty people wa ain jew dem people beena lib een de daak dey ain know god bot now dey see a great light dey beena lib een de daak lan full ob det bot now de light da shine pon um fom dat time dey jedus staat fa tell all de people say oona mus change oona sinful way an dohn do um no mo cause de time mos yah wen god gwine rule oba oona jedus beena waak long de sho ta lake galilee wen e see two broda dey wa been fishaman dey name been simon wa dey call peter an e broda andrew dey beena cyas dey net eenta de wata fa ketch fish jedus tell um say oona mus come folla me oona beena ketch fish bot tareckly a gwine laan oona fa ketch people fa me soon as e say dat dey lef dey fishin net an gone long wid jedus fa folla um jedus gone on fom dey an e see two oda broda name james an john dey zebedee son dem dey been dey een dey boat wid dey fada zebedee da mend dey fishin net jedus call um fa come folla um scraight way james an john lef de boat an dey fada an dey gone wid jedus jedus gone all shru galilee e beena laan de people een de jew meetin house dem an e tell um de good nyews bout how god da come fa rule an e heal all kind ob ailment dat de people hab de nyews bout jedus spread all oba syria country an de people come ta um dey come da tote all de sick people dat hab all diffunt kind ob ailment some dem beena suffa plenty pain an some hab ebil sperit eenside um some hab fits an some ob dem ain able fa eben moob dey all come ta jedus an e heal dem op a great big crowd ob people gone long wid jedus dey come fom galilee fom de ten town an fom jerusalem an judea an de arie pon de oda side ob de jerden riba an dey all folla jedus wen jedus see all de crowd dem e gone pontop one high hill e seddown dey an e ciple dem come geda roun um den jedus staat fa laan um e say dey bless fa true dem people wa ain hab no hope een deysef cause god da rule oba um dey bless fa true dem wa saaful now cause god gwine courage um dey bless fa true dem wa ain tink dey mo den wa dey da cause all de whole wol gwine blongst ta um dey bless fa true dem wa hongry an tosty fa wa right cause dey gwine git sattify dey bless fa true dem wa hab mussy pon oda people cause god gwine hab mussy pon dem dey bless fa true dem dat only wahn fa jes saab de lawd cause dey gwine see god dey bless fa true dem wa da wok haad fa hep people lib peaceable wid one noda cause god gwine call um e chullun dey bless fa true dem wa oda people mek suffa cause dey da waak scraight wid god cause god da rule oba um ya bless fa true wen people hole ya cheap an mek ya suffa an wen dey say all kind ob bad ting bout ya wa ain true cause ya da folla me mus be glad fa true cause ya gwine git a whole heapa good ting dat god da keep fa ya een heaben ya mus memba dat de people wa mek ya suffa dem ting yah dey ole people done de same ting ta de prophet dem wa lib way back dey oona jes like salt fa all people bot ef de salt done loss e taste ain no way ya kin mek um git e good taste back ainty dat salt dey ain good fa nottin cep chunk um out oona jes like light fa de whole wol ain no way ya kin hide a city wa people build pontop a hill an ain nobody light a lamp an den pit um ondaneet a bushel basket steada dat dey pit de lamp op pontop de table weh e da shine so all de people een de house kin see same way so ya mus leh ya light shine een front ob people so dey kin see de good ting ya da do den dey gwine praise ya fada god een heaben ya mus dohn tink say dat a come fa git rid ob de law wa god gii moses needa wa de prophet dem beena laan de people a ain come fa git rid ob dem a come fa mek ebryting happen wa dey say been gwine happen a da tell oona fa true long as de heaben an de whole wol las ain nottin een god law gwine be git rid ob not eben de leeleetles pen maak needa de leeleetles pint til all dat de law taak bout done happen fa true ef somebody ain do wa eben de leeleetles one ob dem law dat god gii we say an ef e laan oda people say dey ain got fa do um needa god gwine mek dat poson hab de mos low place weh god da rule bot dem wa da do wa de law dat god gii we say an da laan oda people fa do um too god gwine gii dem a place high op weh god da rule so den a tell oona say ya ain gwine go ta heaben weh god da rule ef ya ain scraight wid god mo den de jew law teacha dem an de pharisee dem oona done yeh dat dey beena laan de jew people way back dey say ya mus dohn kill nobody dey gwine cyaa de poson ta court wa kill somebody bot a tell oona say whosoneba git mad op wid e neighba dey gwine cyaa um ta court whosoneba shrow slam pon e neighba say ya ain good fa nottin dey gwine cyaa um ta de jew high court fa jedge um an whosoneba tell e neighba say ya fool dat bad nuff fa mek um go suffa een de fire ob hell so den ef ya staat fa gii ya gif ta god dey fo de alta een god house an ya memba dat ya neighba got sompin ginst ya ya mus lef ya gif dey een front de alta an go scraight ta ya neighba fus ya mus mek peace wid um den ya kin come back ta god house an gii ya gif ta god ef anybody aagy wid one ob oona an e da cyaa ya ta courthouse den ya mus try fa settle wid um fo ya git dey cause ef ya git ta de courthouse e gwine han ya oba ta de jedge an de jedge e gwine han ya oba ta de police an dey gwine chunk ya eenta de jailhouse a da tell oona fa true ya gwine stay een de jailhouse til ya pay de las cent ob de fine wa ya owe oona yeh dat dey beena laan de people say a man mus dohn sleep wid noda man wife bot a da tell oona say de man wa look pon a ooman wa ain e wife an wahn fa sleep wid um dat man done sleep wid dat ooman een e haat so ef ya right eye da mek ya sin dig um out an chunk um way fa sho e mo betta fa loss jes one paat ob ya body den fa leh ya whole body git chunk eenta hell ef ya right han da mek ya sin cut um off an chunk um way fa sho e mo betta fa loss jes one paat ob ya body den fa leh ya whole body git chunk eenta hell oona yeh too wa dey beena say ef a man worce e wife e haffa write paper an gim ta de ooman fa show e done worce fom um bot a da tell oona say ef any man worce e wife wen dat ooman ain sleep wid noda man dat husban sponsable wen e wife git marry gin fa mek de ooman lib een sin cause e da sleep wid noda man an de oda man dat marry de ooman wa done been worce dat way dat man da lib een sin too e da sleep wid noda man wife oona yeh too dat dey beena laan de people way back say wen ya gii ya wod an sweah ya gwine do sompin fa true ya mus do wa ya promise fo de lawd fa do bot a da tell oona say mus dohn sweah tall say a sweah ta heaben cause een heaben god da seddown an rule mus dohn say a sweah ta de wol cause god da res e foot pon de wol mus dohn say needa a sweah ta jerusalem cause jerusalem de city ob god de great king an ya mus dohn say a sweah ta me head cause ya ain able fa mek eben one dem hair een ya head ton white or ton black mus jes say yeah or no cause any oda wod come scraight fom de debil oona yeh too dat dey beena laan de people say ef somebody buss ya eye out ya kin buss out dat poson eye an ef somebody knock ya teet out ya kin knock out dat poson teet bot a da tell oona say ya mus dohn git back at de poson wa da do ya bad ef somebody knock de right side ob ya face ya mus ton an leh um knock de lef side too an ef somebody tek ya ta court fa mek ya gim ya shat ya mus leh um hab ya coat too ef somebody mek ya tote e load one mile ya mus tote e load two mile ef somebody beg ya fa sompin ya mus gim an ef somebody wahn fa borry sompin fom ya ya mus lend um ta um oona yeh dat dey beena laan de people say ya mus lob ya neighba dem an hate dem wa do ya wrong bot a da tell oona say ya mus lob dem wa do ya wrong an ya mus pray ta god fa dem people wa da mek ya suffa dat way oona gwine be chullun fa true ob oona fada een heaben oona fada god da mek de sun shine pon de ebil people an pon de good people dem all two e da mek rain come down pon dem wa da do wa e wahn an pon dem wa ain do wa e wahn ef oona lob jes dem wa lob oona oona ain got no right fa look fa no payback fom god fa dat ainty cause eben dem wa da geda tax dey da do de same ting an ef oona speak jes ta oona broda dem oona ain do no mo den oda people da do ainty cause eben people wa ain bleebe pon god dey da do de same ting ya mus be pafeck same like ya fada god een heaben pafeck tek cyah wen ya da do dem good ting wa god wahn ya fa do fa hep people ya mus dohn do um een front ob oda people so dat dey gwine shim ef ya da do dat ya ain gwine git de payback wa ya fada een heaben got fa so wen ya da gii sompin ta dem wa ain got nottin ya mus dohn tell all de people bout wa ya da do same like de hypicrit dem do een de jew meetin house an een de screet dey do um fa mek people praise um a da tell oona fa true dat praise wa dey git fom people dat all de payback dey gwine git bot wen ya da gii ta dem wa ain got nottin ya mus do um so dat eben ya bes fren ain gwine know bout dat mus dohn leh nobody know bout de good ting dem ya done an ya fada god wa see wa ya do een secret e gwine pay ya back wen ya da pray ta god ya mus dohn do like de hypicrit dem da do dey lob fa pray wiles dey da stanop een de meetin house an pon de cona ob de screet so dat all de people kin see dem wiles dey da pray a da tell oona fa true dey done git all de payback wa dey gwine git bot wen ya da pray ya mus go eenta ya room ya mus shet de door an pray ta ya fada god wa dey een heaben weh ya cyahn shim ya fada da see all wa ya da do eben wen nobody else ain shim an e gwine pay ya back wen ya da pray ya mus dohn go on an on wid sommuch taak wa ain mean nottin same like dem wa ain bleebe pon god da do dey tink dat wen dey da pray god gwine yeh um cause dey da pray so long ya mus dohn be like dem cause ya fada god done know wa ya need fo ya aks um pray like dis yah say we fada wa dey een heaben leh ebrybody hona ya name we pray dat soon ya gwine rule oba de wol wasoneba ting ya wahn leh um be so een dis wol same like dey een heaben gii we de food wa we need dis day yah an ebry day fagib we fa we sin same like we da fagib dem people wa do bad ta we leh we dohn hab haad test wen satan try we keep we fom ebil ef oona fagib oda people fa de bad wa dey do oona oona fada een heaben esef gwine fagib oona bot ef oona ain fagib oda people fa de bad wa dey do oona fada een heaben esef ain gwine fagib oona fa de bad oona do wen ya fast an ain nyam nottin so dat ya kin woshup god mus dohn pit on no long face same like de hypicrit dem do cause dey da go roun wid dey face all mess op so dat ebrybody see dat dey da fast a da tell oona fa true dey done git all de payback wa dey gwine git bot wen ya fast ya mus pit oll pon ya head an wash ya face so ya kin look good ta people ya mus do dat so dat people ain gwine see ya da fast jes ya fada god wa ain nobody kin see e da see wa ya da do eben wen people ain shim e gwine gii ya ya payback ya mus dohn pile op a whole heapa spensiz ting fa yasef een dis wol cause de mot kin nyam um an de rust kin rust um out an tief broke een an tief um stead ob dat ya mus pile op ya tredja een heaben ain no mot kin nyam um needa no rust kin rust um out dey an ain no tief kin broke een an tief um cause weh ya tredja da dat weh ya haat gwine be ya eye like a lamp fa ya body ef ya eye good all ya body full op wid light bot ef ya eye ain no good all ya body gwine be een de daak so den ef de light wa spose fa be dey eenside ya ain dey den de daak wa dey eenside ya gwine be daak fa sho mo den all oda daak ain nobody able fa saab two massa ef ya try fa do dat ya gwine hate one an lob de oda one ya gwine be true ta one an hole de oda one cheap ya ain able fa saab god an be a slabe ta money same time so den a da tell oona say mus dohn warry bout how ya gwine lib wa ya gwine nyam or wa ya gwine drink needa wa cloes ya gwine weah pon ya body cause ya life walyable way mo den sompin fa nyam ainty an ya body walyable way mo den cloes ainty now den leh we study bout de bod dem wa fly roun dey ain plant no seed needa geda crop dey ain pit op no crop een de conehouse stillyet oona fada een heaben da feed um oona way mo walyable den dem bod ainty an fa true ain nary one ob oona kin lib a bit longa cause e da warry ainty an hoccome ya da warry bout cloes fa weah leh we study bout de lily wa da grow wile dey ain wok needa mek cloes fa deysef now a da tell oona king solomon been too rich an hab fine cloes stillyet eben solomon ain neba hab cloes fa dress purty an fine like dem lily god de one dat gii cloes ta de wile grass an dat grass dey taday an e gone demarra people cut um down an bun um op ef god dress op de wile grass like dat fa true e gwine do way mo den dat fa mek sho ya hab cloes fa weah sho nuff oona ain bleebe god wid all oona haat so den ya mus dohn warry none tall say weh a gwine git sompin fa nyam or weh a gwine git sompin fa drink needa say weh a gwine git cloes fa weah de people dat ain bleebe een god dey da warry all de time bout dem ting oona fada een heaben know ya haffa hab sompin fa nyam an drink an cloes fa weah bot fus ob all leh god rule een ya life an study bout how e wahn ya fa waak scraight wid um an den god gwine gii ya all dem oda ting yah too so den mus dohn warry bout wa gwine happen demarra demarra gwine hab e own warry ebry day hab nuff trouble ob e own mus dohn jedge oda people den god esef ain gwine jedge ya de same way ya jedge oda people dat how god gwine jedge ya ef ya easy on oda people or ef ya mek um suffa dat de same way god gwine do ya wa mek ya see de leetle splinta ob wood een ya broda eye bot ya ain pay no mind ta de big log een ya own eye how ya gwine tell ya broda say broda leh me tek dat leetle splinta out ya eye wen ya ain eben pay no mind ta de big log een ya own eye ya hypicrit fus ya mus tek de big log out ya own eye den ya kin see plain how fa tek dat leetle splinta out ya broda eye mus dohn gii dog dem ting wa blongst ta god ef ya do dat de dog gwine ton an teah ya op mus dohn shrow ya fine bead dem ta de hog dem ef ya do dat dey gwine mash um onda dey foot an den ton roun an teah ya op aks god an e gwine gii ya wa ya aks fa look ta god an ya gwine find wasoneba ya da look fa knock ta god door an e gwine open um op ta ya cause de one wa da aks god gwine gim de one wa da look ta god e gwine find wasoneba e da look fa an de one wa da knock ta god door god gwine open op de door ta um ef ya hab a son an ef e aks ya fa a piece ob bread ya ain gwine gim no rock ainty an ef ya son aks ya fa a piece ob fish ya ain gwine gim no snake ainty ef oona wa ebil know how fa gii oona chullun good ting oona fada een heaben know how fa gii a heap mo good ting ta dem wa aks um een all wa ya do ya mus do ta ebrybody jes like ya wahn dem fa do ta oona dat wa de law god gii moses an wa de prophet dem laan we ya mus go een shru de leeleetle door cause de door weh people da go een weh dey gwine be stroy een hell dat door big fa true an dat way easy fa folla plenty people da waak een dat way dey bot de door weh people da go een fa git ebalastin life dat a leeleetle door an dat way haad fa folla ain a whole heapa people wa find dat way oona mus tek cyah look out fa dem prophet wa ain taak true wen ya shim dey look jes like sheep bot eenside dey haat dey jes like a wile wolf ya gwine know dem by de fruit dey da beah ya ain gwine pick grape fom a bramble bush ainty ya ain gwine geda fig fom de briah patch ainty same way so ebry tree wa da grow good e da beah good fruit bot a tree wa ain grow good e da beah bad fruit a tree wa da grow good e cyahn beah no bad fruit an a tree wa ain grow good cyahn beah no good fruit dey gwine cut down all dem tree wa ain beah no good fruit dey gwine chunk um een de fire so den ya gwine know dem by de fruit dey da beah ain ebrybody wa da call me say lawd lawd ain gwine go een weh god da rule een heaben jes dem wa do wa me fada god een heaben wahn wen dat day come plenty people gwine tell me say lawd lawd een ya name we done beena tell people wa god say ainty een ya name we done beena dribe out ebil sperit an do plenty miracle ainty den a gwine tell um say a ain neba know oona all oona wickity people git way fom me so den ebrybody wa da yeh me wod an do wa a tell um dey stan same like a poson wa got sense wen e build e house e lay de foundation pon de rock de rain come an de riba flood oba de haad wind blow an beat ginst dat house stillyet de house ain faddown cause de man done lay de foundation pon de rock bot de poson wa yeh me wod an ain do wa a tell um dat poson dey same like a fool man wa build e house pontop de sand de rain come an de riba flood all oba de haad wind blow an beat ginst dat fool man house an de house faddown bam e smash op atta jedus done tell de people all dis dey been stonish how jedus da laan um cause e ain laan um like de jew law teacha dem e laan um like e hab tority fa laan people dem ting yah wen jedus come down fom de high hill a whole heapa people beena folla um an one man been dey wa been sick wid leposy e come an kneel down pon de groun fo jedus e beg um say sah ef ya gree fa do um ya able fa mek me clean jedus scretch out e han an tetch um say a wahn fa do um a mek ya clean same time de leposy gone an de man been well den jedus chaage um say see yah mus dohn tell nobody bout dis mus go ta de jew priest an leh um see dat ya all well now an offa de sacrifice wa moses done chaage de people fa mek dat gwine mek ebrybody know ya all well now fa sho wen jedus git ta capernaum one roman offisa gone meet um e beg jedus fa hep um e beg um say lawd me saabant bad off sick e da leddown een de house an e cyahn moob e da suffa too bad jedus tell de offisa say a gwine ta ya house an mek um well bot de offisa say no lawd a ain fit fa hab ya come eenta me house bot jes say de wod an me saabant gwine git heal a mesef a man onda tority ob offisa wa oba me an a hab tority oba oda sodja dem wa onda me a tell one say mus go an e gone an a tell noda one say mus come an e come an a tell me saabant say mus do dis wok an e do um wen jedus yeh wa de offisa say e been scruck e tell de people wa beena folla um say a da tell oona fa true a ain neba see nobody yah een all ob israel wa hab fait like dis man yah a da tell oona plenty people gwine come fom all oba de wol fom de east an fom de west dey gwine seddown wid abraham isaac an jacob een dey place ta de feas weh god da rule een heaben bot god gwine sen way dem wa ain onda e rule out eenta de daak place weh dey gwine cry an grine dey teet den jedus tell de roman offisa say ya mus go ta ya house jes wa ya bleebe dat wa gwine happen an de offisa saabant e done git well dat same time wiles jedus beena taak ta de offisa jedus gone ta peter house an e see de modda ob peter wife sick een de bed wid de feba jedus tetch de ooman han an de feba lef um an e git op an staat fa fix sompin fa jedus fa nyam dat ebenin people come ta jedus da bring plenty people wa got ebil sperit eenside um jedus dribe out dem ebil sperit wid de wod wa e say an e mek all de sick people well all dem ting yah dat jedus do dey happen fa mek come true wa de prophet isaiah been say e say e tek way all we ailment e cyaa off all we sickness jedus see all de crowd roun um an e gii orda ta e ciple dem say mus git ready fa cross oba ta de oda side ob de lake den one jew law teacha come ta um an say teacha a gwine folla ya wehsoneba ya gwine go jedus tell um say de fox got hole een de groun an de bod wa fly roun op een de air dey got nes bot de man wa come fom god ain got noweh fa lay e head fa res one oda man wa beena gone long wid jedus e tell jedus say sah a gwine folla ya bot fus leh me go an bury me fada jedus ansa um say ya mus folla me leh dem wa dead bury dey own dead jedus git eenta de boat an e ciple dem folla um an jes dat fast a big wind come an blow oba de lake e mek de swellin wata come eenta de boat til e mos sink bot jedus beena sleep de ciple dem gone an wake jedus op dey say lawd sabe we we gwine git drown jedus ansa say hoccome oona so scaid oona ain got bot jes a leeleetle fait een me den jedus git op an e chaage de big wind an de swellin wata jes den ebryting calm right down de man dem been stonish dey aks one noda say who dis man yah e da chaage eben de wind an de wata tell um wa fa do an dey do um jedus cross ta de oda side ob de lake ta de arie weh de gadarene people lib wen e git dey two man wid ebil sperit da lib eenside um come outta de grabeyaad fa meet um dem man been so wile dat nobody ain been able fa pass by dat way dey holla loud say ya de son ob god wa bidness ya got wid we ya come yah fa mek we suffa fo de time wen god gwine toment we now den a heapa hog beena nyam pon a hill dey dem ebil sperit da beg jedus say ef ya gwine dribe we outta de man dem leh we go eenside dem hog jedus tell um say oona git way fom yah so de ebil sperit dem come outta de two man an gone eenside de hog dem den all de hog ron down de side ob de steep hill like sompin wile dey ron eenta de lake an git drown de people wa beena mind de hog dem ron off an gone ta de town dey tell de people all de nyews an wa done happen ta de man dem wa been hab ebil sperit eenside um den all de people een de town gone fa meet jedus wen dey shim dey beg jedus fa go way fom dey jedus git eenta a boat an cross ta de oda side de lake an e come ta e own town some man dem come long da tote one man wa paralyze pon e bed wen jedus see dat dey bleebe fa true dat e gwine heal de man e tell de sick man say me son ya mus dohn warry ya sin done been fagib wen dey yeh dat some de law teacha dem say ta deysef dis man jedus da hole god cheap jedus know wa de law teacha dem beena tink bout so e tell um say wa mek oona tink bad ting een oona haat fa sho e mo easy fa tell dis man say ya sin done been fagib den fa chaage um say git op an waak ainty a gwine show oona dat de man wa come fom god hab tority een dis wol fa fagib people sin den jedus tell de paralyze man say git op tek ya bed an go home de man git op an gone home wen de crowd see wa happen dey been cyaa way an dey praise god cause e gii a man dis kinda tority jedus lef de place weh e been wiles e beena gwine e see one man name matthew wa da geda tax da seddown ta e office jedus tell um say come folla me an e git op an gone folla jedus jedus beena seddown fa nyam een matthew house plenty people wa da geda tax come long wid oda people wa de jew leada dem say ain fit fa mix wid de jew people an dey all seddown da nyam wid jedus an e ciple dem wen some pharisee see dat dey aks e ciple dem say oona teacha ain oughta nyam wid dem kinda people ainty jedus yeh wa dey say so e tell um say dem wa well ain need no docta jes dem wa sick need um oona mus go an find out wa dey mean wen dey write say god wahn people fa hab mussy pon oda people e ain wahn jes dem animal sacrifice wa oona da mek a ain come fa call dem wa tink dey da waak scraight wid god a come fa call de sinna dem john ciple dem come ta jedus an aks um say hoccome we an de pharisee dem da fast bot ya own ciple dem dey ain fast jedus ansa um say wen people come ta a weddin dey ain gwine be saaful long as de groom dey wid um bot de time gwine come wen de groom gwine be tek way fom mongst um dat de time wen dey gwine fast ain nobody gwine cut piece fom nyew closs wa ain neba been wash fa shrink an nyuse um fa patch e ole cloes cause wen de patch shrink e gwine pull an den de teah gwine be eben wossa ain nobody gwine tek ole bottle an pit nyew wine een um wiles de wine still da draw cause ef e do dat dat wine gwine buss open de ole bottle de wine gwine waste an de ole bottle gwine git ruint too stead ob dat dey mus pit nyew wine een nyew bottle wa ain gwine broke op an de wine ain gwine waste needa jedus still beena taak ta dem wen one leada een de jew meetin house come an kneel down ta jedus foot e beg jedus say me daughta mos dead bot do please come an pit ya han pon um an pray fa um den e gwine lib so jedus git op an folla dat leada an e ciple dem gone long wid um too jes den one sick ooman wa beena bleed fa tweb yeah e come op hine jedus an tetch de edge ob jedus cloes de ooman beena say een e haat ef a jes tetch e cloes a gwine git heal jedus ton roun e see de ooman an tell um say me daughta ya mus dohn warry cause ya bleebe ya done been heal dat same time e been heal wen jedus git ta de leada house an gone een e see de people dem wa beena gwine fa play flute fa de buryin an ebrybody wa beena weep an wail loud fa de chile jedus tell um say oona git out de house de chile ain dead e da sleep de people jes laugh at um wen dey done mek all de crowd go out de house jedus gone eenta de chile room e tek de chile han an de gyal git op den de nyews spread all oba dat lan dey bout wa jedus done wen jedus come outta dat place two man wa been bline beena folla um dey holla say david son hab mussy pon we den jedus gone eenta de house an de man dem wa been bline come ta um jedus aks um say oona bleebe a able fa heal oona dey tell um say yeah we bleebe lawd jedus tetch dey eye an say leh um happen den jes like oona bleebe den dey been able fa see gin dey been heal jedus taak scrong ta um say oona mus dohn tell nobody wa happen bot de man dem gone an spread de nyews bout jedus all oba dat lan dey wiles de two man wa been bline beena gwine out fom weh jedus been some people come ta jedus da bring one man wa ain able fa taak an wa got ebil sperit eenside um jedus dribe de ebil sperit outta dat man an soon as e done dat de man staat fa taak all de people been stonish dey say nobody ain neba see nottin like dis fo een israel bot de pharisee dem say de leada ob de ebil sperit dem e de one wa gii jedus powa fa dribe ebil sperit outta people jedus gone roun ta all de town an willage dem e beena laan de people een dey meetin house an tell um de good nyews bout god rule an e heal de sick people wa got all kind ob ailment wen jedus see all de crowd dem e been too saary fa um fa true cause dey been mix op an ain able fa hep deysef jes like sheep wa ain got no shephud fa mind um den jedus tell e ciple dem say de crop done ready fa geda bot dey ain nuff han fa geda um mus pray ta de lawd ob de crop fa sen out mo han fa geda de crop jedus call e tweb ciple togeda an e gim powa fa dribe out ebil sperit an fa heal dem wa hab all kind ob ailment now dis yah de name ob de tweb man jedus name postle fus simon wa dey da call peter an e broda andrew james an e broda john wa been zebedee boy dem philip an bartholomew thomas an matthew wa beena geda tax james wa been alphaeus boy an thaddaeus simon wa been call de patrot an judas iscariot wa ton jedus een fa money jedus sen dem tweb postle fa go out fa tell de good nyews bot e chaage um say oona mus dohn go noweh weh de people lib wa ain jew needa ta no town een samaria steada dat oona mus go ta de israel people wa same like sheep wa done loss wiles oona da gwine oona fa tell all de people say de time wen god gwine rule done come oona mus heal de sick people mus mek de people dem wa done dead git life back mek de people wa got leposy clean gin an dribe de ebil sperit dem fom outta people oona ain pay nottin fa wa oona git fom god same fashion oona mus dohn mek people pay nottin fa wa oona da gim mus dohn tote nottin long wid ya mus dohn tek no money no gole no silba not eben a penny een ya money bag mus dohn cyaa no grip long wid oona fa de trip needa no cloes fa change needa no spare pair ob sandal not eben no stick fa waak cause de people dem wa oona gwine wok fa dey haffa gii oona wa oona need wen ya come ta a town or a willage ya mus find somebody dey wa glad fa gii ya haaty welcome ya fa stay wid um til ya ready fa lef dat place dey wen ya da go eenta de house dey ya fa say leh god peace be pon oona ef de people dem een de house gii ya haaty welcome leh de blessin ya gim stay dey pon um bot ef dey ain gii ya no welcome ya fa tek back de blessin wa ya gim ef ya come ta a house or a town an de people dey ain glad fa hab ya stay dey wen ya da come outta dey shake de dort fom off ya foot a da tell oona fa true wen de jedgiment day come dem een dat town gwine suffa mo den de people een sodom an gomorrah listen a da sen oona fa go an oona jes like sheep wa da gwine mongst wolf oona mus be wise same like a saapent oona mus dohn do no bad ta nobody same like a dob ya mus look out fa people wa gwine do ya bad dey gwine grab hole ta ya an bring ya fa be jedge front ob de leada dem een dey court dey gwine beat ya een dey meetin house dey gwine grab hole ta ya cyaa ya ta de gobna an de king fa dem fa jedge ya dat wen ya gwine tell dem an all people de good nyews wen dey grab hole ta ya an tek ya fa jedge ya mus dohn warry bout wa ya gwine say wen dat time come god gwine tell ya wa fa say de wod ya say den dey ain gwine be ya own wod cause de holy sperit wa ya fada god sen e gwine pit de wod dem een ya mout dey broda wa gwine han oba dey own broda ta people wa gwine kill um same fashion some fada gwine han oba dey own chullun an some chullun gwine ton ginst dey own fada an modda an han um oba ta de tority fa jedge um an kill um all de people gwine be ginst oona cause oona bleebe pon me bot god gwine sabe all ob oona wa stanop fa me til de wol done end wen dey mek ya suffa een one town ya mus ron go ta noda town a da tell oona fa true say ya ain gwine do wok een all de town dem een israel fo de man wa come fom god gwine come back gin poson wa da laan ain mo betta den de one wa da laan um an saabant ain mo betta den e massa e good nuff fa de one wa laan fa be same like de one wa laan um an fa de saabant fa be same like e massa ef people beena call de head man ob de house say e beelzebub fa sho dey gwine say ting eben mo wossa bout dat man fambly so den mus dohn be scaid ob people wasoneba kiba op gwine be onkiba wasoneba people da do een secret ebrybody gwine know bout um wa a da tell oona een de daak ob de night ya mus tell um gin ta people een de broad daylight an wa a da taak bout wid oona ondaneet me bret eenside de house ya mus holla um pontop de house ya mus dohn be scaid ob dem wa able fa stroy ya body cause dey ain able fa stroy ya soul steada dat ya mus feah god cause e able fa stroy ya body an ya soul all two een hell de sparra ain wot nottin two ob dem wot one cent ainty stillyet ain eben one ob dem gwine faddown pon de groun ef oona fada god ain gree fa leh um god esef done count ebry scran ob hair pon ya head so den mus dohn be scaid oona way mo walyable den a whole heapa sparra jedus tell um say de poson wa da tell people dat e blongst ta me a mesef gwine tell me fada god een heaben say dat poson dey blongst ta me bot de poson wa da tell people say e ain blongst ta me a gwine tell me fada god een heaben say dat one dey ain blongst ta me oona mus dohn tink say dat a come fa bring peace ta de wol no a ain come fa bring peace a come fa bring a sode a come fa ton de son ginst e fada de daughta ginst e modda a come fa ton de daughtaeenlaw ginst e modaeenlaw some mongst oona own fambly gwine be oona enemy wa hate oona mo den all whosoneba lob e fada or e modda mo den me e ain fit fa be me ciple whosoneba lob e son or e daughta mo den me e ain fit fa be me ciple an whosoneba dohn tote e own cross an come folla me dat poson ain fit fa be me ciple de poson wa da try fa sabe e life e gwine loss e true life bot de poson wa loss e life cause ob me e gwine git true life whosoneba gii oona haaty welcome dat poson da gii me haaty welcome an whosoneba gii me haaty welcome e da gii de one wa sen me haaty welcome whosoneba gii god prophet a haaty welcome god gwine gim de same payback wa e gii de prophet an whosoneba gii haaty welcome ta de poson wa waak scraight wid god god gwine gim de same payback dat e gii de oda poson whosoneba gii cole wata fa drink ta de poson wa leas ob all me ciple dem fa true dat poson gwine git e payback wen jedus done tell e ciple dem wa dey spose fa do e lef dey an gone ta dey town fa teach an tell de people de good nyews now den wen john wa been een de jailhouse yeh bout dem ting dat jedus christ beena do e sen e ciple dem ta jedus dey aks jedus say ya de messiah wa been gwine come or we spose fa look fa noda poson jedus tell um say oona mus go back an tell john wa oona da yeh an wa oona da see de people wa been bline dey kin see de cripple op people da waak dem wa hab leposy dey clean now de deef people able fa yeh an dem wa done dead git op an lib gin an de po people da yeh de good nyews de one wa ain loss e fait een me e bless fa true now wen dem ciple ob john beena gwine back jedus tell de great crowd bout john e say wen oona gone ta john een de wildaness wa ya been spect fa see ya spect fa see a piece ob grass wa da bend down wen de breeze da blow no ya ain gone fa see dat den wa ya gone fa see ya gone fa see a man dress op een fine cloes no ya ain gone fa see dat cause dem wa dress op een fine cloes dey lib een house wa blongst ta king dem bot fa true wa ya gone fa see ya gone fa see a prophet ainty an a da tell oona de trute oona done see de man wa mo greata den all de oda prophet dem john de one dey write bout een god wod say a gwine sen me messenja fa go head ob ya fa cleah de road an mek um ready fa ya a da tell oona fa true john wa bactize e mo greata den all de people wa eba lib stillyet de poson wa leas ob all dem people wa god da rule dat poson mo greata den john fom de time wen john wa bactize tell people bout god rule op til now dey been plenty people da fight ginst god rule fa tek um way all de prophet dem an de law wa god gii moses op til john come dey all taak bout god rule an ef oona wahn fa bleebe wa dey tell oona john de man wa dey beena taak bout wen dey say elijah gwine come back oona wa got yea fa yeh oona mus yeh wa a say jedus say de people dat lib een dis day yah wa kin a say dey like dem people stan like chullun wa da seddown ta de maakut dey da holla ta oda chullun say we done play music fa oona bot oona ain dance we done sing sompin saaful bot oona ain cry wen john come e fast fa woshup god an e ain drink no wine an dey say dat man got ebil sperit eenside um now wen de man wa come fom god come e da nyam an drink an dey say look yah dat man da stuff e gut an e a dronka dem people wa da geda tax an dem oda people wa ain fit fa mix wid jew people dem e fren stillyet dem wa da waak scraight wid god dey gwine show dat god wise fa true den jedus staat fa buke de people wa lib dey een dem town weh e beena do mos all ob e great miracle cause dey ain change dey sinful way e say e gwine be a haad time fa oona wa lib een chorazin an een bethsaida cause ef de people wa lib een tyre an sidon been see dem miracle wa a beena do fa oona dey been gwine change dey sinful way dey been gwine weah croka sack an rub ashesh pon dey head an seddown fa leh ebrybody know dey done change dey way a da tell oona wen de jedgiment day come an god da jedge all de people oona gwine suffa mo den dem people een tyre an sidon an oona wa lib dey een capernaum oona tink say oona gwine git lif op ta heaben ainty no oona gwine git shrow down ta hell ef de people wa beena lib een sodom been see dem miracle wa a beena do fa oona sodom been gwine still been dey eben op til now a da tell oona fa true wen de jedgiment day come an god da jedge all de people oona gwine suffa mo den dem people een sodom dat same time dey jedus say fada ya de lawd ya da rule heaben an ya da rule dis wol a tank ya cause ya done hide dese ting fom dem wa tink say dey wise an hab plenty laanin an ya done show dese ting ta dem wa ain hab no laanin yeah fada e been ya good pledja fa do um like dis jedus tell de people say me fada done gii me powa oba ebryting ain nobody know de son cep fa de fada an ain nobody know de fada cep fa de son an dem wa de son pick fa mek um know de fada come ta me all oona wa weary an da tote hebby load come an a gwine gii oona res jes like de ox tek dey wood yoke pon dey shoulda tek me yoke pon ya leh me laan ya cause a da beah wid ya an a hab a humble haat ef ya come ta me like dat ya gwine git res fa ya soul de yoke wa a gii ya ain haad fa beah an de load a gii ya ain hebby tall jurin dat time jedus dem beena waak shru de wheat fiel pon one jew woshup day e ciple dem been hongry so dey pick some wheat an nyam um wen some pharisee see dat dey tell jedus say look yah oona ciple dem da do wa de jew law say we ain spose fa do pon de woshup day jedus tell um say a mos sho oona done read wa king david done wen e an de man dem wid um been hongry ainty david gone eenside god house an e an dem wid um been nyam de bread dat de jew priest dem done been gii ta god stillyet we law say nobody spose fa nyam dat bread cep de priest dem an a mos sho dat oona done read de law wa god gii moses wa taak bout how de priest dem een god house kin do wa de law say we ain spose fa do pon de woshup day stillyet dey ain done nottin bad ainty a da tell oona fa true dey sompin yah wa mo greata den god house dey write een god book say a wahn oona fa hab mussy pon oda people a ain wahn dem animal sacrifice dat oona da mek ef oona been know wa dem wod yah mean oona ain been gwine condemn people wa ain done nottin bad cause de man wa come fom god e de lawd ob de woshup day jedus lef dey an gone ta dey jew meetin house one man been dey an e han been flicted dey been wahn fa cuse jedus say e da do wrong so dey aks jedus say ain e ginst we law fa heal somebody pon de woshup day jedus ansa um say sposin one ob oona got a sheep wa fall eenta a big hole pon de woshup day ya gwine grab hole ta dat sheep an pull um outta dat hole ainty a man way mo walyable den a sheep so den we law leh we do good pon de woshup day den jedus tell de man wa han been flicted say scretch out ya han de man do wa jedus tell um an e han git well gin same like de oda one bot de pharisee dem lef dey an meet fa study how dey gwine kill jedus jedus know dey da plan fa kill um so e gone way fom dey an a whole heapa people beena folla um an e heal all dem wa been sick e waan de people chaage um say mus dohn tell nobody bout me wen jedus do dis e mek come true wa de prophet isaiah done say dis yah me saabant wa a done pick fa do me wok a lob um an a sho please wid um a gwine pit me sperit eenside um an e gwine tell all people god gwine sabe um e ain gwine aagy e ain gwine holla e ain gwine taak loud een de screet e ain gwine broke off a reed wa done bend oba an e ain gwine pit out a lamp wa da flicka e gwine keep on til wa god say gwine win out oba all an all people gwine pit dey hope een um some people bring one man ta jedus wa been bline an ain able fa taak cause a ebil sperit been dey eenside um jedus mek de man well so dat e able fa taak an see all de people dey been stonish an dey aks one noda say dis man yah ya tink e de son ob david wen de pharisee dem yeh bout dat dey say dat jes de debil beelzebub de leada ob de ebil sperit dem wa da gii dis man jedus de powa fa dribe out ebil sperit jedus know wa dem beena tink an e tell um say ef de people een a country da fight ginst one noda dat country ain gwine las same way ef de people ob a town or a house da fight ginst one noda dey gwine soon paat an ef dem wa wok fa satan da fight mongst deysef satan rule ain gwine las ainty an ef beelzebub da gii me de powa fa dribe out dem ebil sperit whodat gii oona people de powa fa dribe um out no dem ting wa oona people deysef da do dey show dat oona ain right god sperit esef da gii me de powa fa dribe out ebil sperit an dat show dat god done staat fa rule mongst oona ain nobody able fa broke een a scrong man house an tief wa e got cep ef e fus tie um op den e kin cyaa off all dat de scrong man got een e house now de poson wa ain fa me e ginst me an e wa ain hep me fa geda people e da scatta um so den a da tell oona fa true say god gwine fagib ebry bad ting wa people do an ebry bad taak wa dey da taak bot god ain gwine fagib nobody wa taak bad ginst de holy sperit god gwine fagib people wa taak ginst de man wa come fom god bot god ain gwine fagib nobody wa taak ginst de holy sperit god ain gwine fagib um now een dis wol an e ain gwine fagib um een de nex wol needa ef ya got a tree wa good ya gwine git good fruit fom dat tree bot ef a tree ain no good ya ain gwine git no good fruit ya know de tree by de fruit e beah oona snake how oona gwine taak good wen oona bad people wa de haat full op wid dat wa de mout da taak de poson wa good e da pile op good ting een e haat an dat mek um do good ting bot de bad poson e da pile op ebil ting een e haat an dat da mek um do bad ting a da tell oona say wen de day come wen god gwine jedge de wol all people gwine haffa ansa ta god fa ebry wod wa dey done been say jes dry long so cause god gwine tek de wod dem wa ebry one ob oona say an e gwine nyuse dem wod fa sho ef oona guilty or ef oona ain guilty den some jew law teacha an some pharisee dem say teacha show we a sign bot jedus tell um say de people wa lib now dey wickity an dey ain bleebe pon god dey da aks me fa show um a sign bot a ain gwine do um dey ain gwine see nottin cep de sign ob de prophet jonah jes like de prophet jonah been shree day an shree night een de big fish belly same way so de man wa come fom god gwine be dey shree day an shree night een de groun wen jedgiment day come de people ob ninevah gwine condemn dese people wa da lib now cause wen de people ob ninevah yeh wa jonah say dey change dey sinful way an ain do um no mo an look a yah somebody way mo greata den jonah dey yah now wen jedgiment day come de queen wa nyuse fa rule een de sout e gwine stanop an taak ginst de people wa da lib now cause e trabel haf way roun de wol fom e country clean ta weh solomon been e gone dey fa yeh de wise wod wa solomon da say an look yah somebody way mo greata den solomon dey yah now wen ebil sperit done come outta a man e da trabel shru place wa dry fa find a place fa res bot e ain able fa find no place so den e say ta esef a da gwine back eenside de house weh a been wen e come back eenside de man e ain find nottin dey e find um jes like a house wa clean an scraighten op den de ebil sperit gone an git seben oda sperit way mo ebil den esef dey all come fa lib eenside dat man now dat man een a wossa shape den e been dat how e gwine stan fa dese wickity people wa da lib now jedus still beena taak ta de people wen e modda an e broda dem come ta um dey beena stan outside de house da wahn fa taak wid jedus somebody tell jedus say ya modda an ya broda dem da stan outside de house dey wahn fa taak ta ya jedus aks um say oona know who me modda an me broda dem fa true e pint ta e ciple dem an say look dese yah me modda an me broda dem fa true cause de poson wa da do wa me fada wa dey een heaben wahn dat poson me broda me sista an me modda dat same day dey jedus come outta de house weh e been an e gone seddown close ta lake galilee an de crowd wa geda roun um been so big dat e git eenta a boat an e seddown een de boat wiles de people dem beena stanop pon de sho den e tell de people paable fa laan um plenty ting e say one faama gone ta e fiel fa plant seed wiles e beena scatta de seed some fall long de pat an de bod dem come an nyam um op some seed fall pontop ob groun weh dey been heapa stone an dey ain been bot a leetle bit ob dort de seed sprout an staat fa grow quick cause de dort ain been deep dey bot wen de sun git hot e bun de leaf ob de plant dem dey root ain grow nuff een de groun an dey wilta some seed fall eenta de briah de briah grow op an choke de plant dem til dey ain been able fa grow an some seed fall pontop good groun an de plant dem beah some plant beah a hundud some beah sixty an some beah tirty time mo den wa e staat wid an den jedus say oona got yea fa yeh ainty den oona mus yeh wa a da say jedus ciple dem come ta jedus an aks um say wa mek ya tell paable fa laan de people jedus tell um say god gii oona de chance fa know bout dem secret bout how e gwine rule all people bot oda people ain got dat chance de poson wa hab sompin god gwine gim mo bot de poson wa ain hab nottin god gwine tek way eben dat leeleetle bit wa e hab dis hoccome a tell um paable a tell um so dat dey kin look bot eben dough dey look dey ain gwine see dey kin yeh bot dey ain gwine yeh fa true needa ondastan so dey da mek wa de prophet isaiah done been say come true oona gwine yeh an yeh bot oona ain neba gwine ondastan oona gwine look an look bot oona ain neba gwine see cause dem people git haad haat dey done stop op dey yea an cyahn yeh nottin an dey done shet dey eye cause ob dat dey ain able fa see wid dey eye dey ain able fa yeh wid dey yea dey ain able fa ondastan wid dey haat an dey ain able fa ton ta me fa heal um bot oona bless fa true cause oona eye da see an oona yea da yeh a da tell oona fa true say plenty prophet an plenty people wa waak scraight wid god been wahn fa see dem ting wa oona da see bot dey ain shim dey been wahn fa yeh wa oona da yeh bot dey ain yeh um now den oona mus listen yah ta wa de paable bout de seed mean de people dem wa yeh bot ain ondastan de wod wa tell bout god rule dey stan like de seed wa fall long de pat de ebil one come long an tek way de wod wa been dey een dey haat de seed wa faddown pontop de groun wa full op wid rock dat like people wa yeh de wod an dey glad fa bleebe um soon as dey yeh um bot dey ain got no root de wod ain down deep een dey haat fa true so dem people bleebe jes a leetle wile cause dey beena bleebe de wod dey git trouble an people mek um suffa so den dey lef tareckly dem seed wa fall eenta de briah dat like de people wa yeh de wod bot dey fret bout de ting dem dey got dey lob plenty ting an pledja een dis wol dem ting choke out de wod een dey haat dem people ain do nottin fa god dey crop dohn mount ta nottin bot de seed wa fall pon de good groun dat like de people wa yeh de wod an ondastan um een dey haat dey mek good crop some beah a hundud some beah sixty an some beah tirty jedus tell um noda paable say wen god da rule e stan like wen one man plant good seed een e fiel bot one night wiles all de people beena sleep dat man enemy come an plant grass mongst de good wheat seed wa de man done plant den e enemy gone wen de plant dem grow an staat fa beah people see de grass mix op wid de wheat plant dat man wa own de fiel e saabant dem aks say sah ya done plant good seed een ya fiel ainty weh de grass come fom wa da grow dey de man tell um say dat been me enemy wa done dat de saabant dem aks um say ya wahn we fa go pull de grass op e tell um say no cause wen oona da pull de grass op oona gwine pull some de wheat plant op long wid de grass oona leh de wheat an de grass grow togeda til haabis time come den a gwine tell de haabis wokman dem say oona pull de grass op fus an bun um den oona geda de wheat an pit um eenta me baan jedus tell um noda paable say wen god da rule e stan like one mustard seed dat a man tek an plant een e fiel now de mustard seed de leeleetles seed ob all stillyet wen e grow e git big mo den all de oda plant dem een de gyaaden e da ton ta a tree so dat de bod dem come an mek nes pon e limb jedus tell um noda paable say wen god da rule e jes like yeast a ooman tek yeast an mix um wid a big sack ob flour til de whole dough rise op jedus tell de crowd ob people all dem ting yah een paable e ain tell um nottin cep een paable e tell um paable so dat wa de prophet done say dat gwine happen wen e say a gwine tell paable wen a da taak ta de people a gwine tell um bout de ting dem wa dey ain been know fom de time wen de wol fus staat den jedus lef de crowd an gone eenta de house e ciple dem come an aks um fa tell um wa de paable bout de grass een de fiel mean jedus tell um say de man wa come fom god e de man wa plant de good seed de fiel dat de wol an de good seed stan like de people dem wa god da rule oba an de grass dat dem wa blongst ta de ebil one de enemy wa plant de grass e de debil de haabis time dat de time wen de wol gwine end an de haabis wokman dat de angel dem jes like dey pull de grass op an bun um een de fire dat de same ting wa gwine happen wen de end time come de man wa come fom god gwine sen e angel dem an dey gwine pull out all dem wa mek people sin an dem wa do ebil mongst dem wa god da rule oba de angel dem gwine shrow dem bad people eenta de hell fire an dey gwine cry bitta teah an grine dey teet den de people dem wa waak scraight wid god dey gwine shine same like de sun dey weh god da rule oona got yea fa yeh ainty den oona fa yeh wa a say wen god da rule e stan like one walyable ting wa dey done bury een a fiel fa hide um a man come find um an den e bury um gin fa hide um e so full op wid joy dat e gone an sell all e got den e gone back an buy dat fiel same way so wen god da rule e stan like one poson wa da look fa walyable bead fa buy wen e find one wa walyable mo den mos ob um e gone an sell all e got an e buy dat walyable bead same way so wen god da rule e stan like a fishin net wa people cyas eenta de wata an ketch all kind ob fish wen de net full de fishaman dem drag um ta de sho den dey seddown fa pick de good fish dem an pit um eenta dey bucket an dey shrow way de fish wa ain no good dat how e gwine be een de time wen de end come de angel dem gwine come an geda op de ebil people pick um out fom mongst dem wa waak scraight wid god an de angel dem gwine shrow dem ebil people eenta de hell fire dey dey gwine cry bitta teah an grine dey teet jedus aks um say oona ondastan all dis wa a done tell oona dey tell um yeah e tell um say so den dis mean dat ebry law teacha wa done laan de true ting bout god rule e stan jes like a poson wa own a house an e bring ting wa walyable outta e room weh e sto um ole ting an nyew ting too wen jedus been shru da tell dem paable e lef dey e gone back ta e home town e staat fa laan de people een dey meetin house an de people dem wa yeh um dey been stonish dey say weh dis man git dis sense an de powa fa do dem miracle yah ain dis de capenta boy ain mary e modda an ain james joseph simon an judas dem e broda ain e sista dem all dey yah wid we weh dis man git all dis sense an powa fa do miracle yah so dey ain wahn fa hab nottin fa do wid um jedus tell um say de people gii hona ta a prophet ebryweh cep weh e raise op at een e own town an een e own fambly dey ain gim no hona an cause de people ain bleebe een um jedus do jes a few miracle een dat place dey dat same time dey herod wa beena rule een galilee e yeh bout all wa jedus beena do king herod tell e saabant dem say dat man e john wa bactize e done dead bot now e da lib gin dat wa mek um git powa fa do dem miracle yah now den fo dat time king herod done been mek dem grab hole ta john an tie um op an pit um een de jailhouse king herod done dat cause ob herodias wa e been marry ta eben dough herodias been king herod broda philip wife cause john beena tell king herod say ain fittin fa ya fa marry ya broda philip wife king herod been wahn fa kill john bot e been scaid ob de people cause dey been tek john fa a prophet bot de day wen dey beena mek paaty fa king herod birsday herodias daughta come an dance fa herod an de people ta de paaty an king herod been too heppy fa e dance so e promise dat gyal an sweah ta um say ya mus aks me fa wasoneba ya wahn a da tell ya de trute a gwine gim ta ya herodias done been tell e daughta wa fa say so de daughta tell king herod say ya know john wa bactize a wahn ya fa gii me e head pon a big plate right yah de king been too saary bot cause e done been promise de gyal fa true an sweah ta um an de people ta e paaty done been yeh wa e say e gii orda fa dem fa gii de gyal john head so e sen e sodja fa go cut john head off een de jailhouse dey pit john head pon a big plate an bring um gim ta de gyal de gyal tek um gim ta e modda herodias an john ciple dem come an tek way john body pit um een a tomb den dey gone an tell jedus wen jedus yeh bout dat e lef dat place weh e been an e tek a boat ta a place weh nobody ain lib at bot wen de crowd ob people yeh bout weh jedus gone dey come out de town dem an dey folla um da waak by lan fa go ta um wen jedus come out de boat pon de sho e see de big crowd e feel saaful fa um an e heal dey sick people dat ebenin e ciple dem come ta jedus say sundown done come an nobody ain lib ta dis place yah ya mus sen way de crowd mek um go ta de willage dem fa buy deysef sompin fa nyam jedus tell um say dey ain haffa go way fom yah oona mus gim sompin fa nyam de ciple dem tell um say we ain got nottin yah cep fibe loaf ob bread an two fish jedus say oona mus bring um ta me e chaage de people fa seddown pon de grass den e tek de fibe loaf ob bread an de two fish e look op ta heaben an e tank god fa de bread an de fish den e broke op de bread an e gim ta e ciple dem an de ciple dem gim ta de people all dem done nyam til dey been sattify an de ciple dem geda tweb basket ob lef oba bread an fish bout fibe tousan man been dey an dat ain count de ooman an de chullun dem jes atta dat jedus chaage de ciple dem fa git eenta de boat an go head ob um ta de oda side dey fa cross oba de lake wiles dey beena gwine jedus tell de crowd dat e time fa go back home now atta e done sen de people home e gone op one high hill by esef fa pray ta god an wen ebenin come e been dey ain nobody been dey cep um now dat time dey de boat wid e ciple dem been out faaway fom lan de wata been so rough dat de boat ain been steady cause de wind beena blow ginst um so late een de night sometime atta shree oclock jedus gone out ta e ciple dem e beena waak pontop de wata wen de ciple dem see jedus da waak pontop de wata dey been scaid ta det dey say dat a haant an dey holla loud cause dey been so scaid jedus speak op fast e tell um say study yasef dis me mus dohn be scaid den peter tell um say lawd ef dat ya fa true mus chaage me fa come out pontop de wata fa meet ya jedus say come so den peter git out de boat an waak pontop de wata ta jedus bot wen peter feel de scrong wind e been scaid an e staat fa sink down eenta de wata e holla say lawd sabe me jes den jedus scretch out e han an grab hole ta peter e tell peter say ya ain bleebe pon me no mo den jes a leetle bit wa mek ya doubt den de two ob dem git eenta de boat an de wind stop de ciple dem een de boat woshup jedus an say fa true ya god son wen dey been cross oba de lake dey lan ta gennesaret de people dey been know jedus wen dey shim so dey sen wod all oba de lan dey an people come ta jedus fa tote all dey sick ta um de people beg jedus fa jes leh dey sick tetch de hem ob e cloes an all dem wa tetch e cloes same time dey tetch um dey git heal some pharisee an jew law teacha dem fom jerusalem come ta jedus an aks um say hoccome ya ciple dem ain do wa we ole people been laan we dey ain wash dey han fo dey nyam jedus aks um back say an hoccome oona ain do wa god law tell oona fa do fa sake ob wa oona ole people tell oona fa do cause god chaage we say ya mus show hona an be manisable ta ya fada an modda an de poson wa taak bad ginst e fada or e modda oona mus kill um bot oona say ef a poson got sompin e able fa gii e fada or e modda wa gwine hep um bot e say a done promise fa gii god dis ting yah oona say dat poson dey ain haffa show hona ta e fada an gim dat ting fa hep um dat show how oona ain do wa god law say oona jes da do dem ting wa oona ole people laan oona fa do oona hypicrit de prophet isaiah done tell de trute bout oona wen e say dese people yah da hona me wid dey mout bot dey haat ain dey wid me wen dey woshup me op dat dohn mean nottin cause dey da laan people fa do law wa people jes mek op dey say dat god law bot e ain so jedus call de crowd fa come ta um e tell um say oona mus yeh wa a say an ondastan e ain wa gone eenta poson mout wa mek um sinna een god eye wa come outta de poson mout dat wa mek um sinna een god eye den de ciple dem come ta um aks um say ya know dat de pharisee dem been opsot wen dey yeh wa ya say jedus ansa say me fada een heaben gwine root op ebry plant wa e esef ain plant oona fa lef um be dey bline people wa da try fa lead oda bline people an ef bline poson lead bline poson dey all two gwine faddown eenta de ditch peter aks jedus fa splain ta um wa dat paable mean so jedus tell um say oona stillyet ain ondastan wa a tell oona ainty ain oona see dat wasoneba gone eenta somebody mout e lef dey an gwine go eenta e belly an den come outta e body bot de wod dat come outta somebody mout dey come fom eenside e haat dat wa mek e sinna een god eye cause eenside een e haat a poson da study fa do ebil ting fa kill fa ramify roun an do wickity ting fa tief fa lie fa taak bad bout oda people all dem ebil ting come fom eenside a poson haat an da mek um sinna een god eye bot ef a poson ain wash e han dat ain mek um sinna een god eye jedus lef dey an gone way ta de arie close ta tyre an sidon one ooman wa beena lib dey wa ain jew gone ta jedus e been fom canaan dat ooman beg jedus say sah david son do please hab mussy pon me me daughta da suffa tommuch cause ebil sperit dey eenside um bot jedus ain gap e teet de ciple dem come ta jedus an beg um say sen dat ooman way e da folla we an da holla loud jedus ansa say god sen me jes ta de people ob israel wa stan like loss sheep den de ooman come kneel down fo jedus an say sah do please hep me jedus ansa de ooman say e ain fittin fa tek de food way fom de chullun an chunk um ta de dog de ooman say dat true sah bot eben de dog dem kin nyam de food lef oba wa da faddown fom dey massa table so den jedus tell um say ya a ooman wa bleebe fa true wa ya wahn leh dat happen de ooman daughta git well dat same time jedus lef dey an waak long de sho ob lake galilee den e climb op one high hill an seddown dey a whole heapa people gone ta um dey bring um people wa ain able fa waak dem wa bline dem wa cripple op dem wa ain able fa taak an plenty oda sick people dey pit um fo jedus an jedus mek um well de people been stonish wen dey yeh dem wa ain been able fa taak now dey da taak dem wa been cripple op dey well an dem wa ain been able fa waak now dey da waak dem wa been bline now dey da see an dey praise de god ob israel jedus call e ciple dem fa come ta um an tell um say a saary fa de people yah dey been wid me shree day an now dey ain hab nottin fa nyam a ain wahn fa tell um fa go ta dey house wid nottin fa nyam dey gwine pass out long de road e ciple dem aks jedus say weh we kin find nuff food fa gii ta all de big crowd yah fa nyam we ain able fa git no bread out een dis place weh ain nobody da lib jedus aks um say hommuch bread oona got dey ansa say we got seben loaf an few leetle fish jedus chaage de people fa seddown pon de groun den e tek de seben loaf an de fish an e tank god fa um e broke de bread an de fish op an gim ta e ciple dem an de ciple dem gim ta de people all de people nyam til dey belly full an wen de ciple dem gone fa git de food wa been lef oba dey geda seben basket full bout fo tousan man been dey an dat ain count de ooman dem an de chullun dem den jedus tell de people dat e time fa go ta dey house den e git eenta de boat an go ta de magadan sho some pharisee an some sadducee dem come ta jedus dey wahn fa test jedus so dey tell um say show dem a sign fa show dat god sen um fa true jedus ansa um say wen ebenin come oona kin say demarra gwine be fine cause de sky red an wen e day clean oona kin say e gwine be bad weda cause de sky red an daak oona know how fa look ta de eliment an tapetate bout de weda bot oona ain able fa tapetate de sign dem wa ya da see een dis day yah de people wa da lib now dey wickity an dey ain bleebe pon god oona da aks fa a sign fa show dat god sen me a da tell oona fa true a ain gwine show no sign cep fa de sign ob de prophet jonah so den jedus lef um e gone dey done cross oba ta oda side ob de lake bot de ciple dem been fagit fa cyaa bread wid um den jedus waan um say oona mus tek cyah mus look out fa de pharisee an de sadducee kinda yeast de ciple dem staat fa taak ta one noda bout dat say e say dat cause we ain cyaa no bread wid we jedus know wa dey da say so e aks um say hoccome oona da taak ta one noda da warry cause oona ain got no bread oona ain bleebe pon me haadly tall oona stillyet ain ondastan ainty oona ain memba wen a broke op dem fibe loaf ob bread fa gim ta fibe tousan man fa nyam memba hommuch basket full ob lefoba bread oona done pick op an wen a broke op seben loaf ob bread fa gim ta fo tousan man fa nyam how many basket full ob lefoba bread oona done pick op hoccome oona ain ondastan dat a ain da taak ta oona bout bread a beena tell oona fa look out ginst de pharisee an sadducee kinda yeast den de ciple dem ondastan dat jedus ain beena waan um fa look out fa de yeast wa dey pit een bread jedus beena say fa dem fa look out ginst wa de pharisee an de sadducee dem da laan de people jedus an e ciple dem gone ta de arie name caesarea philippi an e aks e ciple dem say who people say de man wa come fom god da dey ansa um say some people say ya john wa bactize oda people say ya elijah an some say ya jeremiah or one dem oda prophet fom way back den jedus aks e ciple dem say well den who oona say a da simon peter ansa um say ya de messiah de son ob god wa da lib faeba jedus ansa ya bless fa true simon jonah son cause no poson laan ya dis me fada een heaben e show ya an a da tell ya say ya peter an pon dis rock yah a gwine build me choch an eben all de powa ob hell ain neba gwine be able fa win out oba um a gwine gii ya de key dem fa weh god da rule wasoneba ya say ain oughta be een dis wol god gwine gree say dat dey ain fa be een heaben an wasoneba ya say kin be een dis wol god gwine gree say dat dey fa be een heaben den jedus waan e ciple dem say mus dohn tell nobody dat e de messiah fom dat time dey jedus staat fa splain ta e ciple dem say a haffa go ta jerusalem dey de jew leada dem an de leada dem ob de priest dem an de law teacha dem dey gwine mek me suffa a whole heap dey gwine kill me bot een shree day a gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin peter call jedus way fom de oda ciple dem an e staat fa buke jedus say lawd mus dohn leh dat happen dat ain neba gwine happen ta ya jedus ton roun an tell peter say git way fom me satan ya da git een me way cause ya da tink like people da tink ya ain tink like how god da tink den jedus tell e ciple dem say ef a poson wahn fa come wid me e mus dohn do jes wa e wahn fa do no mo e haffa tote e cross an folla me de poson wa da try fa sabe e life e gwine loss e true life bot de poson wa loss e life cause ob me e gwine git de true life wa good e do a poson ef e git ebryting een de whole wol an stillyet e gone ta hell wen e dead e done loss e true life ainty cause de man wa come fom god gwine come wid e fada god glory an de angel dem an den e gwine gii all people de pay fa wa dey done a da tell oona fa true some ob dem wa dey yah dey ain gwine dead til dey done see de man wa come fom god come fa rule oba de wol atta six day jedus call peter james an e broda john fa go long wid um dey gone pontop a mountain an jes dem been dey an wiles de ciple dem beena look pon um dey see jedus change right fo dey eye e face beena shine like de sun an e cloes ton white jes like a bright light all ob a sudden dem shree ciple see moses an elijah appeah da taak wid jedus peter tell jedus say lawd e a good ting we dey yah ef ya wahn a gwine mek shree bush aaba oba yah one fa ya one fa moses an one fa elijah wiles peter da taak a cloud wa beena shine bright cyas a shada oba um an kiba um op an dey yeh one boice come outta de cloud say dis yah me son wa a lob a whole heap a sho please wid um mus listen ta wa e tell oona wen de ciple dem yeh dat boice dey been so scaid dey faddown wid dey face ta de groun jedus come tetch um an say git op mus dohn be scaid so dey look op bot dey ain see nobody dey cep jedus wen dey come down de hill jedus chaage um say oona mus dohn tell nobody wa oona been see op dey til de man wa come fom god done git op fom de dead an lib gin de ciple dem aks jedus say den hoccome de jew law teacha dem say elijah haffa come fus jedus ansa um say fa sho elijah come fus an e gwine git all ting ready bot a da tell oona elijah done come bot people ain know um an dey beena do um jes how dey wahn fa do same way so dey gwine mek de man wa come fom god suffa so den de ciple dem ondastan dat jedus beena taak ta um bout john wa bactize wen jedus an e ciple dem git ta de crowd ob people one man come an kneel down fo jedus e say lawd a da beg ya hab mussy pon me son e ketch fits an da suffa tommuch e so bad dat heapa time e faddown eenta de fire an eenta de wata a done bring um ta ya ciple dem bot dey ain been able fa mek um well jedus mek ansa say oona people yah wa lib een dis time ain got no fait oona ain ondastan nottin hommuch mo longa a gwine haffa pit op wid oona den e tell de man say bring ya son yah jedus gii orda ta de ebil sperit wa hab de boy dat ebil sperit come outta de boy an jes den dat boy git well den de ciple dem come ta jedus way fom de oda people dey aks um say hoccome we ain been able fa dribe de ebil sperit outta de boy jedus ansa say oona ain got nuff fait a da tell oona fa true say ef oona bleebe eben ef oona fait ain no mo big den a leetle mustard seed oona kin gii orda ta dis high hill say come outta dey an go oba yonda an dat hill gwine moob ain nottin wa oona ain gwine be able fa do bot oona ain gwine be able fa dribe out dat kind ob ebil sperit cep oona pray an fast wen de ciple dem all meet op een galilee jedus tell um say dey gwine han oba de man wa come fom god ta dem wa een chaage yah dey gwine kill um bot atta shree day e gwine git op fom mongst de dead e gwine lib gin den de ciple dem been saaful tommuch wen jedus an e ciple dem git ta capernaum de people wa geda tax come ta peter dey aks peter say oona teacha da pay de tax fa god house ainty peter ansa um say yeah e da pay de tax wen peter gone eenta de house jedus taak ta um fus say simon wa ya tink bout dis who pay all de diffunt kind ob tax dem ta de rula dem een dis wol de beenyah people or de comeyah people peter ansa say de comeyah people ainty jedus tell peter say so den de people wa blongst ta de country ain haffa pay bot we ain wahn fa mek dem people bex wid we so go ta de lake an cyas ya hook out eenta de wata de fus fish wa ya ketch open e mout an ya gwine find one silba coin dey tek dat coin an pay um fa we tax jes den de ciple dem come aks jedus say whodat de big leada mongst dem wa god da rule jedus call one leetle chile an hab um stanop mongst um jedus say a da tell oona fa true cep oona change oona way an come fa be like leetle chullun oona ain neba gwine be wid god wen e da rule weh god da rule de poson wa humble esef like a leetle chile god hona um de mos an de poson wa heppy fa tek een a leetle chile like dis one yah een me name dat poson da tek me een too de poson wa mek one ob de leetle chullun like dis wa bleebe pon me do bad e mo betta fa dat poson ef dey been tie a big grine stone roun e neck an chunk um eenta de deep sea e gwine be a haad time fa de people een de wol cause ob dem ting dey wa da mek um sin fa true ting gwine happen wa mek people wahn fa do bad bot de poson wa mek dem ting happen e gwine hab plenty trouble ef oona han or oona foot da mek oona do bad ting cut um off an shrow um way e mo betta fa oona fa be cripple op an hab jes one han or one foot an git life wa neba end den fa oona fa keep two han an two foot an den dey chunk oona eenta de fire wa gwine keep on da bun faeba an ef oona eye da mek oona do bad ting oona fa pull um out an chunk um way e mo betta fa oona fa hab jes one eye an git life wa neba end den fa oona fa keep two eye an den dey chunk oona eenta de hell fire oona mus mek sho dat oona ain look down pon none ob dese leetle one yah tink say e ain mount ta nottin cause a da tell oona dat dese leetle one yah dey own angel dem een heaben da look pon me fada face all de time de man wa come fom god e come fa sabe dem people wa done loss dey way sposin a hundud sheep blongst ta one man ef one ob dem sheep git loss wa dat man fa do e gwine lef de ninetynine sheep wa safe dey pon de hillside an e gwine saach fa de one wa loss ainty an a da tell oona fa true ef e find um e gwine rejaice fa dat one sheep mo den fa de ninetynine oda res wa ain neba loss dey way same way so oona fada god een heaben ain wahn none ob dese leetle one fa loss e way ef ya broda da do ya bad go ta um an show um wa e do bad ginst ya bot ya mus tek um off ta de side ef e gree say e done bad ya done win ya broda back bot ef e ain gree wid ya ya mus tek one or two oda broda long wid ya an go ta um so dat two or shree poson gwine be dey fa know wa e been say ef dat broda ain gree wid wa de oda broda dem tell um den ya mus tell de choch wa e done bad ginst ya an ef dat poson ain gree eben wid wa de choch people tell um den ya mus treat um like poson wa ain bleebe pon god an like poson wa geda tax a da tell oona fa true say wasoneba oona say ain oughta be done een dis wol god gwine say dat ain oughta be done een heaben an wasoneba oona say kin be done een dis wol god gwine say dat kin be done een heaben a da tell oona gin say wen two ob oona een dis wol gree bout wasoneba ting oona da aks god fa me fada een heaben gwine do dat ting fa oona cause weh two or shree geda togeda fa pray een me name a dey wid um den peter come ta jedus an aks um say lawd how many time a mus fagib me broda wen e da do me bad a fa fagib um til e reach seben time jedus ansa um say no not jes seben time ya mus fagib
