been dey mongst de tomb dem an pon de hill e beena holla loud an tek stone fa cut esef e been a good way fom jedus wen e shim so e ron go meet um e kneel down fo jedus e holla loud say jedus ya de son ob god de god wa great mo den all oda god wa dat ya wahn fa do ta me a beg ya een god name mus dohn mek me suffa de man taak dat way cause jedus beena tell um say ebil sperit come out fom eenside dis man jedus aks de man say wa ya name de ebil sperit eenside de man ansa jedus say a name plenty plenty cause dey a heapa we an e beg jedus oba an oba fa dohn dribe de ebil sperit dem outta dat countryside same time a heapa hog beena nyam dey pon de hillside close by weh jedus been all de ebil sperit dem beg jedus say sen we ta dem hog leh we gone fa lib eenside um jedus gree fa leh um gone eenta de hog dem so de ebil sperit dem come out fom eenside de man an gone eenside de hog dem all de hog dem rush down de steep hill eenta de lake an dey been bout two tousan dem dey all faddown eenta de wata an been drown de people wa beena mind de hog dem ron gone tell de nyews een de town an oba de countryside so de people come look dey meet jedus an close by um dey see de man wa been hab plenty ebil sperit eenside um e beena seddown da listen ta jedus dat man been soba an e beena weah cloes wen de people see dat dey stonish den de people wa done see wa happen dey tell de oda people wa come fa look all wa been done ta de man wa been hab ebil sperit an bout de hog dem too so den dat mek de people staat fa beg jedus fa git outta dey country wen jedus beena git eenta de boat de man wa been hab de ebil sperit dem eenside um beg jedus say leh me go wid ya bot jedus ain leh um e tell um say go back ta ya house ta ya people tell um all wa de lawd done done fa ya an how e done hab mussy pon ya so dat man lef an gone all shru de arie wa dey call de ten town da tell wa jedus done done fa um an all de people been stonish jedus tek de boat gone back cross de oda side ob de lake dey ta de lake sho a bunch ob people come op roun um an one man name jairus come dey e been a leada een de jew meetin house wen e see jedus e come kneel down fo um e beg um say me leetle gyal sick ta de pint ob ob det please come pit ya han pon e head an pray fa um mek e git well so e ain gwine dead so den jedus gone wid jairus now sommuch people beena gwine long wid jedus dat dey beena crowd um fom ebry way one ooman been dey wa beena suffa too bad e beena bleed fa tweb yeah plenty docta done treat um da try fa heal um an e done spen all e money bot e ain git no betta stead e beena git wos mo an mo de ooman done been yeh bout jedus so e come op eenta de bunch ob people fa reach um an e tetch jedus cloes cause dis ooman done beena say ta esef ef a kin jes tetch jedus cloes a gwine git well so e tetch jedus cloes an same time de bleed done stop bam an e feel een e body e done git well ob e misery dat same time jedus know powa done gone outta um fa heal somebody so e ton roun ta de bunch ob people aks um say whodat tetch me cloes e ciple dem ansa um say ya see all dis bunch ob people da crowd ya hoccome ya aks who dat tetch ya cloes bot jedus look roun fa see who been tetch e cloes now de ooman ondastan e done git well so e come ta jedus e so scaid e beena shiba e come kneel down fo um an tell all wa done happen ta um jedus tell um say me daughta cause ya bleebe ya done git well go een peace wid quiet haat dat kind ob misery ain gwine come pon ya no mo same time jedus beena say dis ta de ooman some people come bring nyews fom jairus house dey tell jairus say ya daughta done dead so ya ain oughta warry de teacha no mo ainty wen jedus yeh wa dey say e tell jairus mus dohn be scaid jes bleebe den jedus gone ta jairus house bot e ain leh nobody go wid um cepin peter james an james broda john wen dey reach jairus house jedus see de people da mix op dey beena mek loud nise da cry an wail jedus gone eenside an tell de people say wa fa all dis mix op wa mek oona cry so de chile ain dead e da sleep de people mek fun ob jedus bot e pit um all outta de house cepin de chile fada an modda an de shree ciple dem dey all gone eenta de room weh de chile beena lay jedus hole de chile han an tell um say talitha koum een dey way ob taak dat mean me chile a tell ya git op same time de chile open e eye an git op e waak roun een de room e been tweb yeah ole dem wa been dey wid jedus been stonish jedus waan um say mus dohn tell nobody wa done happen den e tell um fa gii de chile sompin fa nyam jedus lef dat place an gone back ta e town an e ciple dem gone long wid um wen de jew woshup day come jedus gone ta de jew meetin house an staat fa laan de people bout god heapa dem wa yeh um beena stonish say weh dis man git dis sense who dat gim dis sense yah e eben do miracle dis man jes de capenta ainty ain e mary son an james joseph an judas an simon dem e broda ainty an e sista dem yah wid we ainty so dat how de people beena taak ginst jedus jedus tell um say people da gii hona ta a prophet ebryweh cep weh e raise op at een e own town an mongst e own kinfolk dey ain gim no hona dey een e own town jedus ain been able fa do miracle cepin e lay e han pon shree fo people head an heal um jedus beena stonish cause de people dey ain bleebe pon um jedus gone fom one willage ta noda da laan de people god wod e call e tweb ciple dem togeda an tell um fa go out ta de willage dem roun bout dey e sen um out two by two an e gim powa fa dribe out ebil sperit an dis yah how e tell um fa go e chaage um say mus dohn tote nottin wid oona cepin jes a waakin stick mus dohn tote food or a grip an no money een oona pocket e tell um fa weah sandal bot dey ain fa tote extry cloes an jedus tell um say wen oona da gwine eenta a town de fus house weh dey gree fa leh ya stay oona mus stay oba wid um til oona lef dat town ef oona go eenta any town weh de people ain welcome oona an dey ain gwine yeh wa oona say oona mus lef dat town an wen oona come out mus shake de duss off ya foot fa show de people dat dey done ebil so de ciple dem gone all oba da tell people dey mus change dey sinful way an dohn do um no mo de ciple dem dribe out a heapa ebil sperit an dey pit oll pon de head a heapa sick people an mek um well de nyews bout jedus spread all oba til king herod wa beena rule een galilee yeh bout um some people say dis yah john wa bactize e done dead bot now e da lib gin come outta e grabe dat wa gim powa fa do miracle oda people say no dat dey elijah an some oda beena say no e one a dem prophet same like way back dey bot wen king herod yeh bout all wa jedus beena do e say dat dey john wa bactize a done mek dem cut e head off bot now e da lib gin king herod say dat cause fo dat time e done been mek dem ketch john an pit um een de jailhouse e done dat fa sake ob herodias wa e done marry eben dough herodias been e broda philip wife john done beena tell herod say ain fittin fa ya fa marry ya broda philip wife herodias been hab bad taste een e mout fa john an e been wahn fa kill um bot e ain been able king herod beena scaid ob john cause e know john waak scraight an e been god own man so herod done all e able fa do fa keep john safe wensoneba e yeh john tell bout god herod warry warry bot spite a dat e glad fa yeh um now de time reach wen herodias git de chance fa do wa e wahn ta john one day king herod been mek paaty fa e birsday de king call all de big leada dem wa wok fa e gobment de aamy offisa an dem oda leada een galilee fa come ta e feas den herodias daughta come an dance fa de paaty e dance so fine dat king herod an de people wa ta de paaty been too heppy fa um so de king tell dat gyal say mus aks me fa anyting ya wahn a gwine gii ya um de king promise de gyal say a tell ya da trute a gwine gii ya anyting ya aks fa ef ya wahn a gwine eben wide op dis country a da rule eenta two paat an gii ya one paat so den dat gyal gone fa aks e modda say wa a oughta aks um fa gii me e modda ansa say tell um fa gii ya de head ob dat john wa bactize so de gyal mek hace gone back fa tell de king say a wahn ya fa gii me de head ob dat john wa bactize pon a big plate right now den king herod been too saary bot e ain been wahn fa broke de promise e done been mek cause e done promise de gyal an de people een de paaty done been yeh wa e say de king sen sodja fa go bring um john head so de sodja gone ta de jailhouse an e cut off john head e pit de head pon a big plate an bring um gim ta de gyal de gyal tek um gii e modda herodias wen john ciple dem yeh bout dat dey gone an tek way john body pit um een a tomb de postle dem come back meet wid jedus dey tell um all dey done an wa dey been laan people now so many people beena gwine een an out dey dat jedus an e ciple dem ain been git chance eben fa nyam so jedus tell e ciple dem say leh we gone way ta some quiet place an oona kin res a bit so dey gone out een a boat by deysef fa cross oba ta a place weh nobody lib bot plenty people done shim wen dey da gwine an dey know right way who dey da so dem people gone out fom all de town dey ron ta de place weh jedus an e ciple dem beena gwine fo jedus dem reach dey wen jedus git outta de boat e see dis big crowd ob people da wait fa um dey jedus been too saary fa dem cause dey been like sheep wa ain got no shephud fa mind um so den jedus staat fa laan dem people plenty ting wen de sun staat lean fa down jedus ciple dem come ta um say lawd ain nobody lib een dis place yah an de sun da lean fa down ya oughta sen de people ta dem willage an faam close by fa buy sompin fa nyam bot jedus ansa um say oonasef mus gim sompin fa nyam dey tell jedus say dat gwine tek all de money one man kin mek een eight mont time ainty ya wahn we fa buy nuff bread fa feed dat crowd jedus aks um say hommuch loaf ob bread oona hab go look wen dey find out dey tell jedus say we hab fibe loaf ob bread an two fish too jedus tell e ciple dem chaage all de people fa seddown by group pon de green grass some group ob bout a hundud head an oda group ob fifty head jedus tek de fibe loaf ob bread an de two fish e look op ta heaben an tell god say tankya fa de ration den e broke op de bread loaf eenta heapa piece an gim ta e ciple dem fa saab de crowd ob people e broke op de fish too an gim ta all dem all de crowd nyam til dey been sattify wen de ciple dem done geda op wa been lef oba dey hab tweb basket full ob bread an fish dey been a whole heapa people wa done nyam de bread an de fish jes de man dem been fibe tousan jes atta dat jedus chaage ciple dem fa git eenta de boat an cross oba de lake go head ob um ta bethsaida town wiles de ciple dem beena gwine jedus tell de crowd fa go back home atta e done lef de people jedus gone op one hill fa pray ta god wen night time come de ciple dem been een de boat out een de middle ob de lake same time jedus been by esef pon de lan de ciple dem beena row ginst de wind an jedus see dat dey beena hab haad time fa mek de boat go long cross de wata ginst de wind so late een de night sometime atta shree oclock jedus gone out ta dem e beena waak pontop de wata an e mek like e plan fa pass de ciple dem by wen dey shim da waak pontop de wata dey tink one haant da come by so dey holla loud cause dey all been too scaid wen dey shim jedus speak op fast e tell um say mus dohn be scaid dis me study yasef den jedus git eenta de boat wid um an de wind stop de ciple dem been too stonish cause dey still ain been ondastan fa true bout jedus powa eben wen dey shim tek de bread an feed a big crowd ob people de ciple dem haat been haad like rock jedus an e ciple dem done cross oba de wata ta gennesaret town weh dey tie op de boat wen dey git outta de boat de people know jedus soon as dey shim so dem people gone quick all oba de countryside wehsoneba dey yeh say dat jedus dey de people come ta um da tote sick people pon dey bed een ebry town an willage an settlement weh jedus gone de people come da tote dey sick ta um dey bring um ta dey maakut place an dey beg jedus fa jes leh dey sick tetch de hem ob e cloes an all dem wa tetch e cloes same time dey ain been sick no mo some pharisee dem an some jew law teacha dem fom jerusalem come geda roun jedus dey see jedus ciple dem da nyam dout wash dey han de way dey ole people say dey haffa do fa mek um clean een god eye cause de pharisee dem an all de oda jew people ain nyam nottin cepin dey wash dey han de way wa dey ole people been laan um fa do an wen dey buy ting een de maakut dey neba nyam um cepin dey wash dey han dat way an dey beena do plenty oda ting wa dey ole people been laan de jew people fa do like fa wash cup an pot an coppa bowl dat way de pharisee dem an de jew law teacha dem aks jedus say hoccome ya ciple dem ain wash dey han fo dey nyam hoccome dey ain do like how we ole people been laan we jedus ansa um say oona hypicrit de prophet isaiah done tell de trute bout oona wen e write say dese people yah da hona me wid dey mout bot dey haat ain dey wid me wen dey woshup me op dat dohn mean nottin cause dey da laan people fa do law wa people jes mek op dey say dat god law bot e ain so jedus say oona done stop do wa god tell people fa do an oona da do jes wa people tell oona fa do e tell um say oona tink oona hab good sense wen oona ain do wa god law tell oona fa do oona do like dat jes fa do wa oona ole people tell oona fa do moses done write ya mus show hona an be manisable ta ya fada an modda an moses say de poson wa taak bad ginst e fada or e modda oona mus kill um bot oona say ef anybody hab sompin e able fa gii e fada or e modda wa gwine hep um e ain haffa gim e kin say dis ting corban dat mean a done promise fa gii god dis ting yah an oona say dat poson ain haffa gii e fada or e modda de ting wa been gwine fa hep um dat show how oona ain do wa god say oona jes da do dem ting wa oona ole people laan oona fa do an oona da laan oona chullun same ting oona da do plenty oda bad ting like dem yah jedus call de crowd back an tell um say mus listen ta me good fashion so dat oona ondastan ain nottin wa gwine eenta poson wa mek um sinna een god eye wa da come outta de poson dat wa mek um sinna een god eye de poson wa hab yea fa yeh e mus yeh wa a da say wen jedus lef de crowd an gone eenside de house e ciple dem aks um wa mean dat wa e done say so jedus tell um say oona too ain ondastan wa a done tell oona ainty dat wa a poson nyam an drink ain able fa mek e haat bad mek um sinna een god eye cause dat ration ain gone eenta e haat dat gone eenta e belly an den come outta e body wen jedus say dat e laan we dat we kin nyam all kinda food an e say wa come out fom eenside e haat dat wa mek de poson sinna een god eye cause eenside een e haat a poson da study fa do ebil ting fa ramify roun an do wickity ting fa tief fa kill een e haat e da study fa sleep wid oda poson wife or husban fa cyas e eye pon oda poson propaty fa do all kinda wickity ting fa tell lie e da study fa tell lie bout people fa mek proud an fa do foolish ting all dem ebil ting come fom eenside poson haat an dey mek de um sinna een god eye wen jedus lef dey e gone way ta de countryside close ta de city dem name tyre an sidon an e gone eenta a house dey e ain wahn nobody fa know e dey bot de people find out one ooman beena lib dey wa hab daughta wid ebil sperit eenside um wen dat ooman yeh bout jedus e mek hace an gone an kneel down fo jedus de ooman ain been a jew e been bon een phoenicia een syria country e beg jedus fa dribe de ebil sperit outta e daughta jedus ansa de ooman say we haffa feed de chullun fus e ain fittin fa tek de wittle way fom de chullun an chunk um ta de dog de ooman ansa jedus say dat true sah bot eben de dog dem onda de table kin nyam de wittle lefoba wa da faddown wen de chullun nyam so den jedus tell dat ooman say cause ya ansa so good ya kin go back home now de ebil sperit done come out fom eenside ya daughta so de ooman gone home an e find de chile da lay peaceable pon de bed sho nuff de ebil sperit done come out fom eenside um den jedus lef de countryside close by tyre e gone shru sidon an de arie wa dey call de ten town ta lake galilee some people come ta um dey bring um one deef man wa hab hebby tongue de people beg jedus fa pit e han pon dat man head fa heal um jedus gone wid de man off by deysef way fom de crowd jedus pit e finga eenside de man yea e spit an tetch de man tongue wid e spit den jedus look op ta heaben an leh out a big sigh e say ta dat man ephphatha wa mean ya yea gwine open op dat same time de man been able fa yeh e tongue ain been hebby an e staat fa taak clean wid no trouble tall den jedus chaage de people say mus dohn tell nobody wa a done bot ebry time e tell um mo an mo dey beena tell people wa jedus done done all de people been stonish dey say e da do ebryting too good e eben da mek deef people yeh an e heal people wa hab hebby tongue so dey kin taak jurin dat time noda big crowd ob people come geda roun jedus wen de people ain hab nottin lef fa nyam jedus call e ciple dem e tell um say a saary fa de people yah dey been wid me shree day an now dey ain hab nottin fa nyam ef a tell um fa go ta dey house wid nottin fa nyam dey gwine pass out long de road cause some ob dem done come a good way e ciple dem aks jedus say weh anybody kin find nuff ration fa gii all dese yah people fa nyam we ain able fa git bread out een dis wildaness jedus aks um say hommuch bread oona hab dey ansa say we hab seben loaf jedus chaage all de people fa seddown pon de groun den e tek de seben loaf an e tank god fa um e broke de bread an gim ta e ciple dem fa han out ta de people an de ciple dem gii de people de bread dey hab few leetle fish too jedus tell god tankya fa dem an tell e ciple dem fa han um out ebrybody nyam til dey sattify an wen de ciple dem done geda de food wa been lef oba dey git seben full basket bout fo tousan people been dey den jedus sen de people ta dey house an e git eenta de boat wid e ciple dem an gone ta de place dey call dalmanutha some pharisee come ta jedus an staat fa aagy wid um dey wahn fa trick um so dey aks um fa do a sign fa sho dat god sen um fa true jedus leh out a big sigh an e say hoccome people dese wahn me fa show a sign a da tell oona fa true a ain gwine show oona no sign den jedus an e ciple dem lef dem people an git back eenta de boat cross oba ta de oda side ob de lake de ciple dem been fagit fa bring plenty bread dey been jes one loaf wid um een de boat wen dey gwine jedus waan um say oona mus tek cyah mus look out fa de yeast wa de pharisee dem an herod da nyuse de ciple dem taak ta one noda say e taak so cause we ain hab no bread jedus know wa dey beena taak bout so e aks um say hoccome oona da taak say oona ain hab no bread oona stillyet ain know oona ain ondastan ainty oona hab eye hoccome oona ain see oona hab yea hoccome oona ain yeh oona ain memba nottin ainty wen a broke op dem fibe loaf ob bread fa gim ta fibe tousan man dem how many basket full ob lefoba bread oona pick op dey ansa say dey been tweb basket den jedus aks um say an wen a broke op seben loaf ob bread fa gim ta fo tousan people how many basket full ob lefoba bread oona pick op dey ansa say dey been seben basket jedus say ta dem oona done see all dat stillyet oona ain ondastan ainty wen jedus an e ciple dem come ta bethsaida some people bring one bline eye man ta jedus de people beg um fa tetch de man an mek um well jedus tek de bline eye man by e han an lead um outta de willage den jedus spit pon de man two eye an pit e han pon um jedus aks um say wa ya da see de man look op an say yeah a see some people bot dey look like tree wa da waak roun jedus tetch de man eye gin de man look roun an pay close tention ta wa e see e ain been bline eye no mo e able fa see good an e see ebryting plain jedus chaage um say mus dohn eben go eenta de willage den e sen um home jedus an e ciple dem gone ta dem willage close by caesarea philippi wiles dey beena gwine jedus aks e ciple dem say wen de people da taak bout me who dey say a da dey ansa jedus say some people say ya john wa bactize some say ya elijah an some oda say ya one ob dem prophet wa come fom de ole people jedus aks um say bot who oona say a da peter ansa um say ya de messiah den jedus waan dem say mus dohn tell nobody bout who a da den jedus staat fa laan e ciple dem say de man wa come fom god haffa suffa plenty de jew leada dem an de jew priest leada dem an de law teacha dem gwine say dey ain wahn um roun people gwine kill um an pit um een de tomb bot atta shree day pass e gwine come outta de tomb an lib gin jedus tell um dat scraight ta de pint den peter call jedus way fom de oda ciple dem an e buke um say massa mus dohn taak like dat jedus ton roun an look pon e ciple dem an e buke peter say peter mus git way fom me cause satan wok same like ya da do yah ya da tink like how people da tink ya ain tink like how god da tink jedus call de crowd an e ciple dem e tell um say ef anybody wahn fa come longside me e mus dohn tink jes bout wa e wahn fa do fa esef e haffa be ready fa tote e cross an come longside me de poson wa jes da try fa sabe e own life e gwine loss um bot de poson wa loss e life fa do wa a tell um an fa tell de good nyews e gwine git true life de poson wa git ebryting een de whole wol an den dead an gone ta hell e done loss de true life ainty e ain git nottin ain nottin a poson kin pay fa git true life ef anybody shame ob me ef e shame fa taak bout wa a done laan um yah mongst de wickity people wa ain bleebe pon god een dis time de man wa come fom god gwine be shame ob dat poson wen e come wid de angel dem ob god een de glory ob e fada jedus tell um say a da tell oona fa true some ob oona wa dey yah now ain gwine dead til ya done see god come fa rule wid powa atta six day pass jedus tek peter james an john an gone way e lead um way op pontop a high mountain weh ain nobody lib wiles de shree ciple dem beena look jedus body change fo dey eye e cloes change ta shinin white white an too bright ain nobody een dis wol able fa mek cloes white like dat den de shree ciple dem see elijah an moses da taak wid jedus peter tell jedus say teacha e good we dey yah leh we mek shree bush aaba one fa ya one fa moses an one fa elijah peter ain been know wa fa say e an de oda two ciple dem scaid neah ta det den a cloud come kiba um dey yeh one boice da taak fom eenside de cloud say dis yah me son wa a lob a whole heap oona mus listen ta wa e tell oona jes den de ciple dem look roun quick bot dey ain see nobody dey cep jedus wiles dey beena come down de mountain jedus waan um say mus dohn tell nobody wa oona done see til de man wa come fom god done dead an lib gin dey ain tell nobody bout dat bot dey beena aks one noda wa jedus mean wen e say dat de man wa come fom god gwine dead an lib gin dey aks jedus say hoccome de jew law teacha dem say elijah haffa come back fo dem ting yah gwine be jedus ansa um say fa true elijah come fus fa git all ting ready stillyet hoccome dey write een god book dat de man wa come fom god gwine suffa plenty an people ain gwine hab nottin fa do wid um a da tell oona say elijah done come an de people done do um bad dey done all wasoneba dey wahn ta um an dat jes wa god book say been gwine happen ta elijah wen dey meet de oda ciple dem dey see plenty people geda roun um an some jew law teacha dem beena aagy wid de ciple dem wen de people see jedus dey been stonish plenty dey ron an tell um say e good fa see ya jedus aks e ciple dem say wa oona beena aagy bout wid dem law teacha one man een de crowd ansa say teacha a bring me son ta ya cause a ebil sperit hab um an e ain able fa taak ebrytime wen de sperit come pon um dat sperit chunk um down pon de groun foam da come outta e mout e da grit e teet an all e body git stiff a done beg ya ciple dem fa dribe out dat ebil sperit bot dey ain been able fa do um jedus ansa um say oona people wa lib een dis time ain got no fait how long a haffa be dey wid oona how long a gwine haffa pit op wid oona bring de boy ta me so dey bring um ta jedus soon as de ebil sperit see jedus e chunk de boy down wid fits de boy faddown ta de groun an staat fa walla an foam come outta e mout jedus aks de boy fada say how long de ebil sperit been hab ya boy de man say fom wen e leetle plenty time de sperit mek um faddown eenta de fire an eenta de wata da try fa stroy um please tek pity pon we an hep we ef ya able fa heal um jedus say ya aks me ef a able fa heal ya son god kin do all ting fa de poson wa bleebe een um de boy fada right way holla say a da bleebe hep me bleebe mo an mo wen jedus see dat mo an mo people da ron come geda roun um e buke de ebil sperit say ya ebil sperit wa da mek poson deef an so e ain able fa taak a chaage ya mus come outta de boy ya ain neba fa go eenside um gin de ebil sperit mek de boy holla loud e chunk de boy down wid bad fits an den e come outta de boy de boy leddown pon de groun like e a dead man an plenty people taak say e done dead bot jedus hole de boy han hep um fa git op an de boy stanop wen jedus reach de house wid de ciple dem way fom dem oda people dey aks um say teacha hoccome we ain been able fa dribe de ebil sperit outta de boy jedus ansa say oona ain gwine be able fa dribe out dat kind ob ebil sperit cepin oona pray jedus an e ciple dem come outta dey an pass shru galilee jedus ain wahn nobody fa know e dey cause e beena laan e ciple dem e tell um say dey gwine han oba de man wa come fom god ta people wa gwine kill um bot atta e dead e gwine lib gin e gwine come outta de tomb atta shree day now de ciple dem ain know wa jedus mean bot dey been scaid fa aks um wen dey reach capernaum jedus an e ciple dem gone eenside de house den jedus aks um say wa oona beena bicka bout wen we beena waak long de way dey ain say nottin cause wen dey beena waak dey beena bicka bout who dat mongst dem been de big leada jedus seddown an e call de tweb ciple dem e tell um say ef one ob oona wahn fa be oona big leada e haffa pit esef las an e haffa saab all ob oona den jedus tek a chile an hab um stan een de middle ob um e hole de chile een e aam an taak ta de ciple dem e say de poson wa heppy fa tek een a leetle chile like dis one yah een me name dat poson da tek me een too an e ain jes me de poson da tek een cause same time e da tek een de one wa sen me john say teacha we done see one man da dribe out ebil sperit by de powa ob ya name we tell um fa stop dat cause e ain been one ob we jedus ansa say oona mus dohn tell um fa stop cause nobody dat tek me name fa do a miracle kin say nottin bad bout me atta dat whosoneba ain ginst we e fa we a da tell oona fa true ef anybody gii oona a cup ob wata fa drink een me name cause oona blongst ta de messiah fa sho dat poson gwine git de good ting wa god gii ta dem wa saab um de poson wa mek one ob dese leetle chullun wa bleebe pon me do ebil e mo betta fa dat poson ef dey been tie a big grine stone roun e neck an chunk um eenta deep sea ef oona han da mek oona sin mus cut um off e mo betta fa oona fa hab jes one han an git life wa neba end den fa oona fa keep two han an go ta hell weh de fire ain neba gwine out oba deyso de woom ain neba gwine dead an de fire ain neba gwine out ef oona foot da mek oona sin mus cut um off e mo betta fa oona fa be cripple op an git life wa neba end den fa oona fa keep two foot an den dey chunk oona eenta hell oba deyso dem woom wa neba dead gwine keep on da nyam de people an de fire neba gwine out ef oona eye da mek oona sin mus pull um out e mo betta fa oona fa hab jes one eye an go eenta de place weh god da rule den fa oona fa keep two eye an den dey chunk oona eenta hell oba deyso de woom neba gwine dead an de fire neba gwine out fire gwine mek all people clean same like salt kin mek dem ting wa dey da sacrifice clean salt a good ting bot ef de salt done loss e taste dey ain nottin we kin do ta um fa mek um git back e taste ainty oona mus be like salt mongst oonasef oona mus lib peaceable wid one noda jedus lef dey an gone ta judea lan den e cross oba de jerden riba plenty plenty people geda roun um gin dey an e laan um bout god same like how e done beena do some pharisee dem come quizzit um dey beena try fa ketch um da taak ginst god law dey aks jedus say coddin ta we jew law e right fa man fa worce e wife jedus aks um say wa de law wa moses gii oona chaage oona fa do de pharisee dem ansa jedus say moses say a man kin write paper fa gii ta e wife fa worce um den de man kin sen um way jedus tell um say moses write dat law fa oona cause oona haat haad bot fom wen e fus mek de wol god mek two kind ob people man an ooman cause ob dat de man gwine lef e fada an e modda an jine wid e wife an dem two gwine come fa be one poson so dey ain two poson no mo dem two done come fa be one poson so den wen god done jine dem togeda mus dohn nobody tek dem paat fom one noda now wen jedus an e ciple dem gone back eenta de house e ciple dem aks um bout wa e been say bout worce e ansa um say ef a man worce e wife an den e go marry oda ooman dat man sin ginst e fus wife cause e da sleep wid oda ooman same way so ef a ooman worce e husban an den e go marry oda man dat ooman sin ginst e fus husban cause e da sleep wid oda man some people come bring chullun ta jedus fa hab um pit e han pon dey head fa bless um bot e ciple dem buke de people tell um dey ain oughta bodda jedus so wen jedus see wa e ciple dem beena do e been mad down e tell e ciple dem say oona mus leh de chullun come ta me mus dohn stop um cause people like dem chullun yah gwine be wid god wen e da rule a da tell oona de trute anybody wa ain wahn fa hab god rule oba um same like dem chullun dat poson dey ain gwine be wid god wen e da rule den jedus pick op de chullun an e pit e han pon dey head an aks god fa bless um wiles jedus beena gwine way one man ron meet um an kneel down fo um e tell jedus say teacha ya wa good tell me wa a haffa do fa git life wa neba end jedus ansa um say hoccome ya say a good ain nobody good cep fa god ya know de law wa moses gii ya mus dohn kill nobody ya mus dohn sleep wid oda man wife mus dohn tief mus dohn lie bout wa oda people done mus dohn cheat mus pay mind ta ya fada an ya modda de man ansa say teacha a done keep all dem law eba since a been a chile jedus look pon de man an e like um an e tell um say jes one ting lef wa ya ain done yet mus go sell all ya hab an gii de money ta de people wa ain hab nottin ef ya do dat ya gwine be rich fa true een heaben an atta dat ya mus come be me ciple wen de man yeh wa jedus say e look sad e been too saary cause e been hab a whole heapa money e lef jedus an gone way jedus look roun pon e ciple dem tell um say e sho nuff haad fa a rich poson fa come onda god rule de ciple dem been stonish wen jedus say dat bot jedus tell um gin say me chullun e sho nuff haad fa a rich poson fa come onda god rule e mo easy fa mek de camel go shru a needle eye den fa a rich poson fa come onda god rule den de ciple dem been eben mo stonish dey aks one noda say ef dat so e stan ain nobody gwine be sabe ainty jedus look pon um an say god able fa do wa people ain able fa do god able fa do all ting peter tell jedus say look yah we done lef ebryting an folla longside ya jedus ansa say a da tell oona fa true de poson wa done lef e house or broda or sista or modda or fada or chullun or propaty fa sake a me an de good nyews god gwine gim hundud time mo den wa e done lef e gwine gim house broda sista modda chullun an propaty god gwine gim now wiles e da lib yah een dis wol an people gwine mek um suffa bad yah bot god gwine gim life wa neba end een de wol wa gwine come bot plenty wa fus now dey gwine be las an plenty people wa las now dey gwine be fus wiles dey beena trabel long de road ta jerusalem jedus waak een front ob e ciple dem dey been stonish tommuch an de people wa beena come long wid um been scaid jedus call e ciple dem ta one side an tell um gin bout wa gwine happen ta um e say oona listen ta me we da gwine ta jerusalem weh some people gwine grab hole ta de man wa come fom god dey gwine han um oba gim ta de jew priest leada dem an de jew law teacha dem den dey gwine han um oba ta people wa ain jew fa kill um dem people gwine hole um cheap dey gwine spit pon um whip um an kill um bot atta shree day e gwine come out fom mongst de dead people an lib gin james an john wa been zebedee chullun come ta jedus say teacha we wahn ya fa do sompin dat we gwine aks ya fa jedus aks um say wa dat oona wahn me fa do fa oona dey ansa um say wen ya gwine rule all de wol een glory leh we seddown nex ta ya one ob we pon ya right han side an de oda one pon ya lef han side jedus say oona ain ondastan wa oona da aks me fa do oona gwine be able fa suffa wid me fa drink fom de cup wa a gwine drink fom oona gwine be able fa dead wid me fa be bactize like a gwine be bactize dey ansa say we gwine be able fa do um jedus tell um say fa true oona gwine drink fom dat cup wa a gwine drink fom an oona gwine be bactize same like how a gwine be bactize bot a ain hab de tority fa leh oona seddown pon me right han side an pon me lef han side wen a gwine rule god done keep dem place fa de people wa e done pick fa seddown dey wen de oda ten ciple yeh bout dat dey been too bex at james an john cause ob wa dey been aks jedus fa do fa um jedus call um all togeda an tell um say oona know bout de leada dem wa spose fa rule oba de people dey een de wol dem leada hab powa oba de people an da tell dem wa fa do bot e ain gwine be dat way mongst oona ef one ob oona wahn fa be de head poson e mus be oona saabant ef one ob oona wahn fa be fus dat poson mus be ebrybody slabe cause eben de man wa come fom god ain come fa mek people e saabant e come fa be de people saabant an fa gii e life fa pay de price fa sabe a whole heapa people jedus an e ciple dem come ta jericho wen dey been lef jericho long wid a whole bunch ob oda people one bline eye man name bartimaeus beena seddown close by de road da beg e been timaeus chile wen bartimaeus yeh say dat jedus wa come fom nazareth beena pass by dey e staat fa holla say jedus son ob david hab mussy pon me plenty ob de people buke bartimaeus tell um mus dohn crack e teet bot e da holla mo louda say son ob david hab mussy pon me jedus stop tell de people say call um fa come yah so de people call ta bartimaeus de bline eye man say study yasef git op jedus say come yah bartimaeus shrow off e coat off e hop op an gone ta jedus jedus aks um say wa ya wahn me fa do fa ya de bline eye man say teacha a wahn ya fa mek me so dat a kin see jedus say ya kin go pon ya way now cause ya da bleebe ya done git well nex ting e know bartimaeus able fa see an e waak wid jedus down de road jedus dem come close ta jerusalem dey been dey by bethphage een bethany willage wen dey reach ta de mount olib jedus tell two e ciple fa go on fo de oda res e chaage um say oona mus go ta dat willage oba dey wen oona reach dey oona gwine see one nyoung donkey wa tie op dey nobody ain neba ride pon dat donkey mus ontie um an bring um ta me ef somebody aks oona hoccome oona da ontie de donkey mus tell um say de lawd need um bot e gwine hab we bring um back wen e done wid um so de two ciple gone an dey see de nyoung donkey tie op ta one house door dey een de screet dey staat fa ontie dat donkey some people wa beena stanop dey aks de ciple dem say hoccome oona da ontie dat donkey de ciple dem ansa um say jes wa jedus been tell um fa say so de people leh um tek de donkey an go de ciple dem tek de donkey come ta jedus wen dey git dey dey spread dey coat pontop de donkey back jedus seddown pontop um an staat fa ride eenta jerusalem a heapa people spread dey coat pon de road weh jedus pass some oda people broke off branch fom de tree dem close by een de fiel an spread um pon de road de people wa beena waak fo jedus an dem wa come hine um beena holla say praise god god bless de one wa come een de lawd name god bless de gobment wa da come e gwine be same like de gobment wa we ole time leada david done rule oba praise god een heaben jedus gone eenta jerusalem an eenta god house e look roun at ebryting dey bot de sun beena set fa red so e an e tweb ciple dem gone out ta bethany willage de nex day wen dey come back fom bethany jedus been hongry e look cross de way an e see one fig tree wa been git plenty leaf so jedus gone look fa see ef de tree da beah fig wen e come close by um e see dey ain been no fig pon um jes de leaf da kiba um cause e ain been de time yet fa beah fig jedus taak ta de tree say ya mus dohn beah fig no mo fa nobody fa nyam an e ciple dem yeh jedus say dat ta dat tree wen jedus dem git ta jerusalem jedus gone eenta god house e staat fa dribe out de people dey wa beena buy an sell ting e ton oba de table dem weh people beena mek change fa de money ob people fom oda lan an e ton oba de bench dem weh people come fa seddown wen dey sell pigeon e ain leh nobody tote nottin fa sell wen dey pass shru de yaad ob god house den e laan de people say fa true dey done write een god book say dey gwine call me house de place weh people wa come fom all oba de wol come fa pray ta god bot oona done ton um eenta place weh de tief dem da hide wen de jew priest leada dem an de jew law teacha dem yeh wa jedus beena say dey staat fa look fa way fa kill um dey been scaid ob um cause all de crowd ob people been stonish wen dey yeh wa jedus teach wen de sun set fa red jedus an e ciple dem come outta de city de nex maanin wen jedus dem beena gwine long de road dey see de fig tree all dat tree done dry op an dead fom de bottom root op ta de top de tree peter memba wa been happen an e tell jedus say teacha look dey dat fig tree wa ya been cuss e dead jedus ansa um say mus hab fait een god a da tell oona ef somebody tell dis mountain yah say mus git op an go shrow yasef eenta de sea dat wa gwine happen ef dat poson ain doubt een e haat ef e bleebe fa true dat wa e say gwine happen so den a da tell oona say wen ya aks god fa sompin mus bleebe fa true dat ya gwine git um an god gwine gim ta ya wensoneba ya da stan an pray ta god mus paadon de poson wa done ya bad den oona fada god wa dey een heaben gwine paadon oona fa de ebil ting wa oona done ef oona ain paadon oda people den oona fada wa dey een heaben ain gwine paadon oona fa de ebil ting wa oona done jedus an e ciple dem come back ta jerusalem an jedus beena waak een god house de jew priest leada dem an jew law teacha dem an oda jew leada come ta jedus dey aks um say wa right ya hab fa do dem ting yah who dat gii ya de tority fa do um jedus ansa say a gwine aks oona one queshon ef oona ansa me a gwine tell oona who dat gii me de tority fa do dem ting yah mus tell me say who dat gii john de tority fa come bactize people god gii john tority or some poson gim de tority de leada dem bicka mongst deysef say ef we ansa say god gii john tority jedus gwine aks we say hoccome oona ain bleebe john bot we mus dohn say some poson gii john de tority dey been scaid fa say dat cause all de people bleebe say john been a true prophet so dey ansa jedus say we ain know who dat gii john tority jedus tell um say den a ain gwine tell oona who dat gii me de tority fa do dem ting yah jedus staat fa tell dem paable e say one man plant plenty grapewine een e gyaaden e mek stone wall roun de gyaaden e mek a hole fa mash op de grape fa git de grape juice an e build a place pontop de stone wall fa people fa keep gyaad oba de gyaaden den e hire some faama dem fa tek cyah ob de gyaaden an e gone way trabel ta oda country wen haabis time come de man wa own de grapewine sen e wokman fa aks de faama dem fa gim de owna paat ob de haabis bot dem faama grab hole ta de wokman an beat op pon um an dribe um outta de gyaaden dey ain gim nottin de man wa own de gyaaden sen oda wokman bot de faama dem beat um een de head an shame um de owna sen noda wokman dey kill dat one de owna sen plenty oda dey beat op pon some ob dem an dey kill some ob dem so den de owna hab one poson lef fa sen dat e own son an e lob um a whole heap e sen um ta de gyaaden tink say wen dem faama see me son dey gwine hona um fa true bot wen de faama dem see de owna son dey tell one noda say dat de son dis propaty gwine be lef ta leh we kill um so dat de propaty gwine come ta we dey grab hole ta um an kill um an dey chunk e body outta de gyaaden den jedus tell um say oona know wa dat man wa own de gyaaden gwine do e gwine come kill dem faama an e gwine hire oda faama fa tek cyah ob de gyaaden fa sho oona done read wa dey write een god book say de stone dat de builda chunk out dat de stone wa portant mo den all de oda res de lawd mek um dat way an we tink dis a great ting wa done happen de jew leada dem try fa grab hole ta jedus an res um cause dey know dat paable wa e done tell been ginst dem bot dey been scaid ob de crowd ob people so dey lef jedus an gone way dey sen some pharisee an some ob king herod people ta jedus fa ketch um mek um say sompin so dey able fa cuse um dey come ta jedus say teacha we know ya da taak true an ya ain warry bout wa people tink cause ya da look pon all people de same ya da laan we de true way a folla god bot leh we aks ya one queshon e right coddin ta we law fa pay tax ta de roman rula caesar tell we ef we oughta pay um or ef we ain oughta bot jedus know dem hypicrit people done say dat fa set trap fa ketch um so e ansa um say hoccome oona da try fa tek wa a say fa trap me bring me a coin so we kin look pon um dey bring um de roman coin jedus aks dem say whodat hab e face an e name dey pon dis coin dey ansa um say dat caesar own pitcha an name dey dey jedus say well den oona mus gii caesar dat wa blongst ta caesar an gii god wa blongst ta god wen dey yeh wa jedus say dey um been stonish some sadducee people come ta jedus de sadducee dem been bleebe say people wa done dead ain gwine git op fom de grabe an lib gin dey aks jedus say teacha moses done write we law say ef a man broda dead an lef a wife bot ain hab no chullun de broda wa lef haffa marry de wida ooman fa hab chullun fa e broda wa done dead now den dey been seben broda de fus broda marry den e dead an e ain hab no chullun so den de nex broda marry de wida ooman e done dead too an ain hab no chullun same fashion de nex broda all de seben broda dem marry de one ooman bot dey done dead an dey ain hab no chullun den las de ooman dead now den all seben broda dem done marry dat one ooman tell we de day wen god gwine mek all de people wa done dead rise op fom de grabe an lib gin wish one dem seben broda gwine hab dat ooman fa e wife jedus ansa um say oona wrong fa true ainty cause oona ain know god book an oona ain ondastan bout god powa cause wen de people wa done dead rise op fom de grabe an lib gin dey ain gwine be marry no mo dey gwine be like de angel dem een heaben now den leh we taak bout how god da mek de people wa done dead lib gin ain oona read wa moses write wen e tell bout de bush wa beena bun bot ain neba bun op god tell moses say a de god ob abraham de god ob isaac an de god ob jacob oona sadducee wrong fa true cause dat tell we e de god ob people wa da lib e ain no god ob dead people one jew law teacha been dey an e yeh dem da aagy e know jedus done ansa dem sadducee good so e come ta jedus aks um say wish law great mo den all de oda law dem jedus ansa um say de law wa great mo den all de oda law dem say pay tention oona israel people de lawd we god e de onliest lawd ya mus lob de lawd ya god wid all ya haat an wid all ya soul an wid all ya mind an wid all ya scrent de nex law wa great mo den all de oda res say ya mus lob ya neighba de same way ya lob yasef dey ain no oda law mo greata den dem two yah de jew law teacha tell jedus teacha ya done ansa scraight ya done tell de trute wen ya say de lawd de onliest god dey ain no oda god ya done tell de trute wen ya say we mus lob god wid all we haat all we mind an all we scrent an we mus lob oda people roun we same like we lob wesef e mo betta fa do wa dem two law yah tell we fa do den fa gii god all we offrin an de sacrifice dem wa we da mek an all de animal dem wa we da bun fo god jedus know de jew law teacha ansa um sensible so e tell um say ya done come close ta leh god rule oba ya atta dat ebrybody scaid fa aks jedus queshon wen jedus been een god house da laan de people e aks um say hoccome de jew law teacha dem say dat christ de messiah e david son cause de holy sperit done mek david esef say de lawd tell me lawd say seddown yah ta me right han side til a pit ya enemy dem ondaneet ya foot david esef call de messiah lawd so how de messiah kin be david son dey been a big crowd ob people dey wa glad fa yeh wa jedus say wen e beena laan de people mo e tell um say mus watch out fa de jew law teacha dem dey like fa waak roun een day long robe een de maakut place so dat de people wa geda dey show um hona dem teacha like fa seddown een de mos portant seat een de jew meetin house an wen people call um fa come fa feas dey wahn de bes place weh de big leada dem sit dem law teacha like fa git hole ta de wida ooman dem propaty an dey da pray long pray fa mek people say dey good fa true god gwine punish um mo den e gwine punish oda people jedus been ta god house an e seddown weh e been able fa see de box weh de people da pit offrin money e beena look pon de people wiles dey beena come pit dey money eenta de box plenty rich people pit heapa money een dey den one po wida ooman come pit een two leetle coppa coin wa wot bout a penny jedus call e ciple dem togeda an tell um say a da tell oona de trute dis po wida ooman done pit mo eenta de offrin box den all de oda people dey all hab plenty ting an da gii jes a paat ob de money wa dey hab bot dis ooman done pit een all e money e gii all wa e been hab fa lib wen jedus beena come out fom god house one ob e ciple dem tell um say teacha look at dem fine big stone an all a dem fine buildin yah jedus ansa say oona see dem big buildin yah time da come wen dem all gwine faddown ain one stone gwine be lef pontop noda jedus gone ta de mount olib an e beena seddown dey weh e been able fa see god house peter james john an andrew come fa taak ta jedus paat fom de oda people dey aks um say tell we wa time dem ting gwine happen wa sign gwine show we dat all dem ting gwine staat jedus ansa um say oona mus tek cyah mus dohn leh nobody mek oona fool plenty people gwine tek me name an come ta oona dey gwine say a de messiah an dey gwine mek plenty people fool oona mus dohn warry wen oona yeh de nise ob waa close by oona an oona yeh nyews bout waa wa da faaway dem ting dey haffa be bot de wol ain gwine end yet one country gwine fight oda country an one nation gwine fight oda nation all oba de wol de groun gwine rumble een plenty place people ain gwine hab nottin fa nyam all dem bad ting dey jes de fus ting wa gwine come same like wen de fus pain come fa de modda wen e chile da bon wos ting dem gwine folla atta oona mus tek cyah cause oona bleebe pon me people gwine grab hole ob oona an tek oona ta de jedge dem een court dey gwine beat oona op een de jew meetin house dey gwine tek oona fo de gobna dem an king dem wa da rule fa dem fa jedge oona so den oona gwine dey fa tell dem de good nyews wa oona know bout me people een all de country ob de wol gwine yeh de good nyews fus ebry time dey grab hole ta oona tek oona ta court fa trial mus dohn warry bout wa oona gwine say mus dohn study bout dat fo de time come cause wen de time come wasoneba wod wa de holy sperit pit een oona mout dat wa oona mus say e ain gwine be oona own wod de holy sperit gwine tell oona wa fa say some man gwine han oba dey own broda ta people wa gwine kill um same fashion some fada gwine han oba dey chullun ta people wa gwine kill um chullun gwine fight dey own fada an modda han um oba ta people fa leh dem kill um all de people gwine be ginst oona cause oona bleebe pon me bot god gwine sabe ebrybody wa stanop fa me til de wol done end oona gwine see de horrible bad ting wa mek god place empty da stanop een de place weh e ain oughta dey leh oona wa da read ondastan wa dis mean wen dat time come de people een judea mus ron way quick ta de hill country ebrybody wa dey pontop e house mus dohn tek time fa go down eenside de house gin fa tek ting wid um ebrybody wa da wok een e fiel mus dohn go back ta e house fa tek e coat wid um een dat time dey e gwine be bad fa ooman dem dat wid chile an ooman wa hab leetle chullun oona mus pray ta god dat dem ting yah mus dohn happen een de winta time wen de rain come cause de people een dat time gwine suffa mo den people done suffa fom de time wen god fus mek de wol eben til now an atta dat ting like dat ain gwine happen gin bot de lawd done say fo han dat e ain gwine leh dem suffa too many day e mek de time wen dey gwine suffa be cut shot ef e ain done dat ain nobody been gwine lef een de wol wen dat time come wen dey suffa so bot fa sake ob dem people wa de lawd done pick e done mek dat time be cut shot so den wen dat time come oona mus dohn bleebe nobody ef e tell oona say look de messiah dey yah or look e oba yonda cause some people gwine come da lie say dey de messiah an some gwine come wa gwine lie say dey a prophet dey gwine do miracle an show plenty sign wa stonish de people cause dey wahn fa mek fool ob dem people wa god done pick ef dey able fa do dat so oona mus tek cyah a done tell oona all ting fo dey happen atta people done suffa all dem ting de sun gwine daak an de moon ain gwine shine no mo de staa dem gwine faddown outta de sky an de powa dem wa dey een de sky gwine shake come outta dey place weh dey been den ebrybody gwine see de man wa come fom god da come down een de cloud dem e gwine hab greata powa an bright glory light gwine shine roun um e gwine sen de angel dem all oba de wol fom one end ta de oda fa geda togeda de people wa e done pick fa be e own now den oona mus look ta de fig tree fa laan fom um wen de branch ob dat tree hab nyew life een de spring time an staat fa leaf out oona know summa da come soon same way so wen oona see dem ting wa a tell oona bout oona gwine know de time mos yah a da tell oona fa true all dem ting mus happen fo de people dead wa da lib now de sky an all de eart gwine pass way bot me wod ain neba gwine pass way ain nobody know de day ain nobody know de hour wen dem ting yah gwine happen eben de angel deysef an god son esef ain know jes de fada god e de onliest one wa know de time wen dem ting gwine happen oona mus pay tention mus tek cyah an pray ta god cause oona ain know wa time dem ting yah gwine happen e gwine stan like wen one man da gwine fa trabel faa way fom home fo e gone e lef e house ta e wokman dem e chaage um all tell um wa dey fa do one by one an e tell de watchman fa tek cyah fa pay tention all de time so den same fashion oona mus tek cyah mus pay tention all de time cause oona ain know de time wen de massa ob de house gwine come oona ain know ef e gwine come aaly een de night time een de middle night fus fowl crow or day clean oona mus tek cyah mus pay tention cause ef oona ain pay tention e gwine come all ob a sudden an find oona da sleep so dis wa a da tell oona ain jes fa oona bot e fa all people oona all mus tek cyah mus pay tention e been two day fo de jew holiday wa dey call passoba an de feas ob unleaven bread wen dey nyam bread wa ain hab no yeast de leada dem ob de jew priest dem an de jew law teacha dem beena try fa find way fa grab hole ta jedus fa kill um bot dey ain wahn de people fa know wa dey da do dey say ta one noda we ain oughta grab hole ta jedus now jurin dis holiday wen plenty people dey yah cause ef we do de people gwine fight fa jedus jedus been een bethany een simon house simon de man wa been hab leposy wiles jedus beena nyam one ooman come een wid sweet ointment oll eenside a jar wa dey mek fom alabasta stone dat been a spensiz ointment wa dey mek fom de nard plant de ooman broke de jar mout an pour de dat ointment pon jedus head some ob de people dey git bex dey say ta one noda hoccome dis ooman done waste de spensiz ointment like dat ef dey been sell dat ointment dey been able fa git heapa money fa um mo den wa a man kin mek een a whole yeah an den dey kin gii de money ta de people wa ain hab nottin an dem people buke de ooman bad bot jedus tell um say oona mus dohn buke dis ooman no mo mus dohn bodda um dat one fine ting wa e done fa me people wa ain hab nottin dey dey wid oona all de time an oona kin hep um wensoneba oona wahn fa hep um bot a ain gwine dey dey wid oona all time de ooman done done all wa e able fa do fa me e done naint me wid sweet ointment fa mek me body ready head ob time fa wen dey bury me a da tell oona fa true all oba de wol wehsoneba dey da tell people de good nyews dey gwine memba dis ooman an taak bout dis ting wa e done yah den judas iscariot one ob de tweb ciple dem gone off ta de leada dem ob de jew priest dem judas gone fa tell um say e gwine han jedus oba ta dem dey been too glad fa yeh wa e say an dey gree fa gim money so den judas staat da look fa chance fa han jedus oba ta dem e been de fus day ob de jew holiday ob unleaven bread wen de jew dem da nyam bread wa ain hab no yeast dey alltime kill lamb dat day fa memba de passoba how dey ole people done come outta egypt jedus ciple dem aks jedus say weh ya wahn we fa go fa git de passoba meal ready fa ya jedus sen two ob um tell um say mus go eenta de city weh oona gwine meet op wid a man wa da tote a wata jug oona mus go wid um wen oona reach de house weh e gone een oona mus tell de poson wa own de house say de teacha wahn fa know weh de room weh e gwine nyam de passoba meal wid e ciple dem den de man gwine show oona one big opstair room e done ready de room fa we an ebryting wa we need dey eenside dey an dey een dat room oona gwine git ebryting ready fa we fa nyam de meal fa memba de passoba de ciple dem gone ta de city dey find all ting jes like jedus done tell um so dey git ebryting ready fa nyam de meal fa memba de passoba wen sun done set fa red jedus an de tweb ciple dem come ta dat house wiles dey beena nyam jedus say a da tell oona one ob oona gwine han me oba ta me enemy dem one ob oona wa da nyam yah wid me now gwine do um de ciple dem been too saaful one by one dey aks jedus say fa sho ya ain mean me ainty jedus ansa say one ob oona tweb gwine do um one ob oona wa da dip e bread een de same dish yah da nyam wid me de man wa come fom god gwine dead jes like dey done write bout um een god book bot e gwine be too bad fa dat man wa gwine sell de man wa come fom god e been faa betta fa dat man dey ef e ain neba been bon wiles dey beena nyam jedus tek bread e pray tell god say tankya fa de bread e broke de bread an gim ta e ciple dem e tell um say oona tek dis bread yah nyam um dis yah me body den e tek one cup wid wine een um e pray tell god tankya fa de wine den e gii de cup ta e ciple dem an dey all drink fom de cup jedus tell um say dis yah me blood a gwine dead da sacrifice me blood fa sabe a whole heapa people me blood gwine show ebrybody dat god gwine do same like e done say e fa do wen e mek de nyew greement wid e people a da tell oona fa true a ain gwine drink wine gin til de time wen a drink de nyew wine een de place weh god da rule den dey sing one hymn an gone out ta de mount olib jedus tell e ciple say oona all gwine bandon me lef me lone cause dey done write een god book say god gwine shrike de shephud an de sheep gwine scatta bot wen a git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin a gwine go ta galilee head ob oona oona gwine go meet me dey peter ansa um scrong mout say eben ef all de oda ciple dem bandon ya a ain gwine bandon ya neba jedus tell peter say a da tell ya fa true dis same night fo de cock crow two time ya gwine say shree time dat ya ain know me peter ansa mo scrong mout say eben ef a haffa dead wid ya a ain gwine neba say a ain know ya an all de oda ciple dem say de same ting jedus an e ciple reach one place wa name gethsemane jedus tell um say oona seddown yah a gwine go fa pray jedus tek peter james an john wid um an jedus git too saaful an hebby hebby haat e tell um say me haat so hebby dat a feel like a gwine dead oona stay yah an pray mus dohn sleep e git down flat pon de groun da pray ta god e aks um say fada ef ya say e kin be a aks ya fa sabe me tek way dis time wa da come wen a haffa suffa an dead so jedus lef um gone a leetle way foda e git down flat pon de groun fa pray ta god an e say fada me fada ya able fa do all ting please sah tek way dis cup wa a fa suffa stillyet mus dohn do wa a wahn mus do wa ya wahn den jedus come back ta de shree ciple dem e find um sleep e tell peter say simon ya da sleep ainty ya ain able fa stay wake eben a leetle wiles jedus tell um say oona mus dohn sleep mus pray so dat oona ain gwine do ebil wen satan try fa mek oona do um oona wahn fa do de right ting bot oona ain hab scrent fa do um jedus lef um gin e gone on a leetle way e pray wid de same wod e beena pray de fus time den e come back gin an find peter james an john sleep dey ain been able fa keep dey eye open an dey ain know wa fa say ta jedus jedus gone way gin an pray wen e come back fa de shree time e tell um say oona stillyet da sleep an res dat nuff fa now de time done come look yah sinna man gwine han de man wa come fom god oba ta de enemy git op leh we go meet um oona look yah see de man wa da han me oba ta me enemy e da come yah now wiles jedus beena say dat judas one ob de tweb ciple dem git dey a bunch ob people been wid um da tote knife an big stick fa fight wid de jew priest leada dem de jew law teacha dem an de oda jew big leada dem done sen dem people wid judas judas done been tell dem people heada time how dey gwine know jedus e been say de man wa a gwine kiss dat de man oona wahn mus grab hole ta um tek um way wid gyaad roun um wen judas git dey e gone op ta jedus say teacha den e kiss um de people grab hole ta jedus an hole um tight one ob dem wa beena stanop dey dey by jedus pull out e knife e scrike de slabe ob de head man ob de jew priest leada dem dat man cut off de slabe yea jedus tell de crowd say oona haffa come wid knife an big stick fa grab hole ta me ainty a ain no tief ebry day a been dey wid oona een god house da teach bout god bot oona ain neba grab hole ta me bot all wa dey done write een god book haffa come true den all de ciple dem lef jedus an ron way one nyoung man beena folla long hine jedus dat man ain hab no cloes on cepin a piece ob linen closs an de people try fa grab hole ta um bot de man lef de closs een dey han an ron way nekid dey tek jedus ta de head man ob de jew priest leada dem eenta e house all de leada dem ob de jew priest de oda jew leada dem an de jew law teacha dem beena geda dey peter beena folla long hine jedus fom a way off e folla long eenta de head man yaad wen e reach dey peter gone seddown close ta de gyaad dem da waam esef by de fire de leada dem ob de jew priest dem an all de oda jew leada dem wa jedge een de jew high court beena look fa find some poson fa taak ginst jedus say e done ebil ting so dat dem leada kin kill um bot dey ain been able fa find nobody a heapa people tell lie ginst jedus bot dey ain mek dey story gree den some people stanop an tell dis lie ginst jedus dey say we done yeh jedus say a gwine stroy god house yah wa people done mek an a gwine tek shree day fa mek oda god house wa no poson gwine hep mek bot dem people yah wa say dat ginst jedus ain neba mek dey story gree needa de head man ob de jew priest leada dem stanop een front ob dem all e aks jedus say wa mek dem people yah say ya done dem ebil ting wa ya say bout dat bot jedus neba say a mumblin wod de head man ob de priest dem keep on da quizzit um e aks um say ya de messiah de son ob de god we praise tell we jedus ansa um say yeah a de messiah oona gwine see de man wa come fom god da seddown ta de right han side ob god wa hab all powa an oona gwine see me da come ta dis wol da ride pon heaben cloud de head man ob de priest dem bex fa true til e teah e cloes an say we ain need no mo people fa taak ginst um ainty oonasef done yeh de ebil ting e say ginst god wa oona say all dem leada wa beena jedge dey een de jew high court condemn jedus say e oughta dead some dem staat fa spit pon jedus dey tie a closs oba e eye den dey slap um an say guess who dat slap ya tell we de gyaad deysef tek um an beat um op peter been dey down een de yaad wen one de gyal dem wa wok fa de head man ob de priest dem come by wen e see peter da waam esef by de fire dey dey dat gyal look um dead een de face an say yasef beena gone longside jedus wa come fom nazareth bot peter say e ain know jedus e ansa de gyal say a ain know wa ya da taak bout an peter gone out close ta de gate same time a cock crow wen de gyal see peter dey e tell de people wa beena stan roun say gin dis man yah one ob dem wa beena gone longside jedus bot peter say gin a ain know um atta a leetle bit de people wa beena stan roun dey tell peter say fa true ya cyahn say ya ain one ob dem wa been wid jedus cause yasef come fom galilee peter say a da tell oona fa true leh god mek me suffa ef a ain taak scraight a ain know dat man oona da taak bout same time e say dat a cock crow noda time peter memba wa jedus done been tell um jedus done been say fo de cock crow two time ya gwine say shree time dat ya ain know me peter buss out da cry wen day clean broad de leada dem ob de jew priest dem de oda jew leada dem de jew law teacha dem an all de oda memba dem ob de jew council geda togeda fa mek plan ginst jedus dey mek de gyaad dem tie op jedus han an tek um way fa go ta gobna pilate pilate aks jedus say ya de king ob de jew people jedus ansa um say dat so jes like ya say de leada dem ob de jew priest dem beena cuse jedus say e done do plenty ebil ting pilate aks jedus noda time say ya ain got nottin fa say fa ansa um ya yeh all dem ebil ting wa dey say ya done stillyet jedus ain ansa nottin an pilate been stonish ebry yeah wen de passoba holiday come pilate nyuse fa free one poson wa de jew people wahn fom outta de jailhouse an jurin dis time yah some people done been riot een dat country an dem wa done kill a poson been pit eenta de jailhouse one dem een de jailhouse been a man name barabbas de crowd come geda togeda dey ta pilate yaad dey aks pilate fa leh one poson outta de jailhouse fa de people same like e beena do ebry yeah pilate aks de people say oona wahn me fa leh de jew people king go free e been know dat de leada dem ob de jew priest dem been han jedus oba ta um cause dey been jealous ob um bot de leada dem ob de jew priest dem chaage de crowd fa tell pilate dey wahn um fa free barabbas fom outta de jailhouse stead ob jedus pilate aks de people say well den wa a gwine do wid de man oona call de jew people king dey holla back ta pilate say kill jedus nail um pon de cross pilate aks um say wa fa wa ebil ting e done de people holla mo louda say kill um nail um pon de cross so fa mek de crowd heppy pilate leh barabbas outta de jailhouse e chaage de sodja dem fa beat jedus den e hab dem tek jedus fa kill um nail um pon de cross de sodja dem tek jedus eenta one yaad eenside ob gobna pilate bighouse dey geda togeda all de oda sodja dem dey cause de people call jedus king de sodja dem dress jedus een a purple robe fa laugh at um dey mek a crown fom bramble branch an pit um pon e head den dey hole um cheap hail um say leh de jew people king hab long life dey beat jedus wid a stick pon e head an dey spit pon um an dey kneel down fo um fa laugh at um mek like dey da woshup um atta dey been shru hole um cheap dey pull de purple robe off um an pit e own cloes back pon um den dey tek um fa kill um nail um pon de cross wiles dey beena gwine dey meet one man name simon wa been bon een cyrene e been alexander an rufus dem fada simon beena come fom de countryside da gwine ta jerusalem de sodja dem mek simon tote de cross fa jedus dey tek jedus ta a place dey call golgotha dat mean de place wa stan like man skull dey mix wine wid a medicine wa dey call myrrh dey gim ta jedus fa drink bot e neba drink um den de sodja dem nail jedus pon de cross dey shrow dice fa share jedus cloes mongst um see who gwine git wa piece e been nine oclock een de maanin wen dey nail jedus pon de cross dey write down de chaage dey been hab ginst jedus de chaage say de king ob de jew people dat same time dey nail op two tief each pon e own cross dey pit one cross pon jedus right han side an de oda pon jedus lef han side so de ting wa dey done write een god book come true wa dey say people tink say dat e mongst dem wickity man de people wa beena pass by shrow slam at jedus dey shake dey head an tell um say so dey ya beena say ya gwine stroy god house an tek shree day fa build um back op well den sabe yasef now come down fom de cross same way so de leada dem ob de jew priest dem an de jew law teacha dem beena hole jedus cheap shrow slam at um dey say ta one noda e been sabe oda people bot e ain able fa sabe esef leh we see de messiah de king ob israel come down fom de cross now so dat we kin bleebe een um de two oda man wa done been nail pon dey cross close by jedus deysef shrow slam at um e been high noon an all dat lan git daak daak e been daak fa shree hour at shree oclock jedus holla loud say eloi eloi lama sabachthani dat mean me god me god hoccome ya da bandon me some ob de people wa beena stanop close by de cross dey yeh wa jedus say dey say listen e da call elijah fa come hep um one ob dem ron go soak a sponge wid wine winega an tie de sponge pon de end ob a long stick den e hice de stick op ta jedus lip try fa git jedus fa suck de sponge e say hole on leh we see ef elijah gwine come fa tek um down fom de cross jedus holla loud an den e dead jes den de big tick curtain wa beena hang eenside god house split down de middle fom de top down ta de bottom de sodja dem leada wa beena stanop fo de cross see how jedus done holla out ta god an dead e say fa true dis man yah god son some ooman been stanop faaway da look some ob dem been mary magdalene an mary wa been de modda ob de nyoung james an e broda joseph an salome wen jedus been dey een galilee dem ooman beena trabel long wid um an hep um an plenty oda ooman wa done come ta jerusalem wid jedus been stanop dey da look e been de preparation day dat de day wen de jew people git ready fa dey woshup day an e been jes a leetle bit fo de sun set joseph wa come fom arimathea town been dey e been a big man een de jew council joseph beena look fa de time wen god gwine come fa rule dis wol an e ain been scaid fa go ta pilate an aks um fa jedus body pilate been stonish wen e yeh dat jedus done dead e sen call fa de sodja dem leada an aks um ef fa true jedus done dead wen de sodja dem leada tell pilate dat jedus done dead fa true pilate tell joseph dat e kin go git jedus body joseph gone buy some fine linen closs e tek jedus body down fom de cross an wrop um op een de closs den joseph pit um eenside a tomb wa done been dig outta de rock an joseph tek a big stone an roll um cross de tomb doormout fa kiba um op mary magdalene an mary wa been de modda ob joseph beena watch an dey see weh joseph fom arimathea pit jedus body wen de jew woshup day done pass mary magdalene an mary wa been james modda an salome gone buy spice ointment wa hab fine smell fa go rub um pon jedus body aaly een de maanin de fus day ob de week jes atta day clean broad dey gone ta de tomb wiles dey beena gwine dey beena aks one noda say who dat gwine roll way de stone fa we dat stone wa kiba de tomb doormout bot wen dey look op at de tomb dey see dat de big stone wa beena kiba de doormout done been roll way an dat been a big big stone wen de ooman dem gone eenside de tomb dey see one nyoung man dress op een a long white robe e beena seddown pon de right han side an dem ooman been stonish down de nyoung man tell um say oona mus dohn be stonish a know dat oona da look fa jedus fom nazareth wa done been nail pon de cross an dead e ain yah e done rise op fom mongst de dead people an e da lib gin look dis yah de place weh dey done lay um down oona go tell peter an e oda ciple dem say e da gwine fo oona ta galilee oona gwine meet um dey same like e done tell oona de ooman dem been all shake op an scaid dey come outta de tomb an ron way fom dey dey ain say nottin ta nobody cause dey been scaid down now den aaly een de maanin pon de fus day ob de week jedus done rise op fom mongst de dead people da lib gin e come fus ta mary magdalene mary been de ooman wa been hab seben ebil sperit eenside um wa jedus done dribe outta um atta mary see jedus e gone ta dem people wa beena folla longside um dey still beena cry out an moan cause jedus done dead mary tell um all wa done happen stillyet wen dey yeh dat jedus da lib gin an dat mary esef done shim dey ain bleebe wa e say noda time atta dat two man wa beena waak wid jedus beena gwine ta one willage wiles dey da waak jedus come ta um bot e look diffunt de two man gone back ta jerusalem an tell de oda res wa done happen bot dey ain bleebe dem man needa atta dat jedus come ta de leben ciple wen dey beena nyam e buke um cause dey ain been bleebe dat e da lib an cause dey been too haad head fa bleebe dem people wa done been shim atta e done git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin jedus tell um say oona mus go all oba de wol an tell all de people de good nyews bout me de poson wa bleebe de good nyews an git bactize god gwine sabe dat poson bot de one wa ain bleebe de good nyews god gwine jedge um dem people wa bleebe de good nyews god gwine gim powa fa do dem miracle yah een me name dey gwine dribe ebil sperit outta people dey gwine taak een nyew tongue ef dey pick op snake or ef dey drink pison nottin ain gwine hut um dey gwine pit dey han pon sick people an pray fa dem fa be well an dem people gwine git well wen de lawd jedus done taak ta e ciple dem god tek jedus op eenta heaben jedus gone seddown ta god right han fa rule wid um de ciple dem gone all oba da tell people de good nyews an de lawd jedus hep um gim powa fa do miracle so dat de people know dat wa de ciple dem say e true fa sho deah theophilus plenty people beena try fa write down all de ting dem wa we bleebe fa true wa done happen mongst we an all wa dey done write down dis de same ting wa de people dem dat been wid jedus wen e fus staat dey done tell we an dey beena preach god wod so honorable theophilus a figga since a done beena study bout dem ting good fashion fom de time dey fus staat a oughta write um down fa ya step by step fom staat ta finish a da write fa mek ya know all de trute consaanin dem ting wa dey done laan ya fa leh ya know dat all dis wa dey laan ya bout done happen fa true same time wen herod been king ob judea one jew priest name zechariah been dey e been one ob de priest dem ob abijah group an e wife name been lizzybet lizzybet blongst ta de fambly ob de head priest aaron too zechariah an lizzybet beena waak scraight wid god dey beena keep all de law ob de lawd an do ebryting e tell um fa do bot dey ain hab no chullun cause lizzybet ain been able an now dey bof been ole one time wen abijah group beena wok een god house zechariah beena do e wok dey da cyaa out de priest judy now den wen de priest dem wahn fa pick one ob um fa go eenside god house fa bun incense dey write all de priest dem name down fole de paper an pick one dis time yah zechariah name come out fa bun de incense so e gone eenside de lawd house fa do e wok same time de incense beena bun eenside god house de whole crowd wa been dey beena pray outside een de yaad den een god house zechariah see a angel dat de lawd sen dat angel stan fo um pon de right han side ob de alta weh zechariah da bun de incense wen zechariah see de angel e been opsot e mos scaid ta det de angel tell um say mus dohn feah zechariah de lawd done yeh ya pray an e ansa um ya wife lizzybet gwine hab son mus name um john ya gwine be glad fa true wen e bon an a heapa oda people gwine be glad cause e bon dat chile gwine be a great man een de lawd eye e mus dohn neba drink no wine or nottin wa mek a poson dronk an e gwine be full op wid de holy sperit eben fo e bon e gwine mek a heapa israel people come ta de lawd dey god e gwine go head ob de lawd an hab scrong sperit an powa jes like de prophet elijah wa done tell god wod e gwine mek de fada dem haat ton ta dey chullun an e gwine mek de people dat ain do wa god wahn memba god an ondastan wa right fa do e gwine mek de lawd people ready fa de time wen de lawd gwine come zechariah aks de angel say how a spose fa know wa ya say gwine happen a done ole an me wife e ole too de angel ansa um a gabriel a da stanop fo god da saab um e sen me fa come tell ya dis good nyews bot listen yah dis ting wa a done tell ya dat how e gwine be wen de right time come bot cause ya ain bleebe me ya ain gwine be able fa taak ya ain gwine crack ya teet til all wa a tell ya done happen all dat time dey de people outside beena wait fa zechariah dey wonda hoccome e stay so long eenside god house wen e come out e ain been able fa taak ta de people so dey figga fa true e been hab wision eenside god house e jes beena mek sign wid e han an e ain able fa say nottin wen e time been op fa wok een god house zechariah gone home atta wile e wife lizzybet been speckin an lizzybet hide eenside e house fibe mont e say de lawd been good ta me fa true an bless me fa be wid chile now e done tek way me shame so dat people ain gwine look down pon me no mo wen lizzybet been speckin een e six mont god sen e angel gabriel ta nazareth a town een galilee god sen um ta one nyoung ooman name mary e ain know nottin bout no man yet bot e been gage fa marry a man name joseph wa been one ob king david kin people dat angel come ta mary say how ya da do mary de lawd done bless ya fa true e da trabel longside ya wen mary yeh wa de angel say e beena trouble tommuch an e study e head fa try fa figga wa dat mean de angel tell um say mus dohn be scaid mary cause god heppy wid ya ya gwine be wid chile ya gwine hab son mus gim name jedus e gwine be great dey gwine call um de son ob de mos high god an de lawd god gwine mek um king fa rule jes like e ole people leada king david jedus gwine hab tority faeba oba de fambly ob jacob e gwine rule oba um faeba an eba mary aks de angel say a ain neba been wid no man so hoccome a gwine hab chile de angel ansa um de holy sperit gwine come ta ya de high god dat great mo den all e gwine sen e powa pon ya fa do dis cause ob dat people gwine call dis chile fom god wa ya gwine hab de god chile god own son fodamo lizzybet wa kin ta ya e wid chile eben dough e way too ole fa hab chullun e een e six mont now ebrybody tink say lizzybet ain able fa hab chile stillyet e gwine hab son cause dey ain nottin dat god ain able fa do mary tell um say a ready fa saab de lawd a ready fa saab um jes like ya done say den de angel gone lef um soon atta dat mary git ready e mek hace an gone ta a town een judea een de hill country e gone ta zechariah house an e hail lizzybet wen lizzybet yeh mary boice e baby eenside um jomp roun an lizzybet been full op wid de holy sperit e raise e boice loud tell mary say god da bless ya mo den all oda ooman an same time e bless de chile wa ya da cyaa a ain feel wody fa hab dis great ting happen ta me dat de modda ob me lawd come wisit me cause same time a yeh ya boice dis chile wa a da cyaa e jomp roun fa joy ya bless fa true mary cause ya bleebe de lawd gwine do all dat e done tell ya mary say een me haat a da praise de lawd god wa sabe me done mek me haat glad fa true e done memba me e humble saabant fom now on all people gwine say a been bless fa true cause god wa got powa oba all ting e done do great ting fa me e name holy fa sho e da show mussy ta all dem wa feah um fom one generation ta de nex e done show de great scrent een e aam e done scatta dem wa proud an mek um ron way e done pull down de mighty king dem fom off dey shrone an gii tority ta de humble e done gii plenty good ting ta dem wa hongry bot e done sen way de rich e ain gim nottin e done hep de israel people wa da saab um e ain fagit e promise e keep e wod wa e gii ta we ole people e show mussy ta abraham an all e chullun faeba mary stay dey wid lizzybet bout shree mont den e gone home de time come fa lizzybet fa go een an e hab son e neighba dem an e kin yeh say de lawd done hab mussy pon lizzybet e gim chile an all dem rejaice wid um eight day atta de chile been bon dey come togeda fa circumcise de chile dey been gwine gim name zechariah like e fada cep e modda lizzybet tell um say no e name spose fa be john wen lizzybet say dat de people tell um say bot ya ain got no kin people name john so dey mek sign ta e fada zechariah fa aks um wa e wahn de chile name fa be zechariah mek sign ta dem aks fa sompin fa write pon den e write down say e name john all de people been stonish same time zechariah boice come back an e staat fa taak e da praise god all de neighba wa yeh zechariah been scruck dey taak bout dis ting an de nyews git roun all oba judea een de hill country an all dem wa yeh dis ting study bout um say wa dis chile yah gwine be cause fa true de lawd powa been dey pon um zechariah john fada been full op wid de holy sperit an e tell god wod e say leh we praise de lawd de god ob de israel people cause e done come fa hep e people e done set um free e done sen we scrong poson wa gwine sabe we an dis poson blongst ta de fambly ob david de ole people leada wa saab god god own prophet dem dey promise fom way back dey say dis poson gwine sabe we fom we enemy e gwine sabe we fom de powa ob all dem people wa hate we god hab mussy pon we jes like e been tell we ole people e stillyet memba de greement wa e esef done mek wid um e promise we ole people leada abraham an mek a wow e say e gwine sabe we fom we enemy dem so we ain gwine be scaid fa saab um we gwine be god own people da waak scraight fo um all de time we lib me chile dey gwine call ya de prophet wa taak fa de mos high god cause ya gwine git de people dem ready fa de time wen de lawd gwine come ya gwine tell e people say god gwine paadon dey sin an dat how e gwine sabe um cause we god feel wa we feel an e mussyful an do we good e gwine mek de light ob sabation fa shine pon we like de sun ob day clean broad dat light gwine shine pon all de people wa lib een de daak shada ob det e gwine hep we waak a peaceable way an wiles de chile john da grow big e da come close ta god mo an mo e beena lib een de wildaness til de time come fa wok mongst de israel people een dat time caesar augustus been de rula ob de roman people e mek a law een all de town een de wol weh e hab tority say ebrybody haffa go ta town fa count by de head an write down e name dis been de fus time dey count by de head jurin de time quirinius de gobna ob syria country so den ebrybody gone fa count by de head ta e own town weh e ole people been bon now joseph same fashion gone fom nazareth town een galilee e trabel ta de town name betlem een judea weh de ole people leada king david been bon joseph gone dey cause e blongst ta david fambly e gone fa count by de head an mary gone long wid um e gage fa marry um an mary been speckin same time wen dey been dey time come fa mary gone een e hab boy chile e fusbon e wrop um op een closs wa been teah eenta scrip an lay um een a trough weh dey feed de cow an oda animal dem cause mary an joseph beena stay weh de animal sleep dey ain been no room fa dem eenside de bodin house now some shephud been dey een de fiel dat night dey beena stay dey da mind dey sheep den one angel ob de lawd appeah ta um de night time done lightnin op jes like day clean broad cause ob dat de shephud mos scaid ta det bot de angel tell um say mus dohn feah a hab good nyews wa gwine mek ebrybody rejaice cause a come fa tell oona right now dis day a sabior done bon fa oona e christ de lawd an e bon een david town a gwine tell oona wa oona gwine see dey cause ob dat oona gwine know a done tell oona de trute oona gwine find de chile wrop op een closs wa been teah eenta scrip an e been leddown een a trough all ob a sudden a heapa oda angel fom heaben been longside dat angel dey all da praise god say
