ya fren dem ya broda dem ya kin needa ya rich neighba dem cause den dey gwine eenbite ya back ta dey house fa nyam an wen dey eenbite ya back ya done git ya payback bot wen ya hab feas mus eenbite dem wa ain got much dem wa cripple op an dem wa ain able fa waak good an dem wa bline dem people ain able fa gii ya de payback fa de good ya done fa um bot god gwine bless ya fa dat good ya done e gwine gii ya de payback pon de day wen dem dat done wa god say gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin one dem wa beena nyam ta de table wid jedus yeh wa e say dat man tell jedus say dem dat gwine be ta de big feas wen god da rule dey sho gwine be bless jedus ansa um say one time one man beena mek a big feas an e eenbite plenty compny fa come wen de time come dat de food been ready fa nyam e sen e wokman fa go ta dem people dat e been eenbite tell um say come ta de feas ebryting done ready now bot all dem staat fa mek scuse say dey ain able fa go nyam now de fus one say a jes buy a piece ob lan an a haffa go fa look um oba do please tell ya bossman a saary a ain able fa come nyam wid um noda one say a jes buy ten oxen an a da gwine fa try um fa see how dey da wok do please tell ya bossman a saary a ain able fa come nyam wid um noda say a jes git marry cause ob dat a ain able fa come nyam wid um de wokman gone back an tell e bossman all wa dey say de bossman been too bex an e tell e wokman say ron quick go ta de main screet an de back screet een de town bring yah de people wa ain got nottin de cripple op an dem wa ain able fa waak good an dem wa bline wen de wokman come back e tell e bossman say sah a done do all wa ya tell me fa do stillyet plenty room lef dey fa mo people de bossman tell um say go ta de main highway an de back road wa go ta dem settlement an mek de people dey come yah fa full op me house a da tell oona fa true ain none dem people dat a been eenbite fus fa come nyam wid me gwine taste one leetle bit ob de food wa a fix fa de feas plenty people beena trabel long wid jedus e ton roun an taak ta dem e tell um say whosoneba wahn fa be me ciple mus lob me mo den e lob e fada an e modda e mus lob me mo den e wife an e chullun e broda an e sista dem e mus lob me mo den e lob e own sef ef e ain lob me like dat e ain able fa be me ciple whosoneba dohn tote e own cross an come folla hine me dat poson cyahn be me ciple ef one ob oona wahn fa mek a towa fa nyuse fa watch oba ya fiel fus ya gwine seddown an figga hommuch e gwine cost ya gwine see ef ya got nuff money fa build all de towa ef ya ain do dat an ya lay de foundation an den ya ain able fa git shru build de towa den ebrybody gwine mek fun ob ya dey gwine say dis man staat fa mek e towa bot e ain able fa finish um an sposin one king hab ten tousan sodja an e gwine out fa fight noda king wa come ginst um wid twenty tousan dat king haffa fus seddown an figga ef e an e sodja dem scrong nuff fa fight dem twenty tousan ef e ain scrong nuff fa fight um fo de oda king an e sodja dem git close ta e country e gwine sen e messenja dem ta de oda king meet um an tell um say we ain wahn fa fight ginst oona leh we see how we kin settle dis ting den jedus say same fashion ain none ob oona kin be me ciple ef e ain hab de mind fa lef ebryting wa e got salt taste good een oona mout bot ef de salt done loss e taste ain no way oona kin mek um git e good taste back dat salt ain no good fa de groun needa fa mek fertiliza e ain good fa nottin bot fa chunk out oona got yea fa yeh ainty den oona mus yeh wa a da say a heapa people come geda roun jedus fa yeh wa e say dem wa geda tax come an dem oda jew people dat de jew dem ain neba mix op wid cause dey ain keep all de jew law dat mek de pharisee dem an de law teacha dem staat fa mek chaage say dis man jedus da mix op wid bad people an e eben da nyam wid um so jedus tell um one paable e say sposin a hundud sheep blongst ta one ob oona ef one ob dem sheep git loss wa ya fa do sho nuff ya gwine lef de ninetynine wa safe een de fiel an ya gwine saach fa de one wa loss til ya find um ainty wen ya done find um ya gwine be too glad so ya gwine pit um cross ya shoulda wen ya git home ya gwine hail ya fren dem an ya neighba dem geda um roun an say a been loss one ob me sheep an a saach fa um til now a done find um come we gwine rejaice an mek merry a da tell oona same fashion dem wa een heaben rejaice wensoneba eben jes one sinna change e way an do wa god wahn um fa do fa true dey gwine rejaice fa dat one mo den fa ninetynine oda res wa tink say dey ain haffa change dey way same way sposin a ooman hab ten piece ob silba money ef one ob dem git loss wa e gwine do sho nuff e gwine light de lamp an sweep de house good fashion e gwine saach ebryweh til e find um ainty den wen e done find um e gwine hail e fren an neighba dem e gwine tell um say a been hab ten piece ob silba money an a loss one a saach fa um til now a done find um come we gwine rejaice an mek merry a da tell oona fa true jes like dey all rejaice wen dat ooman find e money same fashion god angel dem da rejaice tommuch wen eben jes one sinna change e sinful way an do wa god wahn um fa do den jedus tell um say one man been hab two son de nyounga son say fada mus gii me me share ob de propaty wa a spose fa hab so de man wide op e propaty tween e two son dem ain long atta dat de nyounga son sell all e hab e tek e money an e gone ta a place way off e ron roun dey da lib loose life an e shrow way all e money atta e done spen all e hab a dry drought come shru oba all dat place an de people ain hab nottin fa nyam hongry come ta dat son doorstep e ain hab nottin so e gone fa wok fa a man een dat country an de man sen um ta e fiel fa mind de pig dem e been so hongry dat e been wahn fa nyam de pig slop bot nobody ain gim nottin fa nyam wen e come ta e sense e say ta esef all dem wa wok fa me fada hab mo den nuff food fa nyam an a yah da staab a gwine git op an go ta me fada an tell um say fada a done sin ginst god an ginst ya cause ob wa a done a ain fit fa ya fa call me ya son no mo ya mus treat me same like ya da treat ya wokman dem so de son git op an e gone back ta e fada e still been a long way off fom de house wen e fada shim e fada been too saary fa um an e ron quick gone an hug an kiss um e son tell um fada a done sin ginst god an ginst ya a ain fit fa ya fa call me ya son no mo bot e fada tell e wokman dem say mek hace an git de bes cloes fa me son fa weah pit a ring pon e finga an pit shoe pon e foot den oona gwine go git de bes calf an kill um so we kin hab a feas an mek merry cause dis son yah ob mine been dead bot now e da lib gin e been loss bot we done find um so dey staat fa hab a feas an mek merry same time de man fusbon son been een de fiel wen e git close ta de house e yeh music an de people da dance so e call one de wokman an aks um say wa gwine on yah de wokman tell um say ya broda done come home an ya fada kill e bes calf an hab feas cause e been git e son back ya broda been loss bot now e home safe an soun de big broda been so mad til e ain wahn eben fa go eenside de house so e fada gone out an beg um fa come een bot e ansa e fada say see yah all dese yeah a beena wok haad like a slabe fa ya an a da pay ya mind all de time stillyet ya ain neba gii me eben a leetle goat fa hab feas wid me fren dem bot dis yah son ya son wa waste all ya money an ron roun wid loose ooman wen e come home ya kill de bes calf fa um e fada tell um say me son ya dey yah wid me all de time an all wa a got blongst ta ya bot we right fa feas an mek merry cause ya broda done been dead an now e da lib gin e been loss bot we done find um jedus tell e ciple dem say one time a rich man hab one wokman een chaage ob e propaty dat rich man yeh say dat de wokman ain been scraight dat e beena loss e bossman money de rich man call de wokman an aks um say wa dis a yeh bout ya gii me de book weh ya da write all dat ya done tek een an all wa ya done spen cause ya ain gwine hab chaage oba me propaty no mo de wokman een chaage say ta esef wa a gwine do now me bossman ain gwine leh me wok fa um no mo a ain scrong nuff fa dig ditch an a too shame fa beg now den a know wa a gwine do so dat people gwine eenbite me ta dey house atta a done loss me job so de wokman sen an call fa all de people wa owe e bossman one atta de oda wen dey come e aks de fus one say hommuch ya owe me bossman e ansa say a hundud barrel ob olib oll de one een chaage tell um say yah ya bill seddown quick an change de one hundud wa done been write down dey ta fifty den de wokman een chaage aks noda one say hommuch ya owe me bossman dat one ansa a owe um one tousan bushel ob wheat de one een chaage tell um say yah ya bill change de one tousan wa write down dey ta eight hundud now den de bossman say de ceitful wokman een chaage hab heapa sense fa true de people wa tink all de time bout ting een dis wol dey da tink good how fa deal wid people like deysef dey tink bout dat mo betta den de people wa da waak een god light jedus tell e ciple dem say a da tell oona oona oughta spen money an ting een dis wol fa mek fren fa oonasef den wen de money an ting done gone god gwine welcome oona eenta ya ebalastin home een heaben de poson dat ya kin trus fa tek chaage oba leetle bit an do good dat de poson ya kin trus fa tek chaage an do good oba big ting an de poson dat ain scraight bout leetle ting ain gwine do right wid big ting so den ef dey ain able fa trus oona wid money an ting een dis wol ain nobody gwine trus oona wid ting dat walyable fa true ainty ef dey ain able fa trus oona wid oda poson propaty ain nobody gwine gii ya propaty fa ya own ainty dough one wokman ain able fa saab two massa ef e da try fa do dat e gwine hate one an lob de oda one e gwine be true ta one an hole de oda one cheap ya ain able fa saab god an be a slabe ta money same time wen de pharisee dem yeh wa jedus say dey suck dey teet an shrow slam pon um cause dey lob money a whole heap bot jedus tell um say oona mek people tink dat oona ain da do bad bot god know wa dey een oona haat dem ting wa people say walyable fa true dey ain wot nottin een god eye de law wa god gii moses an de prophet dem dem wod hab heapa tority til john wa bactize come long fom dat time dey da preach de good nyews bout how god da come fa rule an all de people da do dey bes fa hab god fa rule oba um bot e mo easy fa mek heaben an de whole wol disappeah den fa mek one leetle paat ob god law loss wa e mean a man wa worce e wife an gone marry noda ooman da lib een sin same fashion a man wa gone marry ooman wa done been worce da lib een sin one time dey been a rich man wa dress fa beat de ban an e hab feas an joy esef tommuch ebry day an one po man name lazarus lib dey too e been kiba wid sore e ain able eben fa waak roun an ebry day dey come bring lazarus leddown ta dat rich man door lazarus beena wahn fa nyam de scrap ob food wa lef oba wa fall fom de table wen de rich man beena nyam pontop ob dat de dog dem beena come long dey an lick dat po man sore den dat po man pass oba god angel cyaa um fa seddown longside de ole people leada abraham een heaben de rich man pass oba too an e git bury e gone ta hell an e beena suffa tommuch oba dey e raise e eye an see abraham way off an lazarus been longside um so de rich man hail abraham say fada abraham hab mussy pon me sen lazarus fa me mek um pit e leetle finga een wata an come yah fa tetch me tongue an cool um off cause a da suffa tommuch eenside dis yah fire bot abraham tell um say me son memba wen ya beena lib oba dey een de wol ya beena joy yasef ya done git ya paat ya git all ya good ting fo ya pass oba same time lazarus done git all de bad ting dem bot now e da joy esef yah an ya da suffa fodamo dey a deep deep ditch tween we an oona cause ob dat dem wa wahn fa cross oba fom yah ta oona side ain able fa go an dem ta oona side ain able fa cross ta yah weh we at de rich man say well den fada abraham a beg ya sen lazarus ta me fada house a hab me fibe broda oba dey leh lazarus go fa waan um leh lazarus tell um say dat dey mus dohn lib de way a done lib een de wol den wen dey pass oba dey ain haffa come yah ta dis place weh a da suffa tommuch bot abraham tell um say ya broda dem hab de book wa moses an de prophet dem been write dem wod dey fa waan um leh um yeh an pay mind de rich man ansa say no dat ain nuff fada abraham me broda dem ain gwine listen ta wa moses an de prophet dem done say een dem book bot ef somebody wa done dead go fa waan um dey gwine change dey sinful way an do wa god wahn um fa do bot abraham tell um say ef ya broda dem ain listen ta wa moses an de prophet dem done say een de book dey ain gwine pay mind ta somebody wa done dead wa gone back een de wol fa waan um dey ain gwine change dey way jedus tell e ciple dem say fa true ting gwine happen wa mek people do bad bot de poson wa mek dem ting happen gwine hab plenty trouble e mo betta fa dat poson ef dey tie a big grine stone roun e neck an chunk um eenta de sea e mo betta ef e drown een de wata like dat den ef e mek one ob dem leetle one do bad so den tek cyah wa ya do ef one ob oona hab a broda wa da sin ya mus buke um ef e change e sinful way mus paadon um eben ef e do ya bad seben time een one day ef e ton back ebry time come tell ya say a saary an a ain gwine do ya bad no mo mus paadon um jedus postle dem tell um say lawd hep we bleebe god mo den we bleebe now de lawd ansa um say ef oona bleebe een god eben ef ya fait jes leetle like one leeleetle mustard seed ya kin tell dis tree tek yasef outta de groun an go stanop an grow een de sea eben dough ya fait ain no bigga den de mustard seed dat mulberry tree gwine pay ya mind e gwine do wa ya say sposin one ob oona hab wokman wa da plow een de fiel or e da mind ya sheep wen de wokman come fom e wok wa ya gwine tell um fa true ya ain gwine tell um say mus hurry op come seddown an nyam no fa sho ya gwine tell de wokman say go cook me suppa git yasef ready an pit de food pon de table atta a done shru nyam an drink den ya kin hab sompin fa nyam an drink de massa ain gwine praise de wokman jes cause dat wokman done wa e tell um fa do ainty oona stan jes so wen oona done do all wa de massa tell oona fa do oona mus say we jes wokman we ain desaab no praise cause we jes done wa we spose fa do pon e way ta jerusalem jedus gone long shru de arie tween samaria an galilee wen jedus git close ta one settlement e meet ten man wa been sick een dey skin wid leposy dem man beena stan faa way dey holla say jedus massa hab mussy pon we jedus shim an tell um say oona go ta de jew priest dem leh dem xamine oona wiles dem man beena gwine fa see de priest dey all been heal dey all clean an dey ain been sick no mo wen one ob dem see dat e done been heal e come back ta jedus e holla da praise god e git down pon de groun een front ob jedus foot an e tank um an dat man been fom samaria jedus say a done mek ten man clean ainty weh de oda nine dem hoccome ain nobody ton back fa tank god cep dis one man wa ain one ob we jew people hoccome de oda jew man dem ain come back jedus tell de man say git op an go home cause ya bleebe een me ya done git heal some pharisee aks jedus wen god gwine come fa rule jedus ansa um say wen god come fa rule oona ain gwine see no sign fa sho dat ain nobody gwine say look yah dey e dey dey needa look yonda cause god da rule mongst oona jedus tell e ciple dem say de time gwine come wen oona gwine wahn bad fa see de man wa come fom god come back eben ef e jes fa one day bot oona ain gwine shim people gwine tell oona say look yonda oba dey de man wa come fom god oda gwine say look yah e dey dey mus dohn go long wid um mus dohn folla um wen de man wa come fom god come back ta de wol ebrybody gwine be able fa shim jes like lightnin dat flash cross de sky an light um op fom one side ta de oda bot fo dis happen e haffa suffa plenty ting an de people wa lib taday ain gwine hab nottin fa do wid um jes like how e been een noah time dat de way e gwine be wen de man wa come fom god gwine come back een noah time de people beena nyam an drink an git marry op dey beena lib dat same way til dat day wen noah gone eenside de ark den de big rain come an all dem outside de ark git kill op een dat wata wa kiba um all op same way een lot time de people beena nyam an drink dey beena buy an sell dey beena plant crop an build house bot de day wen lot lef out fom sodom fire an sulfa stone come down fom heaben like rain an stroy all de people dey dat so e gwine be dat day wen de man wa come fom god gwine come back ta de wol dat day dey de poson wa dey pontop e house mus dohn tek time fa go down eenside e house fa geda e ting same way de poson wa dey een e fiel e mus dohn ton back ta e house oona memba wa happen ta lot wife whosoneba da try fa sabe e life e gwine loss e true life bot de poson wa loss e life cause ob me e gwine hab de true life a da tell oona dat night dey gwine be two people da sleep een de same bed angel gwine come tek one an lef de oda one two ooman gwine be togeda da grine meal angel gwine come tek one an lef de oda one two man gwine be een de fiel da wok angel gwine come tek one an lef de oda one jedus ciple dem aks um say lawd weh dem ting gwine happen jedus ansa um say wehsoneba dey a dead body de buzzat dem gwine geda dey too jedus tell e ciple dem one paable fa laan um dat dey mus pray all de time ta god an mus bleebe dat god gwine ansa um jedus say dey been a jedge een one town dat jedge ain been scaid ob god an e ain pay people no mind one wida ooman been dey een dat same town dis ooman beena go ta de jedge all de time an tell um say mus please gii me wa right mus hep me ginst de one wa done me wrong fa a long time de ooman come ta de jedge bot de jedge ain done nottin bot atta wile e say ta esef fa true a ain scaid ob god an a ain pay people no mind bot cause dis ooman da bodda me all de time a gwine gim wa right ef a ain do dat e gwine keep on da come ta me til e weah me out an de lawd say oona yeh wa de jedge wa ain scraight say now den fa true god gwine do wa right fa e people dem dat e done pick an wa da aks um een de day time an een de night time fa hep um ainty de lawd ain gwine be slow fa ansa um ainty a da tell oona god gwine mek hace fa do wa right fa um stillyet wen de man wa come fom god come back gin a wonda ef e gwine meet anybody een de wol wa bleebe een um jedus tell one paable ta de people dem wa tink dat dey beena do right an hole all de oda people cheap e say one time two man gone op ta god house fa pray one dem been a pharisee de oda been a man wa geda tax de pharisee stanop an pray bout esef say a tank ya god cause a ain like all dem oda people a ain tief fom nobody a beena waak scraight an do wa de law say an a ain sleep wid oda man wife an a tank ya dat a ain eben like dat man oba yonda wa da geda tax two day ebry week a da fast so a kin woshup ya betta a tek a tent ob all wa a git an gim ta ya bot de man wa da geda tax stan way off e ain eben lif e eye ta heaben cause e know e done sin e beena beat e chest cause e too saary fa e sin an e pray ta god say god hab mussy pon me cause a a sinna jedus tell de people say wen dat man gone back home god done fagib um fa de ebil e done an e stan right wid god bot god ain paadon de pharisee cause dem wa pit deysef op god gwine bring um down bot dem wa tek low god gwine raise um op mo den all some people beena bring dey baby ta jedus fa hab um pit e han pon dey head an bless um wen jedus ciple dem shim dey buke dem people fa do dat bot jedus call de chullun e tell e ciple dem say oona mus dohn stop de chullun leh um come ta me cause de people wa like dese chullun yah gwine hab god rule oba um a da tell oona fa true de poson wa ain gree like a leeleetle chile fa leh god rule oba um dat poson ain neba gwine hab god fa e king one jew leada come aks jedus say good teacha wa a mus do fa git ebalastin life jedus ansa um say hoccome ya da say a good ain nobody good cep fa god ya know wa god law chaage we fa do mus dohn sleep wid oda man wife mus dohn kill nobody mus dohn tief mus dohn tell lie pon nobody mus pay mind ta ya fada an ya modda de leada tell jedus say a done keep all dem law fom wen a been a boy wen jedus yeh wa de leada say e tell um stillyet ya mus do one mo ting mus go sell ebryting ya got an gii de money ta de people wa ain got nottin ef ya do dat ya gwine hab tredja een heaben atta ya done gii way ya money come folla me wen dat leada yeh wa jedus say e been sad cause e been too rich jedus see de man been too sad an e say fa true e ain easy eben a leetle bit fa rich people fa leh god rule oba um e mo easy fa mek de camel go shru a needle eye den fa a rich man fa come onda god rule de people wa yeh wa jedus say aks um den who dat kin git sabe jedus ansa say god able fa do wa people ain able fa do den peter say look yah we done lef ebryting fa folla ya jedus say a da tell oona fa true ebrybody wa lef e house or e wife or e broda dem or e modda or e fada or e chullun so dat e kin leh god rule oba um dat one gwine git plenty mo fom god een dis time yah god gwine gim plenty mo den wa e done lef fa folla god an god gwine gim ebalastin life een de wol dat gwine come jedus tek de tweb ciple dem ta one side an tell um say listen we da gwine op ta jerusalem all de ting dem de prophet dem done write bout de man wa come fom god gwine happen fa true dey gwine han um oba ta de people wa ain bleebe pon god dem people gwine shrow slam at um dey gwine hole um cheap an spit pon um dey gwine whip um an den dey gwine kill um bot atta shree day de man wa come fom god gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin bot de ciple dem ain ondastan none ob dese ting dey ain know wa e mean dey ain know wa e beena taak bout wen jedus git close ta jericho a bline eye man been dey da seddown side de road an e beena beg wen de bline man yeh de crowd da pass e aks de people say wa gwine on dey tell um jedus fom nazareth da pass long dis way wen de bline man yeh dat e holla say jedus son ob david hab mussy pon me de people wa beena lead de crowd buke de man tell um e mus hush op e mout bot de man holla mo louda say son ob david hab mussy pon me jedus stop dey an e chaage de people fa bring de bline man ta um wen e git close ta jedus jedus aks um say wa ya wahn me fa do fa ya de bline man ansa say lawd a wahn fa see gin jedus tell de man say a da mek ya see cause ya bleebe een me ya done git well dat same time de man been able fa see e folla longside jedus da praise god wen de crowd shim dey all praise god too jedus done gone eenta jericho an beena pass shru dey one man been dey name zacchaeus e been a head man ob dem wa da geda tax an e hab a heapa money zacchaeus beena try fa see jedus bot e ain been able fa shim cause e been a shot man an e ain been able fa see oba de crowd wa been roun jedus so zacchaeus ron head ob de crowd an climb op a sycamo tree fa hab chance fa see jedus wa been gwine come long dat way wen jedus git ta de tree weh zacchaeus been e look op an tell um say hurry op an come down zacchaeus cause a haffa stay ta ya house taday zacchaeus come down quick e tek jedus ta e house an gim haaty welcome all de people wa shim een zacchaeus house staat fa grumble say jedus gone fa stay ta de house ob a man wa ain keep de jew law zacchaeus stanop an tell de lawd say look lawd a gwine gii haf ob ebryting a got ta de po people an ef a done tief fom anybody a gwine gim back fo time wa a done tief fom um jedus tell um taday god done sabe dis man an e fambly dis man one ob abraham chullun too cause de man wa come fom god e come fa saach fa people wa loss an sabe um de people beena listen ta wa jedus say e been mos ta jerusalem now an dey beena tink say dat dey gwine see god come down an rule tareckly so den jedus tell um one paable e say one time one man wa fom a king fambly beena gwine ta a country faa way fa leh dem mek um king an den e gwine come back home gin fo de man lef e call ten ob e wokman dem an gim each a gole coin e tell um say see hommuch ya kin mek wid dis money fo a come back now den de people wa lib een dat country been hate um dey sen messenja dem atta um fa say we ain wahn dis man fa rule oba we bot de man git mek king ob dey country an e come back ta e house tareckly e sen fa e ten wokman dem fa come tell um hommuch money dey been mek wid e gole coin de fus wokman come an say sah a done mek ten mo gole coin wid de one wa ya gii me de king tell um say ya done good ya a good wokman cause a able fa trus ya fa do a leetle job a gwine mek ya rula oba ten city de secon wokman come ta de king an say sah a done mek fibe mo gole coin wid de one wa ya gii me de king tell um say ya gwine rule oba fibe city oda wokman come ta de king say sah yah de one gole coin wa ya been gii me a been tie um op een a hankachief fa keep um safe a been scaid ob ya cause ya a haad man ya da tek dat wa ain ya own an ya da haabis wa ya ain plant de king tell um say ya a good fa nottin wokman de wod wa ya own mout done taak a gwine nyuse fa condemn ya ya know a a haad man ainty a da tek dat wa ain me own an a da haabis wa a ain plant ya oughta hab pit me money een de bank an den wen a come back leas a been gwine hab de money an de interest e done git too den de king tell de wokman dem wa beena stan dey say oona tek de one gole coin way fom dis man an gim ta de wokman wa hab ten dem wokman say sah dat man done hab ten coin an de king ansa say a da tell oona say dat ebry poson wa got sompin god gwine gim mo bot de one wa ain got nottin god gwine tek way dat leeleetle bit wa e got now den me enemy dem wa ain wahn me fa rule oba dem fetch um yah an kill um een front ob me atta jedus say dat e gone long head ob de people da waak ta jerusalem wen e git close ta bethphage an bethany dey ta de mount olib e call two ob e ciple dem an e sen um on head ob um e tell um say oona go ta de settlement wa dey head ob oona wen oona go eenta de settlement oona gwine see one nyoung donkey dat dey done tie op dey nobody ain neba yet ride pon dat donkey mus ontie um an fetch um yah ef anybody aks oona hoccome ya da ontie um ansa um say de lawd need um de two ciple dem gone long ta de settlement an dey find ebryting jes like jedus tell um wen dey beena ontie de nyoung donkey dem wa e blongst ta aks um say hoccome oona da ontie um dey ansa say de lawd need um den dey tek de donkey ta jedus dey pit dey cloes pontop de animal an hep jedus git pon um wiles jedus beena ride long pon e way ta jerusalem de people spread some dey cloes pon de road fo um fa sho um hona wen jedus come fom de mount olib da gwine down de hill e come close ta jerusalem an all de big crowd ob people wa beena trabel long wid um staat fa rejaice an tank god dey beena holla ta de top ob dey boice da praise god fa all de miracle dem wa dey beena see jedus do dey say god bless de king wa e done sen fa come een de name ob de lawd leh dey be peace een heaben we da gii glory ta god some de pharisee dem dey een de crowd tell jedus say teacha buke dem people wa da folla ya chaage um fa hush op dey mout jedus ansa um say a da tell oona ef dem people hush op dey mout dem rock yah gwine staat fa holla wen jedus git close ta de city e shim an e staat fa cry e say a wish oona dey een jerusalem been know taday wa ting oona need fa hab peace bot oona ain able fa shim now de time da come wen oona enemy dem gwine build wall roun de city dey gwine hab oona pen op an fence op ta ebry side so dat oona ain gwine be able fa git outta dey dey gwine stroy de city an all ob oona an eben all oona chullun dey gwine knock all de city stone dem ta de groun dey ain gwine lef eben one stone weh e stan dey gwine do all dat cause oona ain recognize de time wen god beena come fa sabe oona den jedus gone eenside god house e staat fa dribe out dem people wa beena sell ting eenside dey e tell um say god say een e wod me house gwine be place weh people pray ta me bot oona done ton um ta place weh tief dem da hide jedus beena laan de people een god house ebry day de leada dem ob de jew priest dem de jew law teacha dem an de oda jew leada dem beena try fa find way fa kill jedus bot dey ain been able fa figga how fa do um cause all de people been dey beena geda roun jedus fa yeh um dey ain been wahn fa miss eben one wod e say one day wiles jedus beena laan de people an da preach de good nyews de leada dem ob de jew priest dem de jew law teacha dem an de oda jew leada dem come ta jedus dey aks um say tell we wa gii ya de right fa do dem ting yah who dat gii ya de tority jedus ansa um say leh me aks oona one queshon too oona tell me wen john wa bactize people been come yah who dat gim de right fa bactize tell me god gim de tority or de people gim de tority dey staat fa aagy mongst deysef say wa we gwine ansa um ef we say god gii john de tority fa bactize people e gwine say well den hoccome oona ain bleebe um bot ef we say people gii john dat tority all dem people yah gwine chunk stone pon we cause dey bleebe fa true dat john been a prophet so dey ansa jedus say dey ain know who dat gii john de tority fa bactize people jedus tell um say well den a ain needa gwine tell oona who dat gii me de tority fa do dem ting yah jedus tell de people one paable say one time one man plant some grapewine pon e faam e hire some wokman fa tek cyah ob de faam an den e gone way ta noda country an e stay dey a long time wen de time come fa de grape haabis de owna sen a saabant ta e faam fa fetch e share ob de haabis bot de wokman dem wa cyah fa e faam beat dat man wa de owna sen dey sen um back dout nottin de owna sen noda saabant fa fetch e share dey beat dat man too an shame um den dey sen um back wid nottin de owna sen still noda man dem wa cyah fa de faam beat dat one til dey hut um fa true an dey chunk um off de faam de faam owna say wa a gwine do now a gwine sen me own deah son wa a lob dey gwine show hona ta me son bot wen dem wa cyah fa de faam see de owna son come dey all taak togeda say dis de owna son dis propaty yah gwine be lef ta um leh we kill um so dat de propaty gwine come ta we den dey chunk de owna son off de faam an dey kill um now den jedus aks de people say wa dat faam owna gwine do ta dem wokman e gwine come an kill dem an e gwine gii e faam ta oda wokman dem wen de people yeh wa jedus say dey say fa sho dat mus dohn happen jedus look scraight at um an aks um say well den oona tell me wa dey mean wen dey write een god book say de same stone dat de builda dem chunk out dat de stone wa come fa be portant mo den all de oda res de poson wa faddown pon dis stone yah gwine broke op all e bone dem an wen dis stone faddown pon a poson e gwine mash um all op now dem law teacha an dem priest leada ondastan dat jedus been tell dat paable ginst dem so dat same time dey try fa ketch jedus an hole um bot dey ain ketch um cause dey been scaid ob de people dey so dey beena watch jedus fa try fa ketch um dey pay some man dem sen um ta jedus de tell dem man fa mek like dey mean wa dey say fa true an chaage um fa aks jedus schemy queshon dey plan fa tek de wod wa jedus ansa fa ketch um say e taak bad ting den dey kin go cuse jedus an tek um ta de roman gobna wa hab tority an powa fa jedge um de man dem wa dey beena pay fa ketch jedus come ta um fa aks um schemy queshon dey tell jedus say teacha we know wa ya da say an laan we e right fa true we know ya da look pon all people de same fa true ya da teach god way den dey aks um say e right fa we fa pay tax ta de roman rula caesar wa de jew law say bout dat bot jedus obareach um e been know dey beena try fa ketch um een e wod so
