wa blongst ta caesar an gii god wa blongst ta god so den wid all de people dey dem man ain been able fa ketch jedus een none ob de wod wa e say wen jedus ansa um so dey been stonish down an dey hush op dey mout some sadducee come ta jedus de sadducee dem bleebe dat dead people ain gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin dey aks jedus say teacha moses write law fa we say ef a man dead an lef e wife an ain hab no chullun de man broda mus marry de wida ooman fa hab chullun een de name ob de man wa done pass oba one time dey been seben broda de fus one marry an e pass oba e ain lef no chullun de nex broda marry e broda wida ooman an dat broda pass oba an ain lef no chullun fa e dead broda den de nex broda marry de wida ooman an e pass oba de same ting happen ta all de seben broda dem dey all marry dat ooman one atta de oda an dey all pass oba an ain hab no chullun las ob all de wida ooman esef pass oba all seben broda done marry dat ooman so den tell we wen de time come wen de dead people gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin who dat gwine hab dat ooman fa e wife jedus ansa de sadducee dem say yah een dis wol de people da git marry op bot atta dey pass oba de people dem wa god see fit fa mek um git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin dey ain fa be marry dey gwine be like de angel dem an dey cyahn dead no mo dey god chullun cause dey done been dead bot now dey done git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin moses eben show dat dem wa done dead git op fom de grabe an lib gin e show dat dey een god book weh e write down bout de bush dat beena bun dey dey e call de lawd de god ob abraham de god ob isaac an de god ob jacob e de god ob dem wa da lib e ain no god ob dead people cause ta god all people da lib some de law teacha dem tell jedus say teacha dat a good ansa atta dat de people been scaid fa aks jedus oda queshon jedus aks um say hoccome people say dat de messiah gwine be de chile ob david chullun chullun cause david done write down een de book ob psalms say de lawd tell me lawd say seddown yah ta me right han side til a pit ya enemy dem ondaneet ya foot david call de messiah lawd so den how de messiah kin be david son wiles all de people beena listen jedus taak ta e ciple dem e say oona mus be on de watch fa de law teacha dem dey like fa waak roun een dey long robe fa mek people say dey a big leada an dey lob fa go ta de maakut place weh plenty people geda so dat de people kin gim hona wen dey go ta de jew meetin house dey lob fa seddown een de bes seat an wen dey go ta de feas dey lob fa seddown een de place weh de big leada dem seddown dem law teacha yah tek oba wida ooman propaty an tief all dey got an den dey stanop da pray long time so dat people kin say dey good people fa true god gwine punish dem mo den e gwine punish oda people jedus been ta god house e beena look roun an e see de rich people come an drop dey money wa dey da gii ta god eenta de money box dey same time e see one po wida ooman come too e drop two leetle coppa coin eenta de box jedus say a da tell oona fa true dis po wida ooman yah done gii mo den all de oda people cause de oda res come an gii jes a leetle bit fom all de whole heapa money dey got bot dis ooman wa too po done gii all de money e got fa lib off some de ciple dem beena taak bout god house how e stan so purty wid e fine stone an all de ting dey wa people done gii fa god jedus say oona see all dis de time gwine come wen none dese stone yah wa oona da see ain gwine be lef een dey place one pontop de oda ebry stone yah gwine be chunk down outta e place dey aks jedus say teacha wen dat gwine happen wa sign gwine show we dat time done come jedus tell um say oona mus be on de watch mus dohn leh nobody fool oona cause plenty man dem gwine come een me name dey gwine say a de messiah an dey gwine say de time done come oona mus dohn go long wid dem mus dohn be scaid wen oona yeh bout waa an rebolution dem ting haffa happen fus bot dat ain mean dat de end time done come den jedus tell um say de country dem ob de wol gwine fight ginst one noda nation gwine scrike out ginst oda nation de groun gwine shake too bad a dry drought gwine come shru an people ain gwine hab nottin fa nyam a whole heapa people gwine git sick an dat sick gwine spread all roun all dat gwine happen een plenty place all oba de wol plenty ting gwine happen fa mek people scaid ta det an dey gwine be great ting een de sky fa sho people wa gwine come bot fo all dem ting happen de people wa hab tority gwine grab hole ta oona an do oona plenty bad ting dey gwine drag oona fa be jedge fo de leada dem een de jew meetin house an dey gwine pit oona een de jailhouse dey gwine bring oona fo king dem an gobna dem cause oona me ciple dem dat de time dey wen oona gwine hab good chance fa tell de people de true ting wa oona know bout me bot fo dey grab hole ta oona an tek oona fa be jedge mus mek op ya mind dat ya ain gwine fret bout wa ya gwine ansa um cause a gwine gii ya nuff wise wod an sense fa ansa dem eben oona enemy dem gwine haffa gree wid wa ya tell um bot eben ya modda an fada ya broda dem ya fambly an ya fren dem gwine han ya oba ta de tority fa tek ya fo de jedge an dem tority gwine kill some ob oona all de people gwine hate oona cause oona bleebe een me stillyet ain eben one hair een oona head gwine be loss mus stan firm an oona gwine git true life bot wen oona see de aamy dem da geda all roun jerusalem oona gwine know dat de time done come wen dat city gwine be stroy dat de time wen de people een judea mus ron way quick ta de hill country dem een de city ob jerusalem mus lef dey an dem wa out een de country mus dohn go eenta dat city cause dat de time dey wen god gwine punish de people an do all dat de prophet dem done write down een god book dat time gwine be mighty haad fa ooman dem wa een de fambly way an dem wa hab leetle baby de people een dis lan gwine suffa too bad god gwine show dat e bex fa true an punish dis people some dem gwine git kill wid de sode oda dem gwine git ketch an be prisona an oda people gwine cyaa um way ta all de diffunt country dem de people fom dem oda lan gwine tek chaage oba jerusalem trample um down all oba til de time come fa dem people wa ain jew fa loss dey powa scrange ting gwine happen ta de sun an de moon an de staa fa sho people wa da come a whole heapa people een plenty place een dis wol ain gwine know wa fa do dey gwine be scaid fa true wen dey see de salt wata git rough an de swellin ob dat tide wata roll like tunda people gwine pass out dey gwine be scaid ta det wiles dey da wait fa see wa gwine happen ta all de wol de powa wa dey een de eliment gwine shake an moob outta dey place weh dey spose fa be dat de time wen de people gwine see de man wa come fom god da come down een a cloud eenta de wol e gwine hab great powa an a too bright light gwine shine roun um wen oona see dem ting staat fa happen oona oughta stanop look op ta god cause e gwine sabe oona soon jedus tell um a paable say look at de fig tree an all de oda tree dem wen oona see dem leaf da buss open oona know dat summa gwine come soon ainty same way wen oona see dem ting wa a done taak bout staat fa happen oona gwine know dat de time wen god gwine rule ain way off a da tell oona fa true all dem ting yah gwine happen fo de people wa da lib now pass oba de eliment an de wol esef ain gwine las faeba bot me wod gwine las faeba an eba oona mus tek cyah wa oona da do mus dohn leh oona mind ron on all de time bout tommuch nyam an drink mus dohn fret tommuch bout oona trouble een dis wol cause ef oona do dat day gwine come all ob a sudden wen oona ain ready dat day gwine come pon all de people all oba de wol like a trap close quick pon a bod oona mus be on de watch an pray all de time so dat oona gwine hab scrent fa beah all dem ting wa gwine happen een dis wol an be able fa stan fo de man wa come fom god jurin dat time jedus beena spen de day da laan de people een god house an wen fus daak come e gone an spen de night ta de mount olib ebry maanin wen day clean all de people wa e beena laan dey gone fa meet um een god house fa yeh wa e gwine laan um dat day de time mos come fa de feas ob unleaven bread de jew holiday wen dey nyam bread wa ain hab no yeast een um dey call dat de passoba holiday de leada dem ob de jew priest dem an de law teacha dem beena study dey head fa figga how fa kill jedus dout nobody find out bout um cause dey been scaid ob de people den satan tek hole ta judas wa dey call iscariot e been one ob de tweb ciple dem so judas gone off an taak ta de priest leada dem an dem offisa ob dem wa gyaad god house judas taak ta um bout how e kin hep um ketch jedus de leada dem been glad fa yeh dat an dey offa fa pay judas money fa do um judas gree ta dat an e staat fa saach fa way fa han jedus oba ta um dey been wahn fa do dat wen dey ain gwine be no crowd ob people roun fa know bout um so judas look fa dat jurin de feas ob unleaven bread de day come wen dey haffa kill de lamb fa mek sacrifice ta god so dey kin nyam um an memba de passoba wen god done bring e people outta egypt lan so jedus call peter an john an tell um say oona go git de passoba food ready fa we fa nyam dey aks um weh ya wahn we fa git um ready jedus ansa um wen oona go eenta de city oona gwine meet a man wa da tote a big jug ob wata oona mus folla dat man an go eenta de house weh e go tell de man wa own dat house say de teacha da aks ya weh de room weh e an e ciple dem gwine nyam de passoba suppa de man gwine show oona a big room opstair wid all wa we need dey mus git de food ready dey peter an john gone ta de city an dey find ebryting jes like jedus tell um so dey git de food ready fa nyam de passoba suppa wen de time come fa de passoba suppa jedus come ta de table wid e tweb postle dem jedus tell um say a been wahn fa nyam dis passoba suppa wid oona too bad fo a suffa cause a da tell oona a ain gwine nyam um gin til all wa de passoba stan fa come true wen god gwine rule oba all ting een dis wol jedus tek de cup ob wine an e tank god den e say oona pass dis cup roun an leh all oona drink cause a da tell oona dat atta dis suppa a ain gwine drink wine no mo til god rule oba dis wol jedus tek some bread an e tank god den e broke op de bread gim ta e postle dem e say dis bread me body wa a da gii ta god fa oona sake oona mus nyam um fa memba me same way atta de passoba suppa jedus tek de cup ob wine an gim ta e postle dem e say de wine een dis cup e de nyew cobnant tween god an e people a da seal dat cobnant wid me blood wen a gree fa leh people kill me fa oona sake bot look yah de poson wa gwine han me oba ta dem people wa wahn fa kill me e da nyam wid me e han right yah pon de table wid me de man wa come fom god gwine dead like god done cide um bot e gwine be too bad fa dat man wa da han um oba ta dem wa gwine kill um den de postle dem staat fa aks one noda say wish one ob we gwine do dis ting wa jedus taak bout de ciple dem staat fa aagy wid one noda bout wish one ob dem dey oughta tink e great mo den all jedus tell um say dey een de wol de king dem hab chaage oba dey people an dem people call dey rula de people fren bot oona mus dohn neba be like dat steada dat de poson wa greata mongst oona mus be like de nyounga an oona leada mus be like de one wa da saab ef oona hab two people one wa seddown ta de table fa nyam an de oda poson wa da saab um wish one de greata dat de poson wa da seddown ta de table ainty bot a da stan mongst oona like a poson wa da saab oona beena stay wid me jurin all me haad time me fada done gii me tority fa rule oba people same fashion a gwine gii oona tority fa rule oona gwine nyam an drink ta me table wen a da rule an oona gwine seddown pon shrone fa jedge de tweb tribe ob israel simon simon listen satan done aks fa test all ob oona fa wide op de good fom de bad like a faama da wide op e grain fom de chaff bot a done pray ta god fa ya simon dat ya ain gwine loss ya fait een me an wen ya done ton back ta me ya mus hep ya broda dem git mo scronga peter ansa jedus say lawd a ready fa go wid ya ta de jailhouse an fa dead wid ya too jedus tell um say a da tell ya peter fo de roosta crow taday ya gwine say shree time dat ya ain know me den jedus aks e ciple dem say dat time wen a been sen oona fa go an tell de good nyews a been chaage oona dat oona mus dohn tek no money no bag needa no shoe oona ain hab need ob nottin jurin dat time ainty dey ansa um no we ain been need nottin den den jedus tell um say bot now ef oona hab money or a bag mus tek um wid oona an ef oona ain got no sode mus sell oona coat an buy um cause a da tell oona wen de prophet write een god book say people tink dat e one ob dem wickity people e beena write bout me all wa god wod say bout me da happen fa true de ciple dem say look yah lawd we hab two sode jedus ansa um say dat nuff jedus lef de city an gone ta de mount olib jes like e nyuse fa do an de ciple dem gone long wid um wen e git ta de place e tell um oona mus pray ta god so dat wen satan tempt oona oona ain gwine fall eenta sin den jedus lef um an gone a leetle bit mo bout one hundud foot way an e kneel down an pray ta god e say fada ef ya gree do please tek way dis cup wa a fa suffa stillyet ya mus dohn do wa a wahn mus do wa ya wahn fa do den one angel come outta heaben ta jedus an gim scrent jedus beena suffa tommuch an e pray eben mo haada e sweat been like blood wa da drop down ta de groun wen jedus git op fom e pray e gone back ta de ciple dem bot e see dat dey beena sleep cause dey haat been too hebby jedus tell um say oona ain oughta sleep ainty git op an pray ta god so dat wen satan tempt oona oona ain gwine fall eenta sin wiles jedus beena taak a crowd come op judas one ob de tweb ciple dem beena lead de people an e come op ta jedus fa kiss um bot jedus aks um say judas wid a kiss ya da han de man wa come fom god oba ta e enemy dem wen de ciple dem wa been wid jedus see wa bout fa happen dey aks jedus say lawd kin we fight dem wid we sode an one dem ciple tek e sode an scrike de saabant ob de head man ob de jew priest dem an cut off e right yea bot jedus chaage e ciple dem say dat nuff oona stop dat e tetch de saabant head an heal e yea jedus aks de leada dem ob de priest dem an de leada dem wa beena gyaad god house an de oda jew leada dem wa been come dey fa git um e say oona haffa come yah fa git me wid sode an stick like a been a robba a been wid oona ebry day een god house an oona ain try fa grab hole ta me bot dis de time wen god gree fa leh oona tek me now wen satan wa da rule oba de daakness dey een chaage dey grab hole ta jedus an tek um ta de head man ob de jew priest dem eenta e house peter folla long hine um bot e ain git close ta um now a fire been light dey een de middle ob de head man yaad an people beena seddown roun dat fire so peter gone an jine um one saabant gyal see peter da seddown dey wid de fire light da shine pon um dat gyal study peter good fashion an e tell de people dey say dis man too been wid jedus bot peter say dat ain so e tell um say ooman a ain eben know dat man atta wile a man beena watch peter dat man say ya one ob dem wa been wid jedus dem too bot peter ansa say man a ain atta bout one hour noda man tell de people say fa true dis man yah been wid jedus cause e come fom galilee too peter ansa um say man a ain know wa ya da taak bout dat same time wen e beena say dat a roosta crow de lawd ton roun an look scraight at peter an peter memba dat de lawd done tell um say fo de roosta crow taday ya gwine say shree time dat ya ain know me peter gone outta de yaad an e cry bitta teah de sodja dem wa beena gyaad jedus mek fun ob um an beat um dey tie a rag oba e eye den dey knock um an say ef ya a prophet tell we who dat knock ya an dey tell jedus plenty oda ting fa hole um cheap wen day clean dey hab meetin ob de jew council de people leada dem de leada dem ob de priest dem an de law teacha dem geda togeda an de sodja dem tek jedus fo dat council de people ob de council chaage jedus say ef ya de messiah ya mus tell we jedus ansa um say ef a tell oona oona ain gwine bleebe me an ef a aks oona a queshon oona ain gwine ansa me bot fom now on de man wa come fom god gwine seddown ta de right han ob god wa hab all powa all de people wa beena jedge um een de council aks um say well den ya god son jedus ansa um say oona right wen oona say dat den de people wa beena jedge um say we ain need no mo people wod ginst um wid we own yea we done yeh wa e say all de crowd ob people wa beena jedge een de jew council grab hole ta jedus an tek um way ta gobna pilate den dey staat fa cuse jedus tell pilate say we done find dis man da pit wod een we people yea fa mek um riot ginst de tority e tell um say we ain spose fa pay tax ta caesar an e say e de messiah dat mean e a king pilate aks jedus say ya de king ob de jew people jedus ansa um say dat wa ya say dat so e stan pilate tell de leada dem ob de priest dem an de heapa people wa done geda dey say a ain see nottin bad wa dis man done bot de people dem ob de council keep on da cuse um mo an mo dey tell pilate say jedus beena stir op de people wid de ting wa e da laan um all oba judea e staat een galilee an now e done come all de way yah ta jerusalem wen pilate yeh wa dem people say e aks um ef jedus been fom galilee soon as pilate find out dat jedus been fom galilee de arie weh herod da rule e sen jedus ta herod fa jedge um an dat same time herod been dey een jerusalem too herod been too glad wen e see jedus cause e done yeh bout um an been wahn fa shim fa a long time e been wahn fa shim do some miracle herod quizzit jedus tommuch bot jedus neba ansa um eben a wod de leada dem ob dey priest dem an de law teacha dem come stan fo herod da cuse jedus still mo an mo an herod an e sodja dem hole jedus cheap dey laugh an suck dey teet shrow insult pon um an dey mek um weah a fine robe like a king weah den herod sen jedus back ta pilate now pilate an herod dem done beena fight each oda bot dat same day dey come fa be fren pilate sen fa de leada dem ob de jew priest dem an e call fa de tority dem wa da rule an fa de people e call um all fa come togeda e tell um say oona done bring dis man yah ta me tell me dat e da stir op de people pit wod een dey yea bot wen a quizzit um fo oona a see dat e ain done none ob dem ting wa oona say e done an herod ain see nottin bad wa jedus done needa so e sen um back ta we yah oona kin see dat jedus ain done nottin fa mek me hab dem kill um cause ob dat a gwine jes hab dem whip um an den leh um go cause ebry yeah wen dey hab de passoba feas pilate haffa free one man wa de jew people wahn bot wen pilate say e wahn fa free jedus fa um all de people holla say no kill dis man an free barabbas fa we barabbas de man wa dey been pit een de jailhouse cause e been a leada wen de people been riot een de city an one poson been git kill pilate been wahn fa free jedus so e taak ta de people gin bot de people holla tell pilate say nail um ta de cross nail um ta de cross pilate tell de people gin dat mek shree time e aks um say wa fa a ain see nottin dat e done fa mek me hab dem kill um cause ob dat a gwine hab dem whip um an den leh um go bot de people beena holla mo an mo say pilate oughta hab e sodja dem kill jedus pon de cross an cause de people holla sommuch an cause ob de leada dem ob de priest dem e change e mind so pilate done wa de people been wahn um fa do e free barabbas de man dey aks fa wa been een de jailhouse fa de riot an fa kill somebody den pilate tell e sodja dem fa tek jedus an do wa de people been wahn um fa do de roman sodja dem tek jedus an gone wiles dey beena gwine dey meet one man name simon wa been bon een cyrene e beena come fom out een de country da gwine ta jerusalem de sodja dem grab hole ta um an pit jedus cross pon um dey mek um folla jedus da tote de cross a whole heapa people beena folla jedus some dem ooman wa beena folla um beena weep an wail fa um jedus ton roun ta dem an say oona daughta ob jerusalem mus dohn cry fa me mus cry fa oonasef an fa oona chullun cause de time gwine come wen people gwine say bless fa true dem ooman wa ain neba hab no chullun dem wa ain neba bon no baby an wa ain neba nuss none een dat time people gwine tell de mountain say faddown pon we an dey gwine tell de hill say kiba we op cause ef dey da do dis ting ta de green wood fa sho dey gwine do wossa ting ta de dry wood ainty wen de sodja dem tek jedus an go fa kill um dey tek two oda bad man fa kill wid jedus too wen dey git ta de place dey call de place wa look like a man head de sodja dem nail jedus ta e cross an dey nail de two bad man too each pon e own cross dey pit one man pon de right han side ob jedus an de oda man pon e lef han side jedus say fada paadon dem cause dey ain ondastan wa dey da do an de sodja dem shrow dice fa wide op jedus cloes mongst um de people beena stanop dey da look an de jew leada dem been dey da hole jedus cheap dey say e sabe oda people so den leh um sabe esef ef e de messiah wa god done pick fa true de sodja dem hole jedus cheap too dey come op ta um an try fa gim wine winega fa drink dey tell um say ef ya de king ob de jew people sabe yasef dey write de chaage ginst jedus fa de people fa read an dey nail um oba jedus head de chaage say dis man yah de king ob de jew people one dem two bad man wa beena hang dey pon e cross e shrow slam at jedus e say ya de messiah ainty well den sabe yasef an sabe we too bot de oda bad man wa beena hang dey e buke dat man say ya ain scaid ob god dey done condemn ya fa dead jes like dis man yah dey condemn we fa wa we done an we da git we pay fa all de bad ting dem we done bot dis man yah ain done nottin bad den e beg jedus say jedus please do memba me wen ya come fa be king jedus ansa um say a da tell ya fa true taday ya gwine be wid me een heaben e been bout tweb oclock wen all dat lan ton pitch daak til shree oclock de sun stop fa shine an de big tick curtain wa beena hang eenside god house split down de middle jedus holla say fada a gii oba me sperit ta ya fa tek cyah ob me wen e done say dat e dead wen de offisa fa de sodja dem see wa happen e praise god e say fa true dis man yah ain done nottin bad all de people wa beena geda dey fa look wen dey see wa happen dey lef an gone home wiles dey beena gwine dey beat pon dey chest an all de people wa been know jedus an de ooman dem wa come wid um outta galilee beena stanop way off fom de cross da look pon all wa happen one man been dey name joseph a memba ob de jew council e been a good man an e beena waak scraight e ain been gree wid de council wen dey cide fa condemn jedus an han um oba ta de roman tority dem joseph come fom de town name arimathea een judea e beena wait fa de time wen god gwine rule oba dis wol joseph gone ta pilate an aks um fa leh um hab jedus body an pilate leh um hab um so den joseph tek jedus body down fom de cross an wrop um op een a linen closs e pit um eenside a tomb wa done been cut outta a big rock nobody ain neba been pit een dat tomb fo dat an dat day been de preparation day wen dey git ready fa de jew woshup day an de woshup day been jes bout fa staat de ooman dem dat been come outta galilee wid jedus dey folla joseph an see de tomb an how joseph pit jedus body een um den dey lef an gone home an git spice an pafume ready fa rub pon jedus body wen de woshup day come dey ain do no wok jes like de jew law say aaly een de maanin de fus day ob de week fo day clean de ooman dem tek de spice wa dey done been mix op an gone ta jedus tomb wen dey git ta de tomb dey see dat de stone wa beena kiba de door ta de tomb done been roll back so dey gone eenside bot dey ain find de lawd jedus body dey beena wonda bout wa done happen wen all ob a sudden dey see two man da stanop dey wa hab on bright cloes wa da shine de ooman dem been too scaid an dey bow dey head down ta de groun bot de man dem tell um say oona ain oughta look yah mongst de dead people fa a man wa da lib ainty jedus ain yah e done git op fom mongst de dead an e da lib gin oona memba wa e been tell oona wen e been dey wid oona een galilee e say dey gwine grab hole ta de man wa come fom god an han um oba ta wickity people wa gwine kill um pon a cross atta shree day e gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin den de ooman dem memba all dat wa jedus been tell um dey lef de tomb an gone back ta town an tell de leben postle dem an all de oda people wa beena waak wid jedus bout all wa done happen dem ooman been mary magdalene joanna an mary james modda dem an de oda ooman dem wa been dey wid um tell de postle dem wa done happen bot de postle dem ain bleebe dem ooman cause wa dey say ain mek no sense ta um bot peter git op an ron ta de tomb wen e git dey e bend down an e look eenside e jes see de linen grabe cloes wa dey been nyuse fa wrop op jedus body dey nottin mo den peter gone back home da wonda wa been happen dat same day two man wa beena folla jedus dey beena gwine ta a settlement name emmaus fom jerusalem ta dat settlement been bout seben mile de two man beena taak bout all dem ting wa jes happen een jerusalem wiles dey beena taak jedus esef come nigh ta um an waak longside um dey shim bot dey ain recognize who e been jedus aks dem say wa oona da taak bout togeda wiles oona da waak long de two man stop an stan still an dey look too sad one dem wa name cleopas ansa jedus say ya mus be de onliest man wa da lib een jerusalem an ain know wa been happen dey een dem day wa jes gone ainty jedus aks dem say wa ting dey say dem ting wa happen ta jedus fom nazareth e been a great prophet e hab powa fa do miracle an fa taak great ting e hab fabor wid god an wid all de people too de leada dem ob de jew priest dem an we rula dem done tek jedus an han um oba ta de roman gobna pilate fa condemn um fa dead an de sodja dem nail um ta de cross an kill um we been tink dat jedus been gwine free de israel people pontop ob dat taday mek shree day since all dat happen an pontop ob all dat some we ooman dem stonish we tommuch dey gone ta de tomb aaly dis maanin bot dey ain find jedus body dey een de tomb wen dey come back de ooman dem tell we dat dey been see a wision ob angel fom god dey de angel dem tell um dat jedus da lib den some we people dat been wid we gone ta de tomb an dey find um jes like de ooman dem beena tell we bot dey ain see jedus jedus tell um say oona ain got no sense een oona haat oona ain wahn fa bleebe all dat de prophet dem done say de messiah haffa suffa dem ting an den go ta heaben an hab e paat een god glory ainty an jedus splain ta de two man dem e staat wid moses an all de prophet dem da laan um wa dey been write bout um jedus laan um fom all god book bout esef wen de two man done git close ta de settlement weh dey beena gwine jedus mek like e been gwine on so de man dem beg um fa stay wid um dey tell um say stay yah wid we cause de day mos gone an de night da come soon so jedus gone fa stay wid um wen e git ta de table fa nyam wid um jedus tek de loaf ob bread an tank god fa um den e broke op de bread an gim dey piece same time jedus do dat e been like de man dem eye been open op an dey recognize dat jedus esef dey wid um bot den jedus jes disappeah an dey ain shim de two man dem say ta one noda wiles e beena taak ta we wen we beena waak long de road dat been like a fire wa da bun een we haat ainty we been too glad wen e beena splain god book ta we same time dey git op an gone back ta jerusalem dey find de leben ciple dem an some de oda people geda togeda dem people tell de two man dem say de lawd done git op fom mongst de dead an e da lib gin fa true e done appeah ta simon den de two man dem tell de people wa happen ta dem wiles dey beena waak long de road ta emmaus dey tell um how dey been recognize dat e been de lawd jedus dey wid um wen e broke op de bread fa um dat same time dey wen dey beena taak bout dat jedus esef stanop mongst um dey e tell um say hab peace een oona haat dey been scaid mos ta det dey tink dey beena see a haant jedus tell um say oona ain oughta be scaid oona ain oughta wonda wa oona da see look pon me han an me foot see a mesef fa true oona mus tetch me an look pon me good fashion den oona gwine know dat a ain no haant a haant ain hab no body needa no bone like oona see dat a hab wen jedus done say dat e show um e han an e foot dey beena wonda an dey still ain know wa fa tink cause wa dey see mek um so full op wid joy jedus aks um say oona hab sompin fa nyam yah dey gim some roas fish an some honeycomb e tek de fish an honey an nyam um dey fo dey eye jedus tell um say wen a been dey wid oona a done tell oona bout dis a tell oona dat all ting wa moses been write down een de law bout me an wa dem prophet write down an all dey write down een de psalms bout me dey all haffa happen fa true jedus mek um able fa ondastan wa been write dey een god book e tell um say een god book dey write dis down dey tell we dat de messiah haffa suffa an dead an atta shree day e gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin god book tell we too dat een christ name e ciple dem mus tell all people say mus change oona way an do wa god wahn oona fa do den god gwine paadon oona oona mus tell um dat een jerusalem an den all oba de wol oona done see all dem ting yah an oona mus tell people bout dem an a gwine sen oona wa me fada done promise bot fo oona go oona mus wait een de city til oona git dat holy sperit powa wa gwine come outta heaben an come down pon oona an jedus waak wid um outta jerusalem ta bethany wen dey git dey e raise e han op an e bless um wiles e beena bless um jedus lef um god tek um op eenta heaben de people wa bleebe een jedus woshup um op an den dey gone back ta jerusalem dey been full op wid joy an dey been een god house all de time da praise god fo god mek de wol de wod been dey de wod been dey wid god an de wod been god fo god mek de wol de wod been dey wid god shru dat wod god mek ebryting ain nottin een de whole wol wa god mek dat been done dout de wod de wod e de one wa all life come fom an dis life yah de life wa da mek all people see de light de light da shine een de daak an de daak ain neba been able fa pit out dat light god sen one man fa come eenta de wol an dat man name been john e come fa tell people bout de light so dat ebrybody kin bleebe wen dey yeh wa e say john esef ain been de light e jes come fa tell people bout de light de light wa e taak bout dat de true light wa come eenta de wol an da shine pon ebrybody so den de wod been dey een de wol an shru um god mek all ting een de wol stillyet de people een de wol ain been know who e been e come ta e own place bot e own people ain wahn hab nottin fa do wid um stillyet some bleebe pon um ta all dem e gim de right fa be chullun ob god dey ain git fa be chullun ob god same way like people een de wol hab chullun dey ain chullun ob god cause dat wa somebody wahn needa cause some man wahn dat fa be bot god esef mek um come fa be e chullun de wod come fa be a man an e lib mongst we fa a wile we see de glory god gim cause e de onliest son ob de fada god an e gii we all de blessin ob god an mek we know wa true bout god john beena tell people bout um e holla say dis de poson a beena tell oona bout wen a say e gwine come wen a done done de wok wa god sen me fa do bot e great fa true way mo den me cause e done been dey fo a bon cause e full op wid blessin fa we e da bless we mo an mo moses bring we de law bot jedus christ de one wa bring we god blessin an mek we know wa true nobody ain neba see god bot god onliest son e one wid e fada an de son mek people know who god da de jew leada dem een jerusalem sen jew priest an levite ta john fa aks um say who ya da john ain back op one bit wid wa e say e tell um plain an out een de open say a ain de messiah wen john ansa um so dey aks um say den who ya da ya elijah john ansa say no a ain elijah so dey aks um say ya de prophet wa we beena look fa john say no so den dey say well tell we who ya da de people wa sen we gwine aks we fa gim ansa wa ya kin tell we bout yasef wen john ansa um e tell um wa de prophet isaiah been say john say a de one wa da holla een de wildaness say mus mek de road scraight fa de lawd pass by den dem wa de pharisee dem sen dey come ta john dey aks um say ef ya ain de messiah an ya ain elijah an ya ain de prophet den hoccome ya da bactize people john ansa say a da bactize people wid wata bot dey one mongst oona dat oona ain know e gwine come wen a done done de wok wa god sen me fa do a mesef ain fit eben fa loose e shoe all dis happen een bethany pon de east side ob de jerden riba dat weh john beena bactize people de nex day john see jedus da come ta um an e say look yonda de lamb ob god da come fa tek way de sin ob people all oba de wol e de one a beena taak bout wen a say one man gwine come atta a done done de wok wa god sen me fa do dat man great fa true way mo den me cause e done been dey fo a bon a ain been know who dat poson gwine be bot a come fa bactize people wid wata so dat de israel people kin know who e da den john tell bout wa e been see e say a see god sperit come fom heaben like a dob an stay dey pon um a ain been know dat e de poson a beena wait fa cep dat god wa sen me fa bactize people wid wata done tell me bout um god say ya gwine see de sperit come down pon one poson an stay dey pon um dat de one wa gwine bactize people wid de holy sperit john tell um say a done see dis happen an a da tell oona say dis man e de son ob god de nex day john been dey gin wid e ciple dem een de same place weh e beena bactize people wen john see jedus waak by e say look yah dat de lamb ob god wen john ciple dem yeh wa john say dey gone folla jedus den jedus ton roun an shim da folla um an e aks um say wa oona da look fa dey aks um say rabbi weh ya da stay rabbi mean teacha jedus ansa um say oona come look so dey gone wid um an see weh e beena stay dat been bout fo oclock een de ebenin an dey stay wid um til night time one ob dem two people wa yeh wa john say an gone wid jedus been name andrew de broda ob simon peter fus ting andrew gone an find e broda simon tell um say we done find de messiah messiah mean de christ andrew bring simon ta jedus an jedus look pon simon say ya name simon john chile bot people gwine call ya cephas cephas an peter mean de same ting dey mean rock de nex day jedus mek op e mind fa go ta galilee e find philip an tell um say come wid me fa be me ciple philip been fom bethsaida de same town weh andrew an peter come fom philip gone an look fa nathanael tell um say we done find de man moses been write bout een de law book e de one de prophet deysef done write bout too e jedus wa come fom nazareth joseph chile nathanael aks philip say nazareth ain nottin good kin come fom nazareth ainty philip ansa um say come look yah wen jedus see nathanael da come e say look dis yah a israel man fa true ain no lie bout um nathanael aks jedus say how ya know me jedus ansa um say a done see ya wen ya been dey onda de fig tree fo philip call ya nathanael ansa say teacha ya de son ob god ya de king ob israel jedus say ya bleebe pon me jes cause a been tell ya dat a see ya wen ya been dey onda de fig tree jes dat ya gwine see ting wa great mo den dat den e tell um say a da tell oona fa true ya gwine see heaben open op ya gwine see god angel dem da come down pon de man wa come fom god an da go back op atta two day dey been a weddin een cana wa dey een galilee jedus modda been dey ta de weddin an dey been eenbite jedus an e ciple dem too fa go wen all de wine done jedus modda tell jedus say dey ain got no mo wine jedus tell e modda say ya ain fa tell me dem ting yah now de time wen a fa do dem ting ain come yet jedus modda tell de saabant dem say oona mus do wasoneba e tell oona fa do de jew dem got plenty law wa say how dey fa wash dey body een a special way an all ting wa dey da nyuse ef dey wahn fa be clean een god eye fa sake ob dat six big stone wata jug been close by dey een dat place de jug dem been so big dat jes one jug kin hole twenty ta tirty gallon ob wata jedus tell de saabant dem say oona mus full op dem wata jug wid wata an dey full de pot dem op ta de brim den jedus tell um say now mus tek some ob dat outta de jug an go cyaa um ta de man een chaage ob de marry feas so de saabant dem done wa jedus tell um fa do den dat man een chaage taste de wata wa jedus done been ton ta wine dat man een chaage ain been know weh de wine come fom bot de saabant dem wa been tek de wata outta de jug dey been know so dat man een chaage call de groom oba e tell um say ebrybody kin saab de wine wa mo betta fus an atta de people done drink plenty wine dat de time dey wen dey kin saab de cheap wine bot ya beena keep de wine wa mo betta til now jedus done dis fus miracle een cana wa dey een galilee dat de way e show de people e powa an e ciple dem bleebe pon um atta dat jedus an e modda e broda dem an e ciple dem gone ta capernaum dey stay dey two shree day de time been close fa de jew holiday dey call passoba so jedus gone ta jerusalem wen jedus gone eenta god house dey e meet op wid people da sell cow an goat sheep an pigeon an oda people wa beena mek change fa de people money beena seddown dey ta dey table so jedus tek some rope an mek a whip an e dribe um all outta god house long wid de sheep an de cow dem den e ton oba de table dem weh people beena change money an e scatta dey coin an e chaage de people wa beena sell pigeon say mus git dem pigeon outta yah mus dohn ton de house ob me fada eenta a maakut place den e ciple dem memba weh dey write een god book say o god a wahn people fa hona ya house a wahn um sommuch til e bun een me haat jes like a fire wa gwine bun me op den de jew leada dem come aks jedus say wa miracle ya kin do fa show we dat ya got tority fa do dis wa ya done yah jedus tell um say ef oona stroy dis house ob god een shree day a gwine build um back gin den de jew leada dem tell jedus say e been tek fotysix yeah fa build dis house ya mean fa say dat ya gwine tek jes shree day fa build um back gin bot wen jedus taak bout god house dat e body e beena taak bout so wen god mek jedus git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin e ciple dem memba wa jedus been taak bout den dey bleebe wa been write dey een god book an de wod jedus done been taak bout de time come fa de passoba feas wiles jedus been dey een jerusalem an plenty people bleebe pon um wen dey see de miracle dem wa e beena do bot jedus ain lef esef een dey han cause e been know all people too good e ain been no need fa people fa tell jedus wa been dey een dey haat dey been one ob de pharisee dem name nicodemus wa been a leada wa blongst ta de jew council one night nicodemus come ta jedus an say teacha we know ya a teacha wa god sen cause ain nobody able fa do dem miracle wa ya da do ef god ain dey wid um jedus tell um say a da tell ya fa true ain nobody kin come onda god rule ef e ain bon gin nicodemus aks jedus say how kin a poson wa done grown git bon gin fa sho a poson ain gwine git leetle an go back eenside de belly ob e modda an git bon a secon time like a leetle baby jedus say a da tell ya fa true ain nobody kin come onda god rule ef dat poson ain bon wid wata an wid de holy sperit we fada an modda gii we we body bot god sperit gii we we sperit ya mus dohn wonda wen a tell ya say ya mus be bon gin de breeze da blow wehsoneba e wahn fa blow ya da yeh de soun wa e mek bot ya ain know wa side e da come fom an ya ain know wa side e da gwine dat de same way e happen wen de holy sperit gii people nyew life an dey bon gin nicodemus aks jedus say how dat kin be jedus aks um say ya a big teacha een israel an ya ain ondastan wa a da taak bout a da tell ya fa true wa we know an wa we done see we da tell oona bout stillyet oona ain wahn fa bleebe wa we da tell oona oona ain bleebe me wen a tell oona bout dem ting wa dey een dis wol so den how ya gwine bleebe me wen a tell ya bout dem ting wa dey een heaben dey ain nobody neba gone op ta heaben cep de man wa come fom god wa come down outta heaben jes like moses done hice de bronze snake op pon a pole dey een de wildaness same way so dey gwine haffa hice op de man wa come fom god so dat ebrybody wa bleebe pon um gwine git true life wa ain gwine neba end cause god lob all de people een de wol sommuch dat e gii we e onliest son god sen we um so dat ebrybody wa bleebe pon um ain gwine dead dey gwine lib faebamo god ain sen e son eenta de wol fa condemn um god sen e son fa come sabe de people shru e son ef a poson bleebe pon god son god ain gwine condemn dat poson dey bot ef a poson ain bleebe pon god son god done condemn um cause e ain bleebe pon de name ob de onliest son ob god god been mek de light ob trute come eenta de wol bot people like de daak steada de light cause dey keep on da do ebil ting dat so de jedgiment stan ebrybody wa da do ebil ting dey ain like de light tall an ain gwine come eenta de light cause dey ain wahn de light fa show de ebil ting dem wa dey da do bot ebrybody wa da lib coddin ta de trute ob god gwine come eenta de light so dat de light kin show dat fa sho dey beena do wa god tell um fa do atta dat jedus an e ciple dem gone ta judea lan e stay some time wid um dey an e beena bactize people john wa bactize beena bactize people een aenon too wa been dey close ta salim cause plenty wata been dey people beena go ta john dey an e beena bactize um de time wen all dis beena happen john ain been pit een de jailhouse yet some ob john ciple dem an one jew man staat fa aagy bout de jew law wa say a poson mus wash een a special way ef e wahn fa be clean een god eye so dey gone ta john an tell um say teacha ya memba dat man wa been wid ya wen ya been dey pon de oda side ob de jerden riba de one ya beena tell bout well now e da bactize people een de jerden riba an ebrybody da gwine ta um john tell um say ain nottin like dis kin happen ta a poson cep god mek um happen oonasef yeh me wen a say a ain de messiah bot god sen me heada de messiah fa come mek a way fa um de bride blongst ta de groom bot de fren ob de groom da stan by da listen fa de groom an wen e yeh de groom boice e full op wid joy dat so e stan fa me a full op wid joy e mus come fa be mo an mo great an a mus come fa be less an less de one wa come fom heaben e oba all de one wa dey een dis wol blongst ta dis wol an e da taak bout dis wol own bidness bot de one wa come fom heaben e oba all de one wa come fom heaben da taak bout wa e done see an yeh stillyet ain nobody bleebe wa e say de poson wa bleebe wa e say e show dat e been bleebe dat wa god say e true de one wa god sen e da tell people de message wa god gim cause god da gim e sperit til e full op wid um god we fada da lob e son an e gim chaage oba all ting ebrybody wa bleebe pon god son dey got de true life wa ain neba gwine end bot ebrybody wa ain do wa god son say dey ain neba gwine git de true life an god gwine be too bex wid um faeba de pharisee dem yeh say dat jedus beena git mo ciple an bactize mo ciple den john bot fa true jedus ain beena bactize people e ciple dem beena bactize um wen jedus yeh wa dey beena say e lef judea an gone back gin ta galilee wen e beena gwine e haffa go shru samaria fa git dey een samaria e come ta a town name sychar wa stan close ta de fiel wa jacob gii ta e son joseph de well wa nyuse fa blongst ta jacob been dey dey wen jedus been weary fom de journey e seddown close ta de well e been bout noontime one ooman fom samaria come fa git wata fom de well an jedus aks um say please gii me some wata fa drink e ciple dem done been gone ta town fa buy ting fa nyam de samaria ooman aks jedus say ya a jew an a a ooman fom samaria hoccome ya da aks me fa wata fa drink de ooman say dat cause de jew dem ain neba nyam needa drink fom de same dish dat de people fom samaria nyuse an dey ain neba sociate wid one noda jedus say ef ya been know wa god kin gii an who dis yah wa da aks fa wata ya been gwine aks um an e been gwine gii ya dat wata wa da mek people lib fa true de ooman tell um sah ya ain got no bucket an de well too deep weh ya git dat wata wa da mek people lib fa true we fada jacob gii we dis well jacob an e son dem an e flock beena come yah ta dis well fa drink wata ya da tell me dat ya mo greata den jacob jedus say ebrybody wa da drink de wata wa dey een dis well gwine tosty gin bot ebrybody wa da drink de wata a gwine gim ain neba gwine git tosty no mo fa true de wata a gwine gim gwine be een um like a spring ob wata wa keep on da gim true life wa ain neba gwine end de ooman say please sah gii me dat wata den a ain gwine neba git tosty no mo an a ain gwine haffa come yah ta dis well gin fa git wata jedus tell de ooman say go git ya husban an come back yah de ooman say a ain got no husban jedus say ya da tell me de trute wen ya say ya ain got no husban fibe diffunt man dem done marry ya an de man ya da lib wid now ain ya husban ya da tell me de trute de ooman say sah a see ya a prophet wa god sen we fada beena woshup god ta dis mountain bot oona jew people say we mus go ta jerusalem fa woshup god jedus tell de ooman say ya mus bleebe wa a da tell ya de time gwine come wen oona ain gwine woshup we fada god pon dis mountain needa een jerusalem oona samaria people ain know de god wa oona da woshup bot we jew people know de god we da woshup cause shru de jew people god da sabe oda people stillyet de time da come an e done come now wen people wa da woshup fa true gwine woshup we fada god een dey haat an dey gwine woshup um een de right way jes like e stan fa true cause we fada god da look fa people like dat fa woshup um god a sperit an dem wa woshup um mus woshup um een dey haat an een de right way jes like e stan fa true de ooman tell jedus say a know dat de messiah wa dey call christ gwine come wen e come e gwine splain all ting ta we jedus tell um say a de one ya da taak bout same time jedus ciple dem come back an dey been stonish fa see jedus da taak ta a ooman bot ain none ob dem aks de ooman say wa ya wahn needa none ob um aks jedus say hoccome ya da taak ta de ooman den de ooman lef e wata jug an gone back ta town an e tell all de people dey fa come e tell um say oona mus come see a man wa tell me ebryting a done done oona tink e de messiah so de people lef town an come ta jedus same time jedus ciple dem beena try fa git jedus fa nyam sompin dey say teacha please tek sompin fa nyam bot jedus say a got food fa nyam wa oona ain know nottin bout so de ciple dem aks one noda say ya tink somebody done fetch um some food jedus tell um say wen a do wa de one wa sen me yah wahn me fa do an finish op all de wok e gii me fa do den dat me food oona kin taak say fo mo mont fo haabis ainty bot a da tell oona say look pon de fiel good de crop done ready fa haabis eben now de poson wa da cut de crop da git e pay eben now e da geda op de crop fa ebalastin life so dat de poson wa da plant de crop an de poson wa da geda um op all two dem heppy fa true togeda cause like people say one poson da plant an oda poson da geda op de crop e stan so a been sen oona fa haabis de crop een a fiel weh oona ain wok oda people done wok um an oona done gain fom de wok dey done plenty people ob samaria dey een dat town bleebe pon jedus cause de ooman say e tell me ebryting a done done so wen de people ob samaria come ta jedus dey beg um fa stay wid um an e stay dey two day cause e taak ta de people dey a heap mo ob um come fa bleebe pon jedus den dey tell de ooman say we bleebe now dis time yah e ain jes cause ob wa ya been tell we we bleebe now cause wesef done yeh um an we know dat e de sabior ob de wol fa true wen jedus done spen de two day dey een samaria e gone ta galilee jedus esef been say a prophet ain got no hona dey een e own country de people een galilee done been ta jerusalem ta de passoba feas an dey been see ebryting e beena do jurin dat time dey so wen jedus git ta galilee de people dey gim haaty welcome jedus gone back gin ta cana een galilee de same place weh e ton de wata eenta wine one gobment offisa been dey een cana an e hab a son wa been sick een capernaum wen de offisa yeh say dat jedus been come fom judea ta galilee e gone ta jedus an e beg um fa come ta capernaum fa heal e sick son wa mos dead jedus say ain none ob oona neba gwine bleebe dout oona see me da do miracle an oda great ting de offisa say please sah come long wid me now fo me son dead jedus tell um say ya kin go ya son gwine lib de man bleebe wa jedus tell um an e gone pon e way wiles e beena gwine ta e house e saabant dem meet um an tell um de nyews say ya boy gwine lib de offisa aks e saabant dem wa time e been wen e son staat fa git betta dey tell um say e been one oclock yestiddy atta noon wen de feba broke an lef um den de fada memba dat been de same time wen jedus been tell um say ya son gwine lib so de offisa an all de people een e house dey bleebe pon jedus dat been de secon time dat jedus done a miracle een galilee atta e come fom judea atta dat jedus gone ta jerusalem fa a jew holiday feas een jerusalem a pool ob wata been dey by de place dey call sheep gyate de jew people call dat pool bethesda an dey been fibe poch close by dat wata a whole heapa sick people been gone leddown pon dem fibe poch some dem been bline some been cripple op an some been paralyze all dem beena wait fa de waata fa moob fom time ta time one angel ob de lawd come down fa stir op de wata wen de wata moob de fus one wa git een de wata gwine be heal ob wasoneba ailment e hab one man been dey wa been sick tirtyeight yeah wen jedus come e see de man leddown dey e know dat man been sick a long time so e aks um say ya wahn fa git well de sick man ansa say sah a ain got nobody fa pit me een de wata wen e moob ebry time a da try fa git een somebody beat me ta de wata den jedus tell de man say git op fom dey pick op ya mat an waak all ob a sudden de man been well e pick op e mat an waak now den dis ting happen pon de jew woshup day so de jew leada dem see de man wa been sick an done git well da tote e mat dey tell um say dis yah we woshup day an e ginst we law fa ya fa tote ya mat pon we woshup day dat man ansa say de man wa mek me well tell me fa pick op me mat an waak den de jew leada dem aks um say wa man tell ya fa do dat de man wa jedus been mek well ain know who dat been cause dey been a heapa people dey an jedus done slip way jedus find dat man eenside god house e tell um say look yah ya well now mus dohn sin no mo or sompin mo wossa gwine happen ta ya den de man lef jedus an gone fa tell de jew leada dem say dat man wa mek um well e name jedus so den de jew leada dem staat fa do jedus bad cause e mek de man well pon de woshup day jedus tell um say me fada da wok all de time eben ta now an a da wok too wen jedus say dat de jew leada dem cide fa kill um fa sho cause e broke de jew law pon de woshup day an den too e eben say dat god e own fada so e mek esef same like god jedus ton ta de jew leada dem an e say a da tell oona fa true de son cyahn do nottin by esef e do jes wa e see e fada da do de son cyahn do nottin mo den dat wasoneba de fada do dat wa de son do too cause de fada lob e son an e da show um all wa e da do e gwine show de son mo ting wa e fa do wa a whole heap mo betta den dis ting yah dem gwine mek oona stonish bout um fa true jes like how de fada da mek people wa done dead git op come out fom dey grabe an mek um lib gin same fashion de son da gii life ta dem dat e wahn fa gim fodamo de fada esef ain jedge nobody e done gii e son all tority fa jedge people e do dat so dat all people gwine gii hona ta de son same like how dey gii hona ta de fada dem wa ain gii hona ta de son dey ain gii hona ta de fada wa sen de son eenta de wol a da tell oona fa true de poson wa da yeh me wod an bleebe pon de one wa sen me eenta de wol dat poson done got de true life wa ain neba gwine end an god ain gwine jedge um e been dead bot now e done cross oba ta de true life fa true de time da come an e done come now wen de people wa done dead gwine yeh wa god son da say an ebrybody wa yeh de son gwine lib cause de fada e de one weh life come fom an e got powa fa gii life same fashion e mek life come fom de son esef an e got powa fa gii life an de fada been gii de son de tority fa jedge all people cause de son e de man wa come fom god oona mus dohn be stonish bout dat de time da come wen all de people wa done dead an een dey grabe gwine yeh wa de son say dey gwine git op outta dey grabe dem wa beena do good gwine git op outta dey grabe an git life wa las faeba bot dem wa beena do bad dey gwine git op outta dey grabe an git jedge a ain got de tority fa do nottin by mesef a da jedge people same like how a yeh god tell me fa jedge um so den a jedge people de right way cause a ain da try fa do wa a wahn a da do wa me fada wa sen me wahn an no mo ef a say great ting bout mesef e ain gwine mount ta much cause nobody ain gwine bleebe wa a say bot dey a noda poson wa tell bout me an a know dat wa e say bout me dat de trute oona done sen messenja fa aks john bout me an wa john tell um dat de trute dat ain fa say dat a pend pon wa people say bout me a da tell oona dat wa john say bout me de trute so dat god kin sabe oona john been same like a lamp wa beena bun an de light shine bright fa mek all people see oona done gree fa leh de light shine pon oona fa a leetle wile an mek oona haat glad bot wa a da do show wa a da fa true mo den wa john say bout me a da do all wa me fada tell me fa do jes dat dem wok yah wa a da do da mek people know who a da dey show dat me fada sen me fa come eenta de wol an de fada wa sen me e too been say who a da oona ain neba yeh e boice oona ain neba see wa e look like an oona ain keep e wod een oona haat cause oona ain bleebe pon de one wa e sen fa come eenta de wol oona da study god wod haad cause oona tink dey gwine gii oona life wa las faeba an dem wod da tell bout me stillyet oona ain wahn fa come ta me so dat oona kin hab true life a ain da look fa people fa praise me bot a know oona a know oona ain lob god een oona haat a done come een me fada name e sen me wid e tority bot oona ain pay me no mind ef noda poson come een e own name an ain nobody sen um oona gwine pay mind ta um oona lob fa git praise fom one noda bot oona ain try fa git praise fom de onliest god so den how oona gwine bleebe wa a say bot oona mus dohn tink dat a gwine cuse oona ta de fada no moses de one wa gwine cuse oona ta de fada dat de same moses wa oona beena look fa sabe oona ef oona bleebe wa moses say fa true oona gwine bleebe wa a say cause moses write bout me bot oona ain bleebe wa e write bout me so den fa sho oona ain gwine bleebe wa a da say ainty atta wile jedus cross back oba lake galilee wa some call lake tiberias a big crowd ob people beena folla jedus cause dey see dem miracle wa e done wen e mek de sick people well jedus an e ciple dem gone op ta a mountain an seddown dey de time fa de jew passoba feas been close wen jedus look roun e see de big crowd ob people da come ta um so e aks philip say weh we gwine buy bread nuff fa feed dem people jedus say dat jes fa test philip fa see wa e gwine do cause jedus done been know wa e gwine do philip ansa jedus say fa gii all ob dem eben jes a leetle bit fa nyam we gwine haffa hab mo den two hundud silba coin fa buy de bread den noda one ob jedus ciple dem andrew de broda ob simon peter say dis leetle boy yah got fibe baaley bread an two fish bot dem ain gwine be nuff fa all dem people yah ainty jedus tell e ciple dem say oona mus tell de people fa seddown plenty grass been dey so ebrybody seddown dey been roun fibe tousan man dey jedus tek de bread an tell god tankya an den e gii out bread fa de people wa beena seddown e do de same ting wid de fish an all de people git all dey wahn fa nyam wen dey all been full op wid food jedus tell e ciple dem say mus geda op all de leetle piece dem wa lef oba mus dohn waste nottin so e ciple dem geda all de leetle piece dem wa been lef oba fom de fibe baaley bread atta de people done nyam an dey full op tweb basket wid bread wen de people see de miracle wa jedus done dey say fa true dis man de prophet wa moses say gwine come eenta de wol jedus know de people been wahn fa come git um an mek um king so e gone way gin op eenta de mountain e ain tek nobody wid um een de ebenin time de ciple dem gone ta de lake dey git eenta a boat an staat back cross de lake fa go ta capernaum night come an jedus still ain come ta um a big wind beena blow an de wata staat fa git rough de ciple dem row bout shree mile wen dey see jedus da waak pon de wata e waak op close ta de boat an dey been mos scaid ta det jedus tell um say dis me mus dohn be scaid wen dey know dat been jedus dey been heppy fa hep um eenta de boat an dat same time dey de boat reach lan weh dey beena go de crowd ob people beena stay dey ta de oda side ob de lake de nex day wen dey come fa see jedus dey memba dat jes one boat been dey dey know dat jedus ain been git eenta dat boat wid e ciple dem an de ciple dem done lef fa capernaum dout um den some oda boat dem come fom tiberias an lan close ta de place weh de crowd nyam de bread atta de lawd done tell god tankya fa de bread wen de people dem ain see jedus needa e ciple dem dey dey git eenta de boat dem an gone fa look fa jedus een capernaum wen de people cross ta de oda side ob de lake dey see jedus an dey aks um say teacha wen ya git yah jedus say a da tell oona fa true oona come da look fa me cause a been gii oona de bread an oona nyam til oona been sattify oona ain come ta me cause oona ondastan wa de miracle dem wa a da do mean oona mus dohn wok fa food wa ain gwine las stead ob dat oona mus wok fa de food wa da gii life wa ain neba gwine end dat de food wa de man wa come fom god gwine gii oona cause de fada god been show fa true dat e heppy wid me den de people aks jedus say wa we haffa do so dat we kin do de wok god wahn we fa do jedus ansa um say dis yah de wok wa god wahn oona fa do oona mus bleebe pon de one wa god sen eenta de wol dey aks um back say so den wa miracle ob powa ya gwine do so dat we gwine see an bleebe ya wa wok ya gwine do we ole people beena nyam de manna wen dey been dey een de wildaness like dey write een god book say e gim bread wa come fom heaben fa nyam jedus tell um say a da tell oona fa true ain moses wa been gii oona de bread wa come fom heaben me fada e de one wa da gii oona de true bread wa come fom heaben cause de bread wa god da gii dat de one wa da come down fom heaben an da gii people een de wol de true life den dey say please sah gii we dat bread all de time jedus tell um say a de bread wa da gii life ebrybody wa come ta me ain neba gwine git hongry an ebrybody wa bleebe pon me ain neba gwine git tosty bot like a done tell oona oona done see me stillyet oona ain bleebe pon me all dem wa me fada gii me gwine come ta me a ain neba gwine ton way nobody wa come ta me cause a come down fom heaben fa do wa de one wa sen me wahn me fa do a ain come down fom heaben fa do wa a wahn an de one wa sen me ain wahn me fa loss eben one ob all dem wa e done gii me e wahn me fa mek um all git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin pon de las day cause me fada wahn all people wa da look ta e son an bleebe pon um fa git life wa ain neba gwine end an a gwine mek um all git op fom mongst de dead pon de las day den de jew dem staat fa aagy ginst um cause jedus say a de bread wa come down fom heaben dey say dis man yah jedus joseph son ainty we know e fada an e modda how e kin say now a come down fom heaben jedus tell um say oona mus dohn grumble mongst one noda ain nobody kin come ta me cep me fada wa sen me bring dat poson ta me an a gwine mek dat poson git op fom mongst de dead people pon de las day de prophet dem been write say god gwine laan all dem wa dey fa do ebrybody wa pay mind ta de fada an laan wa e laan um dey gwine come ta me dat ain mean fa say dat dey done see de fada ain nobody see de fada cep de one wa come fom god e de onliest one wa see de fada a da tell oona fa true de poson wa bleebe pon me dat one dey done git true life wa ain neba gwine end a de bread wa da gii life oona ole people beena nyam de manna wen dey been dey een de wildaness stillyet dey done dead bot dis de bread wa come down fom heaben dat a poson kin nyam an e ain gwine dead a de bread wa da gii life wa come down fom heaben ebrybody wa da nyam dis bread dat one gwine git true life wa ain neba gwine end dis bread wa a gwine gii dat me body wa a gwine gii fa be a sacrifice so dat all people een de wol kin git true life dis wa jedus say mek de people bex an dey staat fa aagy wid one noda dey say how dis man yah gwine gii we e body fa nyam jedus tell um say a da tell oona fa true ef oona ain nyam de body ob de man wa come fom god an drink e blood oona ain gwine git no true life ebrybody wa nyam me body an drink me blood dey got true life wa ain neba gwine end an a gwine mek um git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin pon de las day cause me body de true food fa nyam an me blood de true drink ebrybody wa nyam me body an drink me blood dey da lib een me haat an a da lib een dey haat de fada wa da gii life e sen me fa come eenta de wol an de fada mek me git life same way so a gwine mek ebrybody wa nyam me body git life dis de bread wa come down fom heaben e ain like dat bread we ole people beena nyam wen dey been dey een de wildaness atta wile dey done dead bot de one wa nyam dis bread yah e gwine git life wa ain neba gwine end jedus tell de people all dem ting wen e beena laan um een de jew meetin house een capernaum plenty people wa beena folla jedus wen dey yeh dem wod dey say dem ting wa e da laan we dey too haad fa tek who kin gree fa do wa e da say jedus been know dat de people beena grumble bout wa e tell um eben dough nobody ain tell um so e aks um say dis ting mek oona wahn fa ton way fom me ainty well den wa gwine happen ef oona see de man wa come fom god da go back op ta de place weh e come fom god sperit da gii people life people ain got no powa fa gii life de wod dem wa a done tell oona dey da mek god sperit wa da gii life come ta oona stillyet some ob oona ain bleebe fom de time wen jedus fus staat fa laan de people e been know dem wa ain gwine bleebe pon um an de poson wa gwine sell um jedus taak gin say dis de ting wa mek me tell oona say ain nobody gwine come ta me cep de fada mek dat one able fa come ta me fom dat time dey plenty people wa beena folla jedus dey ton back an ain folla um no mo jedus aks de tweb ciple dem say oona wahn fa lef me too simon peter ansa say lawd who we gwine go ta ya de one wa da say dem wod wa da gii people life wa ain neba gwine end we bleebe an now we know dat ya de one dat god sen ta we den jedus say a done pick oona all tweb ainty stillyet one ob oona a debil jedus beena taak bout judas de son ob simon iscariot eben dough judas been one ob de tweb ciple dem e been gwine sell jedus atta dat jedus gone all roun galilee e ain been wahn fa go eenta judea cause de jew leada dem wa lib oba dey beena look fa kill um de jew feas ob tabernacle been close so e broda dem tell um say mus go way fom yah an go ta judea so dat de people wa da folla ya kin see dem miracle wa ya da do nobody ain gwine hide wa e da do wen e wahn people fa know um good ya da do dem miracle yah so den leh ebrybody een de wol know bout ya cause eben jedus own broda dem ain bleebe pon um jedus tell um say fa oona e ain matta wa time bot de time ain right fa me yet de people ob de wol dey boun fa like oona bot dey hate me cause a da tell um dat dey da do bad bot oona go head on ta jerusalem fa de feas a ain gwine dey cause de time fa me ain right atta jedus say dat e stay on een galilee atta jedus broda dem done gone ta jerusalem fa de feas jedus gone dey too e gone by esef so de people ain shim de jew leada dem beena look fa jedus dey dey beena aks de people fa um say weh dat man dey plenty people een de crowd beena whispa bout jedus some dem say jedus one good man oda dem say no jedus ain no good man e da fool de people bot nobody ain taak loud bout jedus fa mek de crowd yeh cause dey been scaid ob de jew leada dem de holiday feas done been gone bout haf way wen jedus gone ta god house an staat fa laan de people dey de jew leada dem stonish an dey aks say hoccome dis man know sommuch wen e ain been ta school eben one day jedus ansa um say e ain me own laanin a da laan oona bout de one wa sen me e tell me wa fa laan oona ebrybody wa wahn fa do wa god wahn dey gwine know ef god da tell me wa a da laan people or ef wa a da taak da come jes fom me de poson wa da tell jes wa da come fom esef e da try fa mek people praise um bot de poson wa wahn fa mek people praise de one wa sen um dat poson trute mout e ain got no lie noweh bout um moses done gii oona de law ainty bot ain none ob oona da do wa de law say wa mek oona da try fa kill me de crowd ob people ansa say ya got a debil dey een ya who dat da try fa kill ya jedus ansa um say oona all been stonish wen a done one miracle stillyet moses done tell oona fa circumcise oona boy chullun bot fa true moses ain de one wa fus staat fa circumcise de ole people fus staat fa do dat so oona da circumcise boy chullun pon de woshup day now den ef oona circumcise boy chullun pon de woshup day so dat oona kin keep de law wa moses gii oona hoccome oona bex wid me cause a mek a poson well pon de woshup day oona mus dohn jedge jes wa oona da see mus jedge how ting da fa true den some de people dey een jerusalem beena aks say dis de man wa de jew leada dem da try fa kill ainty bot see yah e da taak yah weh ebrybody yeh um an dey ain say nottin ginst um ya spose de jew leada dem know fa true dat jedus e de messiah bot wen de messiah come nobody ain gwine know weh e come fom an we all know weh dis man come fom so wen jedus beena laan de people een god house e taak loud say oona tink ya know me good ainty an oona tink ya know weh a come fom bot a ain come yah on me own de one wa sen me e fa true an oona ain know um bot a know um cause a come fom um an e sen me den dey try fa grab hole ta jedus an res um bot ain nobody tetch um cause de time fa tek um ain come yet stillyet heapa people een de crowd bleebe pon jedus dey say wen de messiah christ come e ain gwine do no mo miracle den wa dis man yah done do ainty de pharisee dem yeh de crowd da whispa dem ting bout jedus so de pharisee dem an de leada dem ob de priest dem dey sen gyaad fom god house fa grab hole ta jedus an res um jedus say a gwine stay wid oona jes a leetle wile longa den a gwine back ta de one wa sen me fa come eenta de wol wen dat time come oona gwine look fa me bot oona ain gwine find me cause oona ain able fa go ta de place weh a da gwine de jew leada dem staat fa taak ta one noda say weh dis man tink e da gwine weh we ain gwine find um ya tink e da gwine ta dem town weh de jew people da lib mongst de people wa ain jew fa laan dem wa ain jew dey dis man say oona gwine look fa me bot oona ain gwine find me an e say oona ain able fa go ta de place weh a da gwine wa e mean fa say de las day ob de holiday feas been a big day mo bigga den all de oda day dat day jedus stanop an say een a loud boice ebrybody wa tosty leh um come ta me come drink dey done write een god book say ebrybody wa bleebe pon me a heapa wata wa da gii life gwine come out like a riba fom eenside dey haat jedus say dat bout de sperit wa all de people wa bleebe pon um gwine git god ain gim e sperit yet cause e ain sen jedus fa go op eenta heaben an git hona yet some people een de crowd yeh wa jedus say an dey say fa true dis man yah de prophet wa we beena look fa oda people say dis man yah de messiah bot some say de messiah ain gwine come outta galilee ainty ain dey been write een god book say de messiah gwine come fom de fambly ob de people leada king david de messiah gwine bon een betlem de town weh king david been lib ainty so den de people beena spute an tek side ginst one noda bout jedus some ob de people been wahn fa grab hole ta jedus an res um bot nobody ain tetch um de gyaad dem fom god house come back ta de leada dem ob de priest dem an de pharisee dem an dem leada an pharisee aks de gyaad hoccome dey ain bring jedus ta um de gyaad dem ansa say nobody ain neba taak like dis man yah de pharisee dem say oona mean fa say dat jedus done fool oona too oona ain neba know no jew leada needa no pharisee wa bleebe pon jedus ainty dis crowd ob people yah ain know de law wa god gii moses so god gwine punish um now den one ob de pharisee dem been nicodemus e de one wa been gone fa see jedus fo all dis happen nicodemus taak ta e broda pharisee dem e say we law say we mus dohn condemn a poson fo we yeh wa dat poson got fa say so dat we kin know wa e done ainty den e broda pharisee dem ansa nicodemus say well ya da taak like ya come outta galilee too tek time fa look at wa dey done write een god book an ya gwine laan dat dey ain no prophet wa eba come outta galilee an all ob um gone ta dey own house jedus gone ta de mount olib day clean de nex day jedus gone back ta god house all de people geda roun um an e seddown an e laan um de jew law teacha an pharisee dem bring one ooman wa dey been ketch da sleep wid a man wa ain e husban dey mek de ooman stanop fo all de people den dey tell jedus say teacha dey ketch dis ooman da sleep wid a man wa ain e husban we jew law wa god gii moses chaage we fa chunk stone pon ooman like dis til e dead wa ya say bout dat dey say dat fa yeh wa jedus gwine say dey beena try fa mek jedus say sompin so dat dey kin cuse um say e ain ansa right bot jedus stoop down an write pon de groun wid e finga de law teacha an pharisee dem beena keep on da aks jedus bout dat so jedus stanop an say ef one ob oona yah ain neba sin leh dat poson chunk de fus stone pon dis ooman den jedus stoop down gin an write pon de groun wen dey yeh wa jedus say dey all lef dey one by one de ole one dem fus come outta dey an den de nyoung one dem so den jes jedus been lef an de ooman beena still stanop dey jedus stanop an aks de ooman say weh ebrybody ain nobody yah fa condemn ya de ooman ansa say ain nobody yah sah jedus tell um say a ain gwine condemn ya needa ya kin go now bot mus dohn sin no mo wen jedus taak gin ta de people e say a de light ob de wol de one wa da folla me gwine hab de light wa da gii life an e ain gwine neba waak een de daak de pharisee dem say ya jes da taak bout yasef nobody ain yah fa stan fa ya so wa ya da say ain mean nottin jedus ansa um say ain nobody yah fa stan fa me bot a da taak true cause a know weh a come fom an weh a da gwine oona ain know weh a come fom an oona ain know weh a da gwine oona da jedge like how people jedge oda people a ain jedge nobody bot ef a fa jedge people a gwine jedge um scraight cause ain jes me wa gwine jedge um me fada wa sen me e yah wid me een oona own jew law dey write say wen two people say de same ting bout wa happen dat mean dey da taak true a da stan fa mesef an me fada wa sen me e da stan fa me dey aks um say weh ya fada dey jedus ansa oona ain know me an oona ain know me fada ef oona been know me oona been gwine know me fada too jedus say dem wod wen e beena laan de people een god house eenside de room weh de collection box been bot nobody ain res um cause de time fa res um ain come yet jedus tell de people gin say a gwine off oona gwine look fa me bot oona gwine dead wid all oona sin oona ain able fa gone ta de place weh a da gwine so de jew leada dem say dis man say we ain able fa gone ta de ondastan dat jedus beena tell um bout de fada wa dey een heaben so den jedus tell um say wen oona lif op de man wa come fom god den oona gwine know who a da oona gwine know dat a ain do nottin on me own a jes say wa de fada laan me fa say an de one wa sen me e dey wid me e ain lef me ta mesef cause all de time a da do jes wa e wahn me fa do plenty people wa yeh jedus say dem wod dey bleebe pon um so den jedus tell de jew dem wa bleebe pon um say ef oona keep on da do all wa a tell oona fa do oona me ciple fa true den oona gwine know de trute an de trute gwine mek oona free dey ansa jedus say man sin or e modda an e fada jedus ansa say de bline wa oona see een dis man eye yah ain got nottin fa do wid e own sin needa e modda an e fada sin e bline so dat people kin see de wok wa god gwine do een e life long as de daytime las we haffa do de wok wa de one wa sen me gii we fa do cause de night time da come an dey ain nobody gwine be able fa wok den wiles a dey yah een de wol a de light ob de wol atta jedus say dat e spit pon de groun den e mek mud wid de spit an e rub de mud pon de bline man eye e tell de man say mus go wash ya face een de wata ta de pool ob siloam siloam mean de one wa dey sen so de man gone an atta e wash e face dey een de wata jes den e able fa see e gone back ta e house e see ebryting e neighba dem an de people wa beena shim wen e nyuse fa beg dey say ain dis de man wa nyuse fa seddown an beg some people ansa say dat de man bot oda people say no dat ain de man e jes fabor um so den de man esef say a de man wa nyuse fa beg so de people aks um say hoccome ya kin see now de man ansa um de man dey call jedus mek mud wa e rub pon me eye den e tell me say mus go wash ya face een de wata ta de pool ob siloam so a gone an atta a wash me face a been able fa see
