oona ain bline dat mean dat oona guilty stillyet jedus say a da tell oona fa true de poson wa ain go shru de gyateway fa go eenside de sheep pen bot e climb een some oda side eenta weh de sheep dey e a tief an a robba de poson wa go shru de gyateway fa go eenside dat de shephud de one wa da mind de sheep fa true de gyateman kin open op de gyate fa de shephud an de sheep pay mind ta de shephud boice de shephud call e own sheep name an dey come ta um e da waak head ob um da lead um shru de gyateway outta de sheep pen an wen de shephud done lead all ob e own sheep out shru de gyateway e da waak head ob um an dey da folla um cause dey know e boice de sheep ain neba gwine folla noda poson wa dey ain know fa true dey gwine ron way fom noda poson cause dey ain know dat poson boice jedus tell dis paable ta de people bot dey ain ondastan wa e mean fa say so jedus tell um gin say a da tell oona fa true a de gyate fa de sheep fa go shru all dem people wa come fo me dey tief an robba an de sheep ain pay um no mind a de gyate ebrybody wa go shru me fa go eenside dey gwine be sabe dey gwine be free fa go een an come out fa go find green grass fa nyam de tief jes come fa tief fa kill an stroy bot a come so dat dey kin hab true life so dat dey kin lib a life ob joy wa heap op an ron oba a de good shephud de good shephud ready fa gii e life fa de sheep de poson wa git pay fa mind oda people sheep e ain no true shephud an de sheep ain blongst ta um so den de poson wa de sheep ain blongst ta wen e see de wolf da come e gwine ron way an lef de sheep den de wolf gwine come een pon dem sheep an grab hole ta one an de res ob de sheep gwine ron all oba de place de poson wa de sheep ain blongst ta e gwine ron way cause e dey fa git pay fa e wok so e ain cyah fa true bout no sheep a de good shephud jes like de fada know me an a know de fada same way so a know me own sheep an me own sheep know me an a ready fa gii me life fa de sheep a hab oda sheep wa blongst ta me bot dey ain een dis flock yah a haffa bring dem too an wen a taak ta um dey gwine pay mind ta me too so den all de sheep gwine come togeda an dey gwine be one flock an hab one shephud fa mind um me fada lob me cause a ready fa gii me life so dat wen a shru wid dat a gwine tek me life back op gin nobody ain gwine kill me ef a ain gree ta um a de one wa gree fa leh um kill me a got de powa fa gii me life an a got de powa fa tek me life back gin dat wa me fada done chaage me fa do wen de jew people yeh dem wod wa jedus say dey ain been able fa gree mongst deysef gin heapa dem say a ebil sperit dey een dat man e mad hoccome oona da listen ta um bot oda dem say ef a man got a ebil sperit een um e ain gwine taak like dat ain no way a ebil sperit able fa mek de bline see ainty winta time come an de people gone ta jerusalem fa de holiday dey call de feas ob de dedication an jedus been dey e beena waak een god house een de side dey call solomon piza de jew people geda roun um an aks um say how long ya gwine mek we wait ya mus tell we de plain trute so we kin ondastan ef ya de messiah dat god been promise jedus ansa um say a done tell oona bot oona ain bleebe me dem miracle wa a da do een me fada name dey da show oona dat a de messiah christ oona ain bleebe me cause oona ain me own sheep me sheep pay mind ta wa a da tell um a know um an dey da folla me a gim life wa las faeba dey ain gwine neba dead ain nobody able fa tek um outta me han me fada wa gii me dem sheep e hab powa mo bigga den all ain nobody able fa tek um outta me fada han me an me fada we one wen jedus say dat de jew people pick op stone gin fa stone um jedus tell um say a done do plenty miracle wa oona see an me fada gii me powa fa do um wish one ob dem miracle mek oona wahn fa stone me de jew people ansa um say we ain wahn fa stone ya fa none ob dem miracle wa ya done we wahn fa stone ya cause ya da hole god cheap ya jes a man bot ya da tek yasef fa be god jedus ansa um say een oona own law god say oona god dem ainty we know dat wa dey done write een god book true all de time an god done say ta de people wa e gii e wod ta dat dey god dem fa me own paat me fada done pick me fa do e wok an sen me fa come eenta de wol so wa mek oona say a da hole god cheap wen a say a de son ob god oona mus dohn bleebe me ef a ain da do wa me fada da do bot ef a da do wa me fada da do eben dough oona ain bleebe me now oona oughta bleebe cause oona see dem miracle wa a beena do cause ob dat oona kin know fa sho an ondastan dat me fada dey een me an a mesef dey een me fada den de people try fa grab hole ta jedus gin bot e git pass um den jedus cross back oba de jerden riba an gone ta de place weh john fus nyuse fa bactize people an e stay dey heapa people gone fa meet um dey an dey tell one noda say john ain neba done no miracle bot ebryting wa e say bout dis man yah all dem ting been true an a heapa people een dat place bleebe pon jedus one man name lazarus been sick e beena lib een bethany de town weh mary an e sista martha beena lib dis mary yah dat same ooman wa been pour pafume pon de lawd foot an den wipe um wid e hair e broda lazarus de one wa sick so de two sista dem sen wod ta jedus say lawd ya fren wa ya lob e sick wen jedus yeh dat e say dis ailment yah ain gwine mean dat lazarus gwine dead dis ailment happen fa mek people see god powa an praise um an so dat de son ob god gwine git praise jedus lob martha an e sista an lazarus stillyet wen jedus yeh dat lazarus been sick e stay two mo day een de place weh e been atta de two day done pass e tell e ciple dem say leh we go back ta judea e ciple dem tell jedus say teacha jes a leetle time back de jew dem wa lib dey beena try fa stone ya now ya wahn fa go back dey jedus ansa um say dey tweb hour fom sunop til sundown ainty so ef somebody da waak een de daytime e ain gwine stumble cause e da see de light wa dey een dis wol bot de one wa da waak een de night time gwine stumble cause e ain got no light een um jedus say dat an den e say fodamo we fren lazarus done gone fa sleep bot a gwine wake um op de ciple dem say lawd ef lazarus da sleep e gwine git well wen jedus say lazarus done gone fa sleep e wahn fa mek e ciple dem ondastan dat lazarus done dead bot de ciple dem beena tink jedus mean fa say lazarus jes da sleep so jedus tell um plain say lazarus done dead bot fa oona sake a glad a ain been dey wid um cause dat gwine leh oona laan fa bleebe pon me leh we gone ta um thomas wa dey call de twin e tell de oda ciple dem say leh we all go long wid de teacha too so we kin dead wid um wen jedus git ta lazarus place e find out say lazarus been dead fo day e ain been two mile tween bethany an jerusalem an heapa jew dem done been come fa tell martha an mary dat dey saary dey broda lazarus dead wen martha yeh say jedus da come e gone fa meet um bot mary ain come outta de house martha tell jedus say lawd ef ya been yah me broda ain been fa dead stillyet a know eben now god gwine gii ya wasoneba ya aks um fa jedus tell martha say ya broda gwine git op an come outta e grabe e gwine lib gin martha ansa say a know e gwine git op an come outta e grabe pon de las day wen all people gwine git op an come outta dey grabe jedus tell um say a da mek people git op an come outta dey grabe an a da gim life de one wa bleebe pon me eben dough e done dead stillyet e gwine lib gin an de one wa da lib an bleebe pon me e ain neba gwine dead ya bleebe dat martha ansa say yeah lawd a bleebe ya de messiah christ god son wa been fa come eenta de wol atta martha done say dat e gone back an call e sista mary off by esef e tell um say de teacha come an e da aks fa ya wen mary yeh dat e git op an mek hace an gone fa meet jedus jedus ain git ta de willage yet e still been dey een de place weh martha been meet um de jew people wa beena sit wid mary dey een e house fa ease e haat dey see mary git op an mek hace an go out so dey folla um dey beena tink e beena gwine ta lazarus grabe fa weep dey wen mary git ta de place weh jedus been an e shim e git down pon de groun down by e foot an say lawd ef ya been yah me broda ain been fa dead wen jedus see how mary an de jew dem wa been come long wid um beena weep e haat been too hebby an e beena trouble fa true jedus aks um say weh oona bury um dey ansa lawd come see de place jedus weep de jew dem say look yah oona kin see e beena lob lazarus a whole heap bot some ob dem say jedus done open op de bline man eye ainty hoccome e ain been able fa keep lazarus fom det jedus haat been too hebby gin e gone ta de tomb dat tomb been a cabe a big rock wid a hole een um an a stone been dey da kiba de doormout jedus say oona mus moob de stone fom de doormout martha de sista ob de one wa done dead say lawd de place gwine smell bad cause e been fo day now since we bury um jedus tell martha say ain a tell ya say ya gwine see god powa ef ya bleebe pon me so dey moob de stone fom de doormout jedus look op an pray say fada a da tell ya tankya cause ya done yeh me an ansa me wen a pray a know ya yeh me an ansa me all de time bot a da say dis fa sake ob dem people wa da stanop yah so dey kin bleebe dat ya sen me wen jedus done say dat e holla een a loud boice say lazarus come outta dey lazarus come outta e tomb e two han an e two foot been wrop op wid linen closs an a closs piece been wrop roun e face jedus tell de people say loose de closs dem an leh um go so den a heapa de jew dem wa been come fa sit wid mary dey see wa jedus done an dey bleebe pon um bot some ton back an gone an tell de pharisee dem wa jedus done den de jew priest leada dem an de leada ob de pharisee dem call a meetin wid de oda jew leada dem ob de council dey say wa we fa do oona see all de miracle dem wa dis man yah da do ef we lef um lone fa do mo ob dem miracle all de people gwine bleebe pon um an wen dat happen de roman dem gwine come fa tek way we house ob god an stroy we people too one man dey name caiaphas dat yeah e been de head man ob de priest leada dem e say oona ain know nottin tall oona ain ondastan dat e mo betta fa leh jes one man dead fa sake ob all de people den fa leh dem roman stroy all we people caiaphas ain jes say dem wod yah on e own bot wen e been de head man dat yeah ob de priest leada dem e beena tell de people head ob time say jedus gwine dead fa sake ob all de jew people an jedus ain dead jes fa de jew people e dead fa all god chullun dem people wa scatta all bout an fa bring um togeda fa be one fambly fom de day wen caiaphas say dat de jew leada dem mek scheme fa kill jedus cause ob dat jedus ain waak out een de open gin weh all de jew dem been able fa shim e lef judea an gone ta a place close ta de wildaness ta a town name ephraim oba dey e stay wid e ciple dem de time fa de passoba feas been close so plenty people gone fom roun de countryside ta jerusalem dey gone fa do de ting dem wa fa mek um clean een god eye same like how de jew law say fo de time fa de passoba come dey beena look fa jedus wen dey geda een god house dey beena aks one noda say wa ya tink jedus ain gwine come ta de passoba feas tall ainty now den de jew priest leada dem an de leada ob de pharisee dem beena chaage de people say ef one ob oona know weh jedus dey ya mus tell we so dat we kin go res um six day fo de passoba holiday staat jedus gone ta bethany weh lazarus lib dat de man wa done dead an jedus mek um git op fom e tomb an lib gin some ob jedus fren dem beena cook suppa fa hona jedus martha beena hep fa saab de food an lazarus one ob de people wa beena seddown longside de table wid jedus wiles dey beena nyam mary git a whole pint ob pafume dey mek dat pafume fom jes de nard plant an e cost a whole heapa money mary pour dat pafume pon jedus foot den e wipe um op wid e hair all de people een de house beena smell de sweet scent ob dat pafume one ob jedus ciple dem judas iscariot wa been gwine ton jedus een e ain like wa mary done e say hoccome dey ain sell dis pafume yah fa shree hundud silba coin an gii de money ta de po people wa ain got nottin judas ain say dat cause e been wahn fa hep de people wa ain got nottin e say dat cause e been a tief e beena keep de money bag fa jedus an e ciple dem bot e beena tief some dat money fa esef bot jedus say mus dohn bodda dat ooman e right dat e done dat fa de day wen dey gwine bury me dem people wa ain got nottin gwine stay wid oona all de time bot a mesef ain gwine stay wid oona all de time a whole heapa jew people yeh say jedus been dey een bethany so dey gone dey dey ain gone jes fa meet jedus dey gone dey fa see lazarus too de man wa done dead an jedus mek um git op fom e tomb an lib gin so de leada dem ob de priest dem beena mek scheme fa kill lazarus too cause wen jedus mek lazarus lib gin a heapa jew people lef dey leada dem an bleebe pon jedus de nex day de big crowd wa been come ta jerusalem fa de passoba feas dey yeh say jedus beena come ta jerusalem so den dey cut a whole heapa palm branch an gone out fa meet jedus een de road dey beena holla say praise god god bless de one wa come een de name ob de lawd god bless de king ob israel jedus find a nyoung donkey an e ride pon um all dis been jes like dey been write een god book say oona mus dohn be scaid oona wa dey een zion look yonda oona king da come e da ride pon a nyoung donkey jedus ciple dem ain been ondastan wa dat mean bot wen god done mek jedus git op outta e tomb an lib gin an god gim hona an glory fa true de ciple dem memba say dis wod wa been write een god book been bout jedus an dey see dat all wa been write down e happen jes like god book say de crowd wa been dey wid jedus wen e call lazarus fa come outta e tomb an mek um lib gin dey beena spread de nyews bout wa happen dat mek a whole heapa people go out fa meet jedus cause dey been yeh say e done do dat miracle den de pharisee dem tell one noda say see dey we ain able fa do nottin all de people da folla um some greek people been dey mongst de people wa gone fa woshup god een jerusalem wen de time fa de feas come dem greek gone ta philip e de one wa come fom bethsaida dey een galilee dey tell philip say sah we wahn fa see jedus philip gone an tell andrew an den dem two gone an tell jedus wa de greek people been wahn jedus ansa um say de time done yah wen god gwine show de true glory ob de man wa come fom god a da tell oona fa true one seed ob wheat jes gwine stay one seed ef e ain faddown an go eenta de groun an dead bot ef dat seed go eenta de groun an dead e gwine grow an beah a whole heapa seed de poson wa lob e own life gwine loss um bot ebrybody wa hate e own life een dis wol gwine keep e life faeba de poson wa da wok fa me e haffa do wa a tell um fa do de poson wa da wok fa me e gwine stay wid me wehsoneba a da fodamo me fada gwine gii hona ta ebrybody wa da wok fa me now me haat burden down an wa a gwine say a cyahn say fada sabe me fom dat hour wen a gwine suffa cause ob dis bery ting a come eenta dis wol fada mek people see dat dey oughta gii ya glory den a boice speak fom outta heaben say a done mek people see dat dey oughta gii me glory an a gwine mek um see dat gin de crowd wa beena stanop dey yeh de boice an dey say e been tunda oda people say a angel taak ta um bot jedus say dis boice yah ain taak fa sake ob me e taak fa oona sake dis de time now wen god gwine jedge all de people een de wol an dis de time now wen e gwine win out oba de one wa da rule dis wol an dribe um out wen dey hice me op fom de groun a gwine draw all people ta me wen jedus say dat e beena tell bout how e gwine dead de crowd ansa jedus say we law da say de messiah ain gwine dead e gwine lib faeba hoccome ya say e haffa happen dat dey gwine hice op de man wa come fom god who dat dis man wa come fom god jedus tell um say de light gwine stay wid oona jes a leetle bit mo oona mus waak wiles de light dey dey so dat de daak ain gwine meet oona wen oona da waak cause de one wa da waak een de daak ain know weh e da gwine now wen de light dey wid oona bleebe pon de light so dat oona kin be de kinda people wa stay een de light all de time atta jedus say dat e lef de people an gone ta a place weh dey ain been able fa find um eben dough jedus beena do all dem miracle wa de people see fa deysef dey still ain been bleebe pon jedus all dis happen so dat de wod wa de prophet isaiah been say gwine come true e say lawd who dat wa been bleebe we wod who dat de lawd show e powa ta de people ain able fa bleebe cause like isaiah say dis yah too god done bline de people eye an e done mek dey haat haad so dat dey ain able fa see wid dey eye an dey ain able fa ondastan wid dey haat an dey ain ton ta me fa heal um isaiah say dem wod yah cause e see how god gwine gii jedus glory stillyet eben heapa jew tority dem bleebe pon jedus een dat time bot cause dey been scaid ob de pharisee dem dey ain tell oda people dat dey bleebe pon jedus dey been scaid de tority dem gwine dribe um outta de jew meetin house dey been lob fa hab praise fom people mo den dey lob fa hab praise fom god jedus taak een a loud boice say ebrybody wa bleebe pon me e ain jes bleebe pon me e da bleebe pon de one wa sen me too an wen somebody da look at me e da see de one wa sen me a done come eenta de wol like light so dat ebrybody wa bleebe pon me ain gwine stay een de daak wen somebody yeh me wod an ain do wa a da tell um a ain gwine jedge um a ain come fa jedge de people een de wol a come fa sabe de people dey a jedge dey wa gwine jedge ebrybody wa ton e back pon me ebrybody wa ain wahn fa bleebe de wod wa a da say dem wod wa a done say gwine condemn dat one wen de las day come dat so e stan cause a ain jes da taak on me own me fada wa sen me done chaage me e tell me wa a haffa say an how a haffa say um an a know dat de wod wa me fada chaage me fa say dat da mek people git life wa gwine las faeba so den wa me fada tell me fa say dat jes wa a da say de time ob de passoba feas come close an jedus been know de time been come fa um fa lef dis wol an gone back ta de fada fom de fus jedus been lob e own people een de wol dem wa bleebe pon um now e da show um fa true hommuch e lob um een de ebenin jedus an e ciple dem beena nyam de debil been pit eenta judas haat dat e oughta ton jedus een ta dem wa been ginst um dis judas yah been simon iscariot chile jedus been know dat de fada been gim all powa fa win out oba ebryting e been know dat e come fom god an e gwine go back ta god so jedus git op fom de table weh dey been seddown da nyam e pull off e robe wa e weah oba e oda cloes an tie a towel roun e wais den e pit wata een a basin an staat fa wash e ciple dem foot e dry um wid de towel wa been tie roun e wais wen jedus come ta simon peter peter aks jedus say lawd ya da come fa wash me foot jedus ansa um say ya ain ondastan wa a da do now bot ya gwine ondastan um by an by simon peter tell jedus say no ya ain neba gwine wash me foot jedus ansa say ef a ain wash ya foot ya ain got no place wid me so simon peter tell jedus say well den lawd ef dat so e stan mus dohn wash jes me foot mus wash me han an me head too jedus ansa um say de one wa done wash e body ain need fa wash e body gin cause e done clean all oba e jes need fa wash e foot wa git dorty gin oona clean bot all ob oona ain clean jedus done been know who dat gwine ton um een ta dem wa been ginst um dat mek um say oona clean bot all ob oona ain clean wen jedus been wash all de ciple dem foot e pit on e robe gin oba e oda cloes den e gone an seddown gin ta de table weh e beena nyam e aks e ciple dem say oona ondastan wa a jes done ta oona oona da call me teacha an lawd an oona right wen oona say dat cause dat wa a da now den a oona lawd an teacha done wash oona foot same fashion oona oughta wash one noda foot a done do dat fa show oona wa oona oughta do so dat oona gwine do de same ting a da tell oona fa true ain no saabant wa mo betta den e massa an ain no messenja wa mo greata den de one wa sen um now dat oona know dat oona gwine be heppy fa true ef oona do dat jes like a done tell oona fa do a ain da taak bout all ob oona a know dem wa a done pick bot wa dey done write een god book haffa happen dey write say de one wa da nyam me bread done ton ginst me a da tell oona now wa gwine happen so dat wen e happen oona gwine bleebe a da who a da a da tell oona fa true whosoneba gii haaty welcome ta de one wa a sen dat poson da gii haaty welcome ta me too an whosoneba gii haaty welcome ta me dat poson da gii haaty welcome ta de one wa sen me wen jedus done say dat e haat been hebby an e taak plain say a da tell oona fa true one ob oona gwine ton me een ta dem wa ginst me de ciple dem been bumfumble dey look at one noda cause dey ain know wish one ob dem jedus beena taak bout one ob e ciple dem wa jedus lob a whole heap e beena seddown close ta jedus simon peter mek sign ta dat ciple wa close ta jedus an say aks um wish one e da taak bout so dat ciple moob mo close ta jedus aks um say lawd who dat ya da taak bout jedus ansa say a gwine dip dis piece ob bread eenta de sauce an gim ta um dat de man so jedus dip de piece ob bread eenta de sauce an gim ta judas simon iscariot chile jes wen judas tek dat bread satan gone eenta e haat jedus tell judas say wa ya gwine do go do um quick none ob de oda ciple dem wa beena seddown ta de table fa nyam wid jedus ain ondastan hoccome jedus tell judas dat since judas beena keep de money bag fa um some tink jedus been tell judas fa go buy ting wa dey need fa de passoba feas or dey tink say jedus been tell judas fa go gii sompin ta de po people jes wen judas tek de bread e lef an gone out quick an e been daak atta judas gone jedus tell de oda ciple dem say now god gwine show de people de glory ob de man wa come fom god an god gwine nyuse de man wa come fom god fa show god glory an ef de man wa come fom god show de people god glory den god gwine show de glory ob de man wa come fom god an god gwine do dat now me chullun a ain gwine stay yah wid oona much mo longa oona gwine look fa me bot a da tell oona same wa a done tell dem jew leada oona cyahn go ta de place weh a da gwine an now a da gii oona a nyew chaage oona fa lob one noda same fashion a done lob oona same fashion oona fa lob one noda ef oona da lob one noda ebrybody gwine know dat oona me ciple dem simon peter aks jedus say lawd weh ya da gwine jedus ansa say oona cyahn folla me now an go weh a da gwine bot atta a wile ya gwine folla me dey peter aks jedus say lawd hoccome a cyahn folla ya dey now a ready fa gii me life fa ya jedus ansa say ya ready fa gii ya life fa me fa true a da tell ya fo de roosta crow demarra maanin shree time ya gwine say ya ain know me jedus tell e ciple dem say mus dohn leh oona haat be hebby mus trus god an trus een me too plenty room dey een me fada house a gwine dey fa mek de place ready fa oona ef e ain been so a been fa tell oona an atta a done mek de place ready fa oona a gwine come back fa tek oona wid me an go ta dat place so dat oona too gwine be weh a da oona know de way fa git ta de place weh a da gwine thomas aks jedus say lawd we ain know weh ya da gwine so how we kin know de way fa git dey jedus ansa um say a de way a de trute an a de life ain nobody kin come ta de fada cep e go shru me ef oona been know me fa true oona been gwine know me fada too an fom now on oona know um an oona da shim philip aks jedus say lawd show we de fada dat all we need jedus ansa philip say a done lib mongst oona all dis long time stillyet ya ain know me philip ebrybody wa done see me done see me fada hoccome ya say show we de fada ain ya bleebe a lib een de fada an de fada lib een me den jedus say ta all e ciple dem e ain jes me wod wa a done tell oona bot de fada wa da lib een me e da do e own wok oona mus bleebe me wen a da tell oona say de fada lib een me an a lib een de fada bot ef oona ain bleebe me wen a say dat oona mus bleebe me wen oona memba dem miracle a da do a da tell oona fa true ebrybody wa bleebe pon me gwine do miracle same like a da do e gwine do ting wa eben mo greata den a da do cause a da gwine ta de fada wasoneba oona aks fa een me name a gwine do wa oona wahn so dat de son gwine gii glory ta de fada oona kin aks fa anyting een me name an a gwine do um ef oona lob me oona gwine do wa a tell oona fa do a gwine pray ta de fada fa gii oona noda one fa come longside oona fa hep an lib wid oona faeba dat de holy sperit wa da mek people know de trute de people een de wol ain able fa leh dis holy sperit een dey life cause dey ain shim an dey ain know um bot oona know um cause e da lib wid oona an e gwine stay een oona wen a gone oona ain gwine be lef like chullun wa ain got nobody fa hep um a gwine come back ta oona soon de people een de wol ain gwine see me no mo bot oona gwine see me an cause a hab de true life oona gwine hab de true life too wen dat day come oona gwine know a da lib een me fada an oona da lib een me same like a da lib een oona ebrybody wa know wa a done chaage um fa do an do um dat de one wa lob me fa true me fada gwine lob dat one wa lob me an a gwine lob um too an a gwine mek dat one know me mo an mo judas not judas iscariot aks um say lawd hoccome e jes we ya gwine mek know who ya da hoccome ya ain gwine mek all de people een de wol know who ya da jedus ansa um say de one wa lob me gwine do wa a laan um fa do me fada gwine lob dat one an me an me fada gwine come ta um an lib wid um de one wa ain lob me ain gwine do wa a laan um fa do dem wod wa a da laan oona dey ain me own wod dey de fada wod wa e sen me fa laan oona a done tell oona dem wod now wiles a still yah wid oona bot de one wa gwine longside oona fa hep dat de holy sperit de fada gwine sen um ta oona een me name de holy sperit gwine laan oona all ting an mek oona memba all a done tell oona now dat a da gwine way fom yah a da gii oona peace een oona haat me own peace a da gii oona a ain da gii oona de kind ob peace dat de people an de ting een dis wol yah da gii oona mus dohn leh oona haat be hebby bout nottin mus dohn be scaid oona done yeh me tell oona say a da gwine way fom yah bot a gwine come back ta oona ef oona been lob me oona been gwine know fa true dat a da gwine ta de fada cause de fada mo greata den me a done tell oona all dis fo e happen so dat wen e happen oona gwine bleebe a ain got much mo time fa taak ta oona now cause de one wa da rule oba dis wol e da come bot e ain got no powa oba me bot de people een de wol haffa know a lob de fada an cause ob dat a do jes wa e chaage me fa do oona come now leh we gone fom yah a de true wine an me fada de one wa tek cyah ob de gyaaden ebry wine branch wa been jine ta me bot e ain beah no fruit me fada cut um off an ebry branch wa da beah fruit e da trim um back so dat branch kin beah mo fruit de wod wa a done tell oona done mek oona haat clean oona mus stay one wid me all de time an a gwine stay one wid oona de wine branch wa stay ta esef an ain jine ta de wine dat branch ain able fa beah no fruit e haffa be jine ta de wine fa beah fruit same way so oona cyahn do nottin fa god cep oona stay one wid me all de time a de wine oona de branch dem whosoneba stay jine ta me all de time e gwine beah a heapa fruit fa me fada oona cyahn do nottin ef ya ain jine ta me whosoneba ain stay jine ta me all de time e same like a wine branch wa cut off ta esef dey shrow um way an den e dry op dey gwine geda dem dead branch an chunk um eenta de fire weh dey gwine bun ef ya stay jine ta me an me wod stay een ya haat ya kin aks me fada fa wasoneba ya wahn an e gwine gim ta ya ef oona beah a heapa fruit fa me fada oona gwine show people dat oona gii glory ta um an oona gwine show dat oona me ciple dem a lob oona same like me fada lob me now den oona mus lib een me lob all de time ef ya do wa a chaage oona fa do ya gwine lib een me lob same fashion a beena do wa me fada chaage me fa do an a da lib een de lob ob me fada a done tell oona dis so dat oona kin lib full op wid me joy a da chaage oona fa do dis oona mus lob one noda same fashion a done lob oona ain nobody hab no mo lob den de one wa gii e life fa de sake ob e fren dem oona me fren ef oona do wa a chaage oona fa do a ain da call oona me saabant no mo cause de saabant ain know wa e massa da do steada dat a da call oona me fren cause a done tell oona all wa me fada done laan me oona ain pick me a de one wa done pick oona fa go an beah a heapa fruit fruit wa gwine las den de fada gwine gii oona wasoneba oona aks um fa ef oona tek me name wen oona aks so den dis wa a da chaage oona fa do oona mus lob one noda ef de people een de wol hate oona oona mus memba dat dey been hate me fo dey hate oona ef oona blongst ta de wol den de people ob de wol gwine lob oona same like dey lob dey own bot oona ain blongst ta de wol a done pick oona fa come out fom mongst um cause ob dat dey hate oona mus memba wa a done tell oona say de saabant ain no mo betta den e massa de people mek me suffa an dey gwine mek oona suffa too some ob dem beena do wa a laan um an dey gwine do wa oona laan um bot dey gwine do all dem ting ta oona cause oona done tek me name cause dey ain know de one wa sen me ef a ain come an taak ta um dem people ain been fa know dey da sin bot now dat a done come dey ain hab no scuse fa dey sin de one wa hate me e hate me fada too de people ain been guilty ob dey sin ef a ain beena do all dem miracle wiles a been dey wid um ain no oda one neba done susha miracle bot now dey done see dem miracle wa a done stillyet dey hate me an dey hate me fada too bot dat so e haffa be so dat dem ting kin come same like wa been write een dem people own law say dey hate me bot a ain done nottin fa mek um hate me de one wa da go longside people fa hep um e gwine come e de sperit wa da come fom me fada an e gwine mek people know de trute a gwine sen de sperit ta oona fom me fada an e gwine come an tell bout me an oona mus go an tell bout me too cause oona been dey wid me fom de time wen a fus staat fa laan people jedus say a done tell oona all dis so dat oona ain gwine fall fom oona fait een me de jew people gwine dribe oona outta dey meetin house an fodamo de time da come wen de poson wa kill oona gwine tink dat e da do wa god wahn um fa do dey gwine do dem ting ta oona cause dey ain neba know de fada an dey ain neba know me needa bot a done tell oona dis now so dat wen de time come wen dey da do dem ting ta oona oona gwine memba wa a done tell oona a ain tell oona dis wen a fus staat fa laan oona cause den a been dey wid oona een dat time bot now a da gwine back ta de one wa sen me fa come eenta de wol stillyet ain none ob oona aks me weh a da gwine now dat a done tell oona all dis oona haat hebby bot a da tell oona fa true e mo betta fa oona ef a gone way cause ef a ain gone de one wa come longside oona fa hep e ain gwine come ta oona bot ef a gone way a gwine sen um ta oona an wen e come e gwine mek de people een de wol know dat dey been wrong bout sin e gwine mek um know dat dem ting wa dey tink right dey ain right an e gwine mek um know dat god gwine jedge all people e gwine mek people know dat dey been wrong bout sin cause dey ain bleebe pon me e gwine mek people know dat dem ting wa dey tink right dey ain right cause a da gwine ta de fada an oona ain gwine see me no mo e gwine mek people know dat god gwine jedge all people cause god done condemn de debil wa da rule dis wol a got plenty mo fa tell oona bot dat mo den oona kin stan jes now bot god sperit wa da mek people know de trute e da come an e gwine hep oona know all ting wa true an wa e say ain gwine come fom esef e gwine say jes wa e yeh fom god an e gwine tell oona bout dem ting wa gwine happen by an by e gwine gii hona ta me cause e gwine tek me wod an mek oona know wa a say all wa blongst ta de fada blongst ta me too dat hoccome a say de holy sperit gwine tek wa a gim an mek oona know wa a say atta leetle wile oona ain gwine see me no mo bot den atta leetle wile mo oona gwine see me gin some ob e ciple dem aks one noda say wa e try fa say e say atta leetle wile oona ain gwine see me an e say den atta leetle wile mo oona gwine see me gin an e say too dat so cause a da gwine ta de fada wa e mean wen e say atta leetle wile we ain know wa e da taak bout jedus know dat de ciple dem been wahn fa aks um bout dat so e tell um say a say atta leetle wile oona ain gwine see me bot den atta leetle wile mo oona gwine see me gin ain dat wa oona da aks one noda bout a tell oona fa true oona gwine weep an wail bot de people een de wol gwine rejaice fa true oona gwine be burden down bot by an by oona gwine rejaice fa true wen a ooman time come fa bon e chile e burden down cause e time done come fa suffa bot wen e done hab e chile e fagit de pain wa e been suffa cause e da rejaice dat a chile been bon eenta de wol same fashion oona burden down now bot de time da come wen a gwine see oona gin an dat gwine mek oona rejaice fa true an ain nobody gwine be able fa tek dat joy way fom oona wen dat time come oona ain gwine aks me fa nottin a da tell oona fa true me fada gwine gii oona wasoneba oona aks um fa wen oona aks um een me name til now oona ain aks god fa nottin een me name aks god an e gwine gii oona wa oona aks fa den oona haat gwine be full op wid joy a beena laan oona all dem ting yah een paable bot de time da come wen a ain gwine tell um een paable no mo a gwine taak plain ta oona bout me fada wen dat time come oona gwine aks um een me name a ain say dat a gwine aks de fada fa oona sake cause de fada esef lob oona e lob oona cause oona lob me an oona bleebe a come fom de fada a come fom de fada eenta de wol an now a da gwine fom de wol an a da gwine back ta me fada jedus ciple dem tell um say see yah ya da taak plain now ya ain da taak een paable we know now dat ya know ebryting ya ain haffa hab nobody aks ya queshon dat mek we bleebe god done sen ya jedus ansa um say oona bleebe me fa true now ainty bot de time da come an e yah now wen dey gwine mek all ob oona scatta ebrybody gwine ron way ta e own house oona gwine lef me all ta mesef stillyet a ain gwine be lef all ta mesef fa true cause de fada right yah wid me a done tell oona all dem ting yah so dat oona wa come fa be one wid me kin hab peace een oona haat een dis wol oona gwine hab trouble pon ebry han bot mus dohn be scaid a done win out oba de wol atta jedus say dis e look op ta heaben an e pray say fada de time done come gii glory ta ya son so dat ya son kin gii glory ta ya cause ya done gii de son tority oba all people so dat e kin gii life wa las faeba ta all dem people wa ya done gim now den fa git dat life wa las faeba dey fa know ya de onliest true god an dey fa know jedus christ wa ya done sen ta dem a done bring glory ta ya mongst de people ob de wol a done done de wok ya gii me fa do fada gii me glory now een de place weh ya da gii me dat same glory wa a hab fo de wol staat a done laan dem bout ya dem wa ya gii me dey been ya own people ya gii me um an dey done do all dat ya wod tell um fa do an now dey know dat all wa ya gii me e come fom ya cause a done gim de wod wa ya gii me an dey done pay mind ta um dey know dat a come out fom ya fa true an dey bleebe ya been sen me eenta de wol a da pray fa de people wa ya done gii me cause dey ya own people a ain pray fa de oda people een de wol wa ain ya own all me own people blongst ta ya an all ya own people blongst ta me an dey da bring glory ta me an now a da come back ta ya a ain gwine stay een de wol no mo bot dem ya gii me gwine stay een de wol do please holy fada keep dem safe by de powa een ya name de name ya gii me so dat dey all kin be one an hab one haat same like we hab one haat wiles a been still wid dem a beena keep um safe wid dat powa een ya name de name ya gii me a beena keep dem safe ain none ob dem been loss cep de man wa boun fa scruction so dat wa done been write een god book gwine happen now a da come back ta ya bot a da say dem ting yah now wiles a still een de wol so dat dem wa ya gii me kin be full op wid me joy a done gim ya wod an de oda people een de wol been hate um cause dey ain blongst ta de wol same like a ain blongst ta de wol a ain aks ya fa tek um way fom outta de wol bot a da aks ya fa keep um safe dohn leh de ebil one do um no haam a ain blongst ta de wol same way so dey ain blongst ta de wol leh ya wod wa true fa sho mek dem ya own people a done sen dem eenta de wol same like ya done sen me eenta de wol a ya own fa true fa dey sake so dat dey too kin be ya own fa true a ain da pray jes fa dem a da pray too fa de oda res wa gwine bleebe pon me cause ob wa me ciple dem gwine tell um bout me a da pray fada leh all ob um hab one haat same like ya dey een me an a dey een ya leh dem all hab one haat wid we so dat de oda people een de wol kin bleebe dat ya done sen me a done gii glory same like ya gii glory ta me so dat dey all kin hab one haat like we hab one haat a dey een dem an ya dey een me a da pray leh dem lib wid one haat like one poson so dat de oda people een de wol kin know ya done sen me an ya beena lob dem same like ya beena lob me fada ya done gii dem ta me an a wahn fa hab dem wid me dey weh a da gwine so dat dey kin see de glory ya gii me ya done gii me dat glory cause ya done been lob me fo de wol been mek fada wa da do wa scraight all de time de oda people een de wol ain know ya bot a know ya an dem yah wa ya gii me know dat ya been sen me a done show ya ta um an a gwine keep on da show ya ta um so dat dey kin lob me an dey kin lob one noda same like ya lob me an a mesef kin be dey een dem wen jedus been pray dem wod e an e ciple dem lef dat place dey cross oba a creek wa dey call kidron den e gone wid e ciple dem eenta a gyaaden dey wa hab plenty olib tree judas wa han oba jedus ta e enemy dem been know dat place good cause jedus an e ciple dem been meet dey plenty time so judas gone fa meet jedus een de gyaaden wid some roman sodja dem an some ob dem man wa gyaad god house de leada dem ob de jew priest dem an de pharisee dem sen de gyaad fa go wid judas dey beena tote oll lamp an toch an weapon fa fight wid jedus been know all wa gwine happen ta um so e gone fa meet dem people e aks um say who oona da look fa dey ansa say we da look fa jedus wa come fom nazareth jedus say dis yah me a jedus judas wa come fa han jedus oba beena stanop dey wid dem people wen jedus say dis yah me a jedus de people moob back an faddown ta de groun jedus aks um gin say who oona da look fa dey say we da look fa jedus wa come fom nazareth jedus ansa um say a done tell oona dat a jedus ef oona da look fa me leh dese oda man go den dis happen so dat wa e been say gwine happen e happen jes like e say cause e say fada a ain loss eben one ob dem wa ya gii me simon peter beena tote a sode e pull out de sode an hit de saabant ob de head man ob de jew priest leada dem an e cut off dat saabant right yea dat saabant been name malchus jedus ton ta peter an e chaage um say pit way ya sode ain a gwine drink de cup wa me fada done gii me den de roman sodja dem dey head leada an de jew gyaad dem res jedus an tie um op dey tek um an gone fus fa see annas annas been caiaphas fadaeenlaw an caiaphas been de head man ob de priest dem dat yeah caiaphas de one wa been wise de jew leada dem tell um say e mo betta fa one man fa dead fa all de people simon peter an noda ciple beena folla jedus de head man ob de jew priest leada dem know de oda ciple good so de oda ciple gone wid jedus eenside de yaad ob de head man house bot peter been lef outside ta de gyate de oda ciple wa de head man know good come out gin e taak ta de gyal wa beena keep watch by de gyate an e tek peter eenside de yaad de gyal wa been by de gyate aks peter say ya noda one ob dat man ciple dem ainty peter ansa say no a ain e ciple de place dey been cole so de saabant dem an de gyaad dem been mek a fire an dey beena stanop roun de fire fa waam deysef an peter gone an stanop wid um da waam esef too de man wa nyuse fa be de head man ob de priest leada dem e quizzit jedus e quizzit um bout e ciple dem an dem ting wa e beena laan people jedus ansa de head man say all de time a beena taak fo all de people een de open a laan um een de jew meetin house an een god house weh all de jew people meet togeda a ain neba hide fa tell nobody nottin hoccome ya da quizzit me quizzit dem people wa done yeh wa a say fa sho dey know wa a beena say wen jedus say dat one ob de gyaad dem slap um an say dat ain no way fa taak ta de head man ainty jedus ansa say ef a done say sompin wa ain right tell ebrybody yah wa a say bot ef a done say wa true wa mek ya slap me so den annas sen jedus ta caiaphas de head man ob de priest leada dem een dat time an jedus han been still tie op peter been still dey close ta de fire da waam esef de oda people wa been dey aks um say ya ain noda one ob dat man ciple dem ainty peter say no a ain e ciple den noda man come op ta peter e been one ob de saabant dem wa wok fa de head man an e been kin ta de man wa got e yea cut off e aks peter say a done see ya wid um een de olib gyaaden ainty peter say gin no a ain been dey dat same time a roosta crow day clean de gyaad dem tek jedus way fom caiaphas house an gone ta de roman gobna bighouse bot de jew dem ain gone eenside de gobna bighouse cause dey law say ef dey gone eenside de house weh people wa ain jew da stay dey ain gwine be clean een god eye an dat gwine mek um so dey ain fit fa nyam de passoba feas now de jew dem been wahn fa nyam de feas so pilate de roman gobna gone fa meet um an aks um say wa oona say dis man done do dey ansa pilate say we ain been fa bring dis man ta ya ef e ain done bad pilate tell um say oona tek um an go jedge um by oona own law de jew dem ansa say bot oona roman law say we ain got no right fa tek no man life wen all dis happen dat mek um come true wa jedus been say bout de way e been gwine dead pilate gone eenside de bighouse ta de place weh dey jedge people den e mek um tek jedus an come meet um eenside dey e quizzit jedus say ya de king ob de jew people dem den jedus aks pilate say dat wa ya tink o dat wa oda people tell ya bout me pilate ansa say ya tink a a jew ya own jew people an de leada dem ob de priest dem dey done han ya oba ta me wa ya done done jedus tell pilate say a ain a king like de king dem wa rule een dis wol ef a been a king like dat me man dem been gwine fight fa me so dat de jew dem ain res me no a ain a king like dem wa rule een dis wol yah pilate aks um say well den dat mean ya a king ainty jedus ansa say ya right wen ya say a a king dat hoccome a come eenta de wol a bon fa tell people de trute all dem wa lob trute dey da pay mind ta me wod pilate aks um say de trute wa dat mean den pilate gone back outside gin ta de jew dem e tell um say a ain find nottin dat dis man done do fa mek me condemn um bot ebry yeah wen de passoba come a hab um tek a man outta de jailhouse an leh um go free fa oona oona wahn me fa leh de king ob de jew people go de people holla loud ansa pilate say no mus dohn leh dat man dey go free leh barabbas outta de jailhouse fa we now den barabbas been a robba pilate tell de sodja dem fa tek jedus an go beat um de sodja dem tek some sticky briah an mek a crown an dey pit um pon jedus head den dey pit a long purple robe pon um fa weah dey beena op ta um an mek fun ob um da say ya mus lib faeba ya de king ob de jew people an dey slap um one mo time pilate gone out ta de jew dem e tell um say oona look yah a gwine mek um bring um back ta oona so dat oona gwine know dat a ain find nottin bad wa e done fa mek me condemn um so jedus come out an e beena weah de briah crown an de long purple robe pilate tell de people say fa mek um nail ya ta de cross jedus ansa say ya hab powa oba me jes cause god gii ya dat powa dey so den de man wa han me oba ta ya e de mo wossa sinna wen pilate yeh wa jedus say e try fa find a way fa leh jedus go bot de jew people holla say ef ya leh dis man yah go ya ain no fren ob de roman rula caesar de one wa say e a king e de enemy ob caesar wen pilate yeh wa de people say e mek um bring jedus out den pilate seddown een de chair weh dey seddown fa jedge people een de place dey call de stone pabement de hebrew people call um gabbatha now by den e been bout midday ob de preparation day dat de day fo de passoba staat pilate tell de jew people say oona look yah oona king bot de people holla say tek um way tek um way nail um ta de cross kill um pilate aks um say oona wahn me fa nail oona king ta de cross an kill um de leada dem ob de priest dem ansa say we ain hab no oda king cep caesar so den pilate han jedus oba ta um fa leh de roman sodja dem go nail um ta de cross so de sodja dem tek chaage ob jedus an e gone out da tote e own cross pon e shoulda til e come ta a place dey call de place wa stan like a man head de hebrew people call dat place golgotha dey de sodja dem nail jedus ta de cross an dey nail two oda man ta two oda cross one ta jedus lef han side an de oda ta jedus right han side jedus been dey een de middle ob dem two pilate write pon a paper an mek a sign wa say jedus wa come fom nazareth de king ob de jew people an pilate mek um pit dat sign dey pon jedus cross a heapa jew people read dat sign cause de place weh dey been nail jedus ta de cross been dey close ta de city an dey been write dat een shree language een hebrew latin an greek de jew priest leada dem tell pilate say mek um write dat sign noda way mus dohn write dis de king ob de jew people mek um write dis man say a de king ob de jew people pilate ansa say wa a done write dat wa gwine stay dey atta de sodja dem been nail jedus ta de cross dey tek e cloes an wide um fo way an ebry sodja tek a paat den dey tek e robe wa been mek ob jes one piece ob closs fom top ta bottom an ain hab no seam een um de sodja dem tell one noda say mus dohn teah de robe leh we shrow dice fa see who gwine git um wen dis happen wa done been write een god book come true dat say dey done wide op me cloes mongst deysef an dey shrow dice fa see who gwine git um so dat wa de sodja dem done close ta jedus cross been some ooman da stanop dey dey been jedus modda e sista an mary wa been clopas wife an mary magdalene wen jedus see e modda an de ciple wa e lob da stanop dey e tell e modda say ooman look yah dis yah ya son den e tell dat ciple say look yah dis yah ya modda fom den on dat ciple tek jedus modda fa lib een e own house wen dat happen jedus know e done done all wa e spose fa do een dis wol an e say a tosty wen e say dat wa dey been write een god book come true a jug full op wid winega wine been dey so dey soak a sponge een de wine an tie um ta a hyssop branch den dey pit de sponge op ta jedus mout jedus tek de wine den e say a done done um an e pit e head down an e gii op e life now den e been de preparation day de nex day been de passoba woshup day an de jew leada dem ain been wahn de man dem body fa stay dey pon dey cross pon dat woshup day cause dat day been a special big woshup day so dey gone an aks pilate fa leh de sodja dem broke de man dem leg an tek um down off ob dey cross so de sodja dem gone ta de fus man wa been nail ta e cross an dey broke e leg den dey broke de oda man leg bot wen dey come ta jedus dey see e done dead so dey ain broke e leg steada dat one ob de sodja dem tek e speah an jook jedus een e side dat mek blood an wata pour outta jedus body de man wa see dem ting yah happen e tell all dis fa mek oona bleebe an wa e say e so e know fa sho dat all wa e say happen fa true all dis happen so dat wa done been write een god book gwine come true dat say dey ain gwine broke none ob e bone dem an dey write een noda place een god book say dey gwine look pon de one dey been jook atta dat joseph wa come fom arimathea gone an aks pilate fa leh um tek way jedus body pilate gree so joseph tek de body an gone dis joseph yah de man dat beena bleebe pon jedus an folla um bot e ain wahn fa leh oda people know dat cause e been scaid ob de jew head man dem nicodemus gone long wid joseph fa tek way jedus body fom de cross e tote spice wa dey call myrrh an aloes mix togeda dat spice weigh bout a hundud pound an dat nicodemus de man dat fus gone fa see jedus one night de two man dem tek jedus body way dey tek de spice an some piece ob linen closs an dey wrop op de body wid um same like how de jew people wrop op dead body wen dey bury um a gyaaden been dey een de place weh dey nail jedus ta de cross eenside dat gyaaden dey been a nyew tomb weh dey ain neba bury nobody cause dat day been de preparation day fo de jew woshup day an cause de tomb ain been faa way fom de cross de two man pit jedus body dey een dat tomb aaly een de maanin de fus day ob de week wen de place been still daak mary magdalene gone ta de tomb e see dat de stone wa dey been pit oba de door ob de tomb fa kiba um been moob fom dey mary ton back an ron ta simon peter an de oda ciple de one wa jedus lob e tell um say dey done tek way de lawd body outta de tomb an we ain know wa dey done wid um so peter an de oda ciple staat off ta de tomb bof dem beena ron bot de oda ciple ron mo fast den peter so e git ta de tomb fus e bend oba an e look eenside de tomb an e see jes dem piece ob linen closs dey wa de two man dem been nyuse fa wrop op jedus body bot dat ciple ain gone eenside de tomb den simon peter wa come hine um git ta de tomb too e gone eenside de tomb an e see dem piece ob linen closs da lay dey an e see de closs wa dey been nyuse fa wrop roun jedus head dat been pon noda side fole op by esef den de oda ciple wa fus git ta de tomb gone eenside too wen e see all dat e bleebe stillyet dey ain ondastan wa done been write een god book dat say dat jedus haffa git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin den de ciple dem gone back ta dey house mary beena stanop da cry close ta de tomb wiles e beena cry e bend oba an look eenside dey eenside de tomb e see two angel dey beena weah white cloes an beena seddown een dat place dey weh jedus body done been one angel been ta de head an de oda angel been ta de foot weh jedus done been de angel dem aks mary say hoccome ya da cry mary ansa um say dey done tek me lawd an gone way an a ain know weh dey pit um wen mary say dat e ton roun an e see jedus da stanop dey bot mary ain know dat been jedus jedus aks um say hoccome ya da cry who ya da look fa mary tink dat de man wa wok de gyaaden so e say sah ef ya done tek um way tell me weh ya pit um an a gwine go an git um jedus say mary mary ton an look pon back op ta me fada wa oona fada too e me god an e oona god too so mary magdalene gone ta de ciple dem an tell um e been see de lawd an e tell um dat jedus say dem ting fus daak de fus day ob de week de ciple dem been geda dey lock all de door dem cause dey been scaid ob de jew leada dem wiles dey been dey jedus come outta noweh an e stanop mongst um e tell um say peace pon oona atta e say dat e show um de cut een e han an e side an wen de ciple dem see de lawd dey been full op wid joy jedus tell um gin say peace pon oona same like de fada sen me fa come eenta de wol same fashion a da sen oona fa go fa do me wok den e blow e bret pon um an say leh de holy sperit come pon oona ef oona paadon a poson wa sin god gwine paadon dat poson dey ef oona ain paadon dat poson wa sin god ain gwine paadon dat poson dey one ob de tweb ciple dem wa name thomas dey call um de twin e ain been dey wen jedus come ta de oda ciple dem so de oda ciple dem tell thomas dey been see de lawd thomas tell um say a ain gwine bleebe cep a see de nail print een e two han an a pit me finga een de place weh de nail cut um dey an cep a pit me han een de cut een e side atta eight day been pass de ciple dem been geda gin een de house thomas esef been dey wid um eben dough de door been lock stillyet jedus come gin an stan mongst um e say peace pon oona den jedus tell thomas say tek ya finga an tetch me two han an look pon um good scretch out ya han an pit um een me side mus dohn doubt no mo bleebe pon me thomas ansa jedus say o me lawd an me god jedus tell um say ya bleebe pon me cause ya done see me ainty bot fa true god gwine bless dem wa bleebe pon me eben dough dey ain neba see me jedus done a heapa oda miracle wa e ciple dem see bot dey ain write down een dis book yah bot de ting dem wa write down een dis book dey write down so dat oona kin bleebe dat jedus de messiah christ god son an ef oona bleebe pon christ oona gwine hab true life atta dat jedus appeah gin ta e ciple dem wen dey been close ta lake tiberias e happen like dis yah simon peter thomas dey call um de twin nathanael wa come fom cana dey een galilee zebedee two son an two oda jedus ciple dey all been dey togeda simon peter tell um say a da gwine fa fish dey ansa peter say we gwine come wid ya so dey gone an git eenta de boat dey fish all night bot dey ain ketch nottin day clean jedus gone an stanop pon de sho bot de ciple dem ain been know dat been jedus den jedus tell um say me fren dem oona ain ketch nottin dey ansa say no we ain ketch nottin jedus tell um say tek oona net an shrow um pon de right han side ob de boat den oona gwine ketch some fish so dey shrow out dey net pon de side weh jedus tell um den dey ain been able fa draw de net back eenside dey been sommuch fish een de net dat ciple wa jedus lob tell peter say dat de lawd da stanop yonda pon de sho now simon peter been tek off e top cloes wa e weah wiles e beena fish so wen e yeh dat ciple say dat de lawd e jes wrop e top cloes roun esef an jomp eenta de wata de oda ciple dem tek de boat an gone ta de sho da drag de net full op wid fish de sho ain been faa off e been bout a hundud yaad wen dey git ta de sho dey see fish da roas pon coal an some bread jedus tell um say bring some ob de fish wa oona jes ketch simon peter gone back eenside de boat an drag de net ta de sho dey been a hundud an fiftyshree big fish wa full op de net stillyet de net ain teah jedus tell um say come an nyam none ob de ciple dem hab mind fa aks um say who ya da cause dey been know dat de lawd so jedus gone an tek de bread den e gim de fish dis mek shree time dat jedus appeah ta e ciple dem atta e been git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin atta dey been nyam jedus aks simon peter say simon john son ya lob me fa true mo den all dem oda ciple yah lob me peter ansa jedus say yeah lawd ya know a lob ya jedus tell um say ya mus feed me lamb dem jedus aks peter de secon time say simon john son ya lob me fa true peter ansa say yeah lawd ya know a lob ya jedus tell um say ya mus mind me sheep dem jedus aks peter gin say simon john son ya lob me peter haat been hebby cause jedus aks um shree time ef e lob um so e ansa de lawd say lawd ya know all ting ya know dat a lob ya jedus tell um say feed me sheep dem a da tell ya fa true wen ya been nyoung ya been able fa dress yasef an jes git ready an gone wehsoneba ya been wahn fa gone bot wen ya done ole ya gwine scretch out ya han an noda poson gwine dress ya an tek ya weh ya ain wahn fa go wen jedus say dat e beena show how peter gwine dead an hona god den jedus tell um say ya mus folla me peter ton roun an see de ciple wa jedus lob hine um dat de one dey wa been seddown close ta jedus wen dey beena nyam an aks um say lawd who gwine han ya oba ta ya enemy dem wen peter see dat ciple e aks jedus say lawd wa gwine happen ta dis man yah jedus ansa say ef a wahn um fa lib een de wol til a come gin wa diffunce dat mek ta ya ya mus folla me so den de wod gone roun ta de broda dem wa bleebe pon jedus dat de ciple dat jedus lob ain gwine dead bot jedus ain say dat ciple ain been gwine dead e say ef a wahn um fa lib een de wol til a come gin wa diffunce dat mek ta ya dis de ciple dat see an yeh all dem ting yah e write um een dis book an we know dat wa e write dat true fa sho jedus done a heapa oda ting ef dey all been write down a tink dat eben de whole wol ain big nuff fa hab place fa hole all de book dem dat dey gwine haffa nyuse fa write um een deah theophilus een de fus book dat a done write ya a taak bout all wa jedus beena do an all e beena laan people fom de time wen e staat e wok til de day wen god tek um op ta heaben fo jedus gone ta heaben de holy sperit gim wod fa chaage dem postle dat e done pick an laan um wa fa do atta jedus done suffa an come back fom mongst de dead jurin foty day e appeah a heapa time ta e postle dem fom de way e appeah ta um e postle dem ain doubt none tall dat e da lib gin an wensoneba jedus been wid um e beena tell um bout how god rule one time wen jedus beena nyam wid um e chaage um say mus dohn gone way fom jerusalem wait yah til oona git wa me fada promise oona wa a beena tell oona bout john bactize people wid wata bot soon god gwine bactize oona wid de holy sperit wen de postle dem meet togeda wid jedus dey aks um say lawd dis yah de time wen ya gwine leh de people ob israel hab dey own country gin jedus tell um say me fada de onliest one dat hab tority fa say pazactly wa day or time all dem ting gwine happen oona ain spose fa know wen dem ting gwine be wen de holy sperit come pon oona e gwine gii oona powa an oona gwine tell all bout me een jerusalem an all oba judea an samaria an eben ta de fudares place een de wol atta jedus say dat wiles de postle dem beena look pon um god tek um op eenta heaben an de postle dem been look op pon jedus til a cloud hide um de postle dem still beena look op ta de sky wiles e been gwine wen all ob a sudden dey see two man wa weah white cloes stanop close ta um de two man dem tell um say oona wa come fom galilee hoccome oona da stanop dey da look op ta de sky dis jedus yah dat god done tek way op eenta heaben e gwine come back ta de wol jes like oona done shim wen e gone op eenta heaben den de postle dem come fom de hill wa dey call mount olib an gone back ta jerusalem e bout haf mile fom de mount olib ta jerusalem wen dey git ta jerusalem dey gone op ta de opstair een de house ta de room weh dey beena stay dem wa been dey been peter john james an andrew philip an thomas bartholomew an matthew james wa been alphaeus chile an simon wa dey call de patrot an judas wa been james chile dem postle yah de ooman dem an mary jedus modda an e broda dem dey beena meet dey togeda all de time an dey beena pray wid one haat one day wen dem wa bleebe pon jedus been geda togeda bout one hundud an twenty people been dey peter stanop een de middle ob de people an staat fa taak ta um e say bredren de holy sperit taak ta david way back dey an hab um write een god book bout judas wa been come fa bring de people fa res jedus an all dem ting wa david been tell dey been haffa come true judas been one ob we an we all beena wok togeda fa god now den wen dat man judas sell jedus e tek de money an gone an buy a fiel een dat fiel dey judas gone an faddown head fus e belly buss open an e guts fall out an e dead all de people een jerusalem yeh bout wa been happen ta judas so dey call dat place weh judas dead akeldama wa een dey language mean fiel ob blood an peter gone on fa tell de people say dey write bout judas een de book ob psalms say dohn leh nottin be lef dey een e house dohn leh nobody lib dey an dey write gin say leh noda poson tek e place an do de wok wa e beena do cause ob dat we haffa pick one man fa jine we fa tell oda people dat jedus done git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin we haffa pick one ob dem wa been dey wid we all de time wen de lawd jedus been trabel wid we fom de time wen john beena bactize people til de time wen god tek jedus op ta heaben so den dey pick two man dey pick joseph wa dey call barsabbas dey call um justus too an dey pick matthias dey pray say lawd ya know all people haat we da aks ya fa show we outta de two man dem yah wish one ya done pick fa be a postle an do dis wok wa judas lef wen e gone ta de place weh e blongst den dey draw lots fa pick one matthias name come out so dey add um ta de oda leben postle dem wen de day ob pentecost come all de people dat bleebe pon jedus been geda togeda een one place all ob a sudden dey yeh a nise dat soun like a haad wind da blow dat nise come fom de eliment an e been dey all roun eenside de house weh dey been seddown dey see sompin een dat place dat look like fire dat been shape op like tongue dem dem tongue ob fire spread out one ta ebry poson dey a tongue ob fire beena stay dey pontop ob ebry one ob um de holy sperit come pon all dem people dey an full um op e mek um all staat fa taak diffunt language dem dat dey ain neba laan ebry poson beena say wa de holy sperit wahn um fa say now een dat same time dey some jew people wa feah god wa come fom oda country beena lib dey een jerusalem wen dey yeh dat nise a big crowd come togeda an dey all been scruck cause dey yeh dem dat bleebe pon jedus da taak een dem diffunt language an ebry poson yeh somebody da taak een e own language de people all been stonish fa true dey say all dese people yah dat we yeh da taak een diffunt language dey all come fom galilee ainty hoccome we yeh dem da taak een we own language we come fom plenty diffunt country some ob we come fom parthia some fom media an some fom elam some fom mesopotamia fom judea an fom cappadocia some fom pontus an fom asia some ob we come fom phrygia fom pamphylia fom egypt an fom paat ob libya close ta cyrene some ob we trabel fom rome we all mix some ob we been bon jew an some ob we jine de jew dem atta we gree fa bleebe wa dey bleebe some ob we come fom crete an some fom arabia stillyet we all da yeh dem people yah dat come fom galilee da taak een we own diffunt language bout de great ting dem dat god done do de people all been stonish an all mix op so dey beena aks one noda say wa dis mean bot some oda people beena mek fun ob dem dat bleebe pon jedus say dem people done drink tommuch wine wen dey say dat peter an de oda leben postle dem stanop an peter taak ta de crowd een a loud boice e tell um say oona me jew broda dem an all ob oona dat lib een jerusalem leh me splain dis listen ta wa a da tell oona oona tink dat dese people dronk bot dey ain dronk e jes nine oclock een de maanin stead ob dat dis ting dat oona see happen dat wa de prophet joel beena taak bout wen e say god say dis wa a gwine do wen dem las day come a gwine pour out me sperit pon all people oona son dem an oona daughta dem dey gwine tell people wa a tell um fa say oona nyoung man dem gwine see wision wa a show um an oona ole man dem gwine dream plenty ting fom me yeah wen dem las day come a gwine pour out me sperit pon de people dat do me wok pon de man dem an de ooman dem an dey gwine tell people wa a tell um fa say a gwine do miracle dem op een de sky an a gwine show um sign down een de wol oona gwine see blood an fire an a heapa smoke fo de day ob de lawd gwine come dat portant day full ob glory de sun gwine ton daak like night an de moon gwine ton red like blood an ebrybody dat call pon de name ob de lawd gwine git sabe oona people ob israel listen good ta wa a da say jedus wa come fom nazareth e a man dat god sen ta we fa show oona dat god been sen um god gii jedus e powa fa do a heapa miracle an great wok wa mek people stonish an e sho oona heapa sign wa mek oona know e powa oona know bout all dem ting cause e been mongst oona weh e done um dat man jedus dey han um oba ta oona cause god done been cide fa dat fa happen e done been know bout dat an oona kill jedus wen oona gim ta wickity people fa leh um nail um ta de cross bot atta jedus done dead god mek jedus git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin e free jedus so dat e ain suffa de pain ob det no mo det ain able fa hab no powa tall fa keep jedus een de grabe cause david taak bout jedus say a see de lawd fo me all de time e da stay dey wid me ta me right han side so a ain gwine git shook op cause ob dis me haat heppy an wid me mout a da praise de lawd wid joy an me body too gwine lib een hope fa wa god done promise cause ya ain gwine lef me soul een de place ob de dead people an ya ain gwine leh de one dat blongst ta ya eben staat fa rot een de grabe ya done show me de way wa da lead ta life wen ya dey wid me ya gwine mek me full op wid joy bredren a da taak ta oona plain bout we ole people leada david e done dead an dey bury um an e tomb still yah wid we bot david been a prophet an e been know wa god been promise um god mek a dead an lib gin wen e say god ain lef um een de place ob de dead people an e body ain eben staat fa rot god done mek dis jedus git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin we da tell oona dat dis done ya enemy dem ondaneet ya foot so den leh all de israel people know fa sho dat god done mek dis jedus fa be lawd an christ an e de same one dat oona done nail ta de cross wen de people yeh wa peter say hab fa share um dey beena sell dey propaty an ting an share de money wid ebrybody so dat dey all hab wa dey need ebry day dey beena geda togeda een god house an dey beena geda een one noda house fa nyam togeda an dey been heppy an dey beena share wid one noda dey beena praise god an all de people been too heppy wid um an dem wa de lawd beena sabe jine op wid dem dat done been trus een jedus an waak eba since e been bon ebry day dem people beena cyaa um an lef um close ta de gyate ta god house wa dey call de purty gyate dey beena lef dat man dey fa beg fom de people wa pass by fa go eenta god house fa pray wen de cripple op man see peter an john da go eenta god house e beg um fa gim money peter an john look dat man dead een e eye an peter tell um say look at we so de man pay mind ta de postle dem call um barnabas dat mean one wa courage people e sell e fiel an e bring de money an gim ta de postle dem now den one man been dey name ananias an e wife name sapphira dey sell some lan too ananias keep some ob de money fa esef an e wife know e done done dat den ananias tek de oda res ob de money an go gim ta de postle dem peter aks ananias say ananias hoccome ya gree fa leh satan go out eenta de screet an dey lay down pon dey bed an mat dey so dat wen peter pass by e shada gwine cross oba um a heapa people come togeda fom de town dem close ta jerusalem too dey bring dey sick an dem wa hab ebil sperit an dey come ta de postle dem an de postle dem heal um den de head man ob de jew priest dem an all dem wa gone long wid um dem ob de sadducee paaty dey been too jealous ob de postle dem so dey grab hole ta de postle dem an pit um een de jailhouse bot one ob de lawd angel dem come een de night an open de door ta dat jailhouse den de angel lead de postle dem outta de jailhouse an e tell um say oona mus go stanop een god house mus tell de people all bout dis nyew life oona hab de postle dem do wa de angel tell um fa do wen day clean de postle dem gone ta god house an laan de people bout de nyew life de head man ob de priest dem an dem wa gone long wid um dey call a big meetin wid all de jew leada dem een de council dey sen ta de jailhouse fa hab um bring de postle dem fa come fo de council bot wen de offisa dem git ta de jailhouse dey ain find de postle dem dey so de offisa dem ton back an gone ta de council an tell de leada dem say wen we git ta de jailhouse we find um lock op good an de gyaad dem da stanop fa gyaad de door bot wen we open de door an look eenside we ain see nobody dey wen de offisa ob de man dem wa beena gyaad god house an de leada dem ob de priest dem yeh dat dey been all bumfumble an dey aks one noda say wa gwine come fom all dis jes den a man come een an tell um say look yah dem man wa oona done pit een de jailhouse dey da stanop oba dey een god house da laan de people bout god so de offisa an e gyaad dem gone an find de postle dem een god house an dey bring um back ta de council bot dey ain haam um wen dey mek um come cause dey been scaid dat de people gwine chunk stone pon um dey bring de postle dem een an mek um stanop fo de council an de head man ob de jew priest dem quizzit um e say we done chaage oona dat oona mus dohn laan nobody een de name ob dis man ainty stillyet oona beena laan de people an mek all dem een jerusalem yeh bout um an oona wahn fa mek people blame we fa e det peter an de oda postle dem ansa um say we haffa do wa god tell we fa do steada wa people tell we fa do atta oona hang jedus pon a tree an kill um de same god wa we ole people beena woshup mek jedus git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin god gii jedus tority an powa an mek um seddown ta e right han side fa be we leada an we sabior e done dat fa gii de people ob israel de chance fa ton fom dey sin an change how dey tell um fa do wen de council man dem yeh wa de postle dem say dey been so mad til dey been wahn fa kill um bot gamaliel a pharisee wa beena laan people de jew law e been one ob dem een dat council dat
